description.content: Ungewohnte Allianz: SPD-Vorsitzender Sigmar Gabriel unterstützt den Discounter Lidl, der einen Mindestlohn von zehn Euro fordert.

description.hltext_display: Al-Qaeda group 'considered' poisoning US food
description.content:
WASHINGTON (AFP) - The same Al-Qaeda-linked group that attempted to send bombs on cargo planes earlier this year considered putting poison in food served at US hotels and restaurants, US media reported.
US intelligence officials told CNN on Tuesday that the Yemen-based Al-Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula (AQAP) were considering poisoning food supplies with the deadly chemicals ricin and cyanide.
The Department of Homeland Security however also emphasized the threat was akin to the plots discussed in numerous online jihadist publications, where militants and their sympathizers routinely consider ways to attack western interests.
"We're talking months, not weeks (ago), that this came into the threat stream," an official told CNN.
An anonymous source in the US intelligence community told CBS News earlier this week that the threat was "credible."
Authorities have met with representatives in the hotel and restaurant industry to discuss the threat and "best practices" for ensuring food safety, according to CNN.
Al-Qaeda has "publicly stated its intention to try to carry out unconventional attacks for well over a decade, and AQAP propaganda in the past year has made similar reference," said DHS spokesman Sean Smith in a statement to CNN.
"We get reports about the different kinds of attacks terrorists would like to carry out that frequently are beyond their assessed capability," Smith said.

event_or_fact.property: publicly stated its intention to try to carry out unconventional attacks for well over a decade, and AQAP propaganda in the past year has made similar reference
We get reports about the different kinds of attacks terrorists would like to carry out that frequently are beyond their assessed capability

description.hltext_display: 海南西线高速2路段修复通车 大修工程竣工达18公里
description.content:
http://news.hainan.net/ 时间：2010-12-22 8:15:00 来源：南海网-海南日报
昨天中午12时，西线高速公路大修工程海口往三亚方向190公里至196公里正式竣工通车，这也是该工程首个修复开通的路段。下午，海口往三亚方向326公里至338公里段也竣工通车。
为了同时兼顾车流通行和施工，西线高速公路大修实行分段维修，按照路面损毁情况每4公里到6公里为一段进行施工。190公里至196公里段维修工程于今年10月份开工，因受到强降雨影响工程进度被耽误，后在主管部门、施工方和承建方共同努力下，工程按照既定时间，按照标准质量完成。
记者昨天下午在通车路段看到，整个路段焕然一新，路面整洁光亮，交通标志线齐全，道沿和防护栏也按照国家标准进行了更新。
据海南西线高速公路大中修及配套设施改造工程项目指挥长王振雁介绍，西线高速公路是通车12年以后第一次大修，省交通厅格外重视，计划把西线高速公路做成道路样板工程。因此各个单位在施工过程中高标准严要求，14道工序每一道都认真执行，监理、纪检等部门现场把关。
记者了解到，除了昨天中午190公里至196公里段通车外，昨天下午西线高速海口往三亚方向326公里至338公里段也竣工通车，昨天整个西线高速公路大中修及配套设施改造工程竣工里程达18公里。
王振雁告诉记者，近期各施工单位加大了施工作业面，投入更多的作业机械，在明年春节前整个西线大修工程还将竣工47公里。另外为了方便过往车辆通行，施工单位对暂时不动工但路面破损严重的路段进行修补，并且要求做到施工不扰行人，同时路面干净，无沙石。

description.hltext_display: 耳长者长寿吗？ 民间传闻“高寿征象”不可信
description.content:
健康长寿是人们的美好愿望。民间传闻的所谓长寿者应具有寿眉、耳毫、生命线长等特征，常会给我们带来消极的影响。为此，下面将历年来所做的长寿老人调查研究的科学结论提供给读者，以提高认识。
祖辈长寿就会导致后代短寿吗？
大量长寿调查表明：长寿老人多有家族长寿史，百岁老人家族长寿率一般都在50%以上；且家族长寿率随年龄组序而递升。代际间的寿命关系通过基因遗传；任何生物都有自己特定的遗传基因，通过生殖细胞代代相传，呈现出各种不同的生命曲线和寿限。人的最高自然寿限，在出生前母体受孕时就已确定。出生后能否活到最高寿限，因受后天环境因素的制约而有很大差别。 手掌生命线能预测寿命吗？ 手掌生命线是指手掌靠近拇指的掌纹。相书上记载：“手掌生命线深、长，向外包绕大鱼际，甚至更长者，是长寿的征兆；生命线沟短浅、枯干、歪斜者，则是短命的征兆。”为此，生命线沟短浅者常忧心忡忡。为探明究竟，研究者曾对344例90岁以上长寿老人及256例60～90岁对照组检测其手掌生命线。结果发现，手掌生命线深、长而明显者，长寿组占68.8%，对照组占63.8%，经统计学处理，差异无显著性；且尚有31.2%的长寿老人生命线短、浅而紊乱亦长寿。因此，生命线不能用来预测寿命，长的生命线未必是长寿的征兆，短的生命线未必有短命的结局。
长眉、眉毫及耳毫象征长寿吗？
民间传闻：眉为保寿，宜长不宜短，眉长是寿征，眉或外耳中长出长毛――眉毫、耳毫，更是寿征。研究人员在对长寿老人的调查中发现，尽管有长眉、眉毫及耳毫者长寿组多于对照组，但长寿组中71.5%眉毛白秃，眉毛增长(多稀疏)者只占28.5%，有眉毫者只占27.3%，有耳毫者只占9.3%。可见长眉、眉毫及耳毫均非长寿象征，只散见于长寿人群中。这可能是在老化过程中，毛发生长细胞由于退行性变而出现的一种异常生长现象，可作为衡量衰老的指标，但不能用来预测寿命。
寿斑(老年斑)是长寿的象征吗？
老年斑可分为老年疣、老年色素斑及老年白斑。老年疣即民间指的寿斑，寓长寿之意。老年疣常出现于老人面、颈、胸、背等处，隆起高于表皮面，大小可由几毫米至两厘米甚至更大，是一种良性表皮肿瘤。研究人员检测50例青年人、256例60～69岁老人及344例90岁以上长寿老人寿斑分布情况，结果发现，有寿斑者青年组为0，60～69岁组占61.3%，90岁以上组达94.8%，百岁老人全部有寿斑。可见寿斑随增龄而增多，并非长寿特征，而是皮肤衰老的重要标志，不能用它来预测长寿。
耳长者长寿吗？
耳长或外耳长度是指上耳轮最高点到耳垂的长度，耳长者长寿为民间流行的一种见解。研究人员在长寿老人中调查，发现耳长随年龄组序上升而递增，而且同一年龄组、同性别者耳长数值非常接近。耳部下端由脂肪和结缔组织构成，老年人体内脂肪积聚相对增加，结缔组织随增龄而松弛，故长寿老人外耳较长。这是增龄衰退的结果，并非长寿的特征，不能用来预测寿命。
闲懒者长寿吗？
研究人员对长寿老人的调查资料表明：长寿老人中体力劳动者占95%，他们自幼养成了热爱劳动的习惯，日出而作，日落而息，已形成生活定型。长期坚持活动能保持代谢平衡，推迟动脉硬化年龄，减少疾病发生，延缓运动系统衰退，保持高龄期仍有独立生活的能力。古今中外知名的长寿者，无一不是勤劳一生，没有一个懒汉能活到高寿。 (朱志明 刘竟芳)

description.hltext_display: Car skids in water, driver killed
description.content: A driver has died after skidding in a pool of water while trying to overtake on a far north Queensland road.

description.hltext_display: “บิลลี่” ประกาศแต่งเมียเบอร์ 2 ม.ค.ปี54 งดปั๊มลูกอ้างแก่แล้ว
description.content:
นักร้องมาดเข้ม “บิลลี่ โอแกน” สลัดความเหงา ประกาศแต่งแฟนนอกวงการเดือนม.ค.ปี54 เผยจัดงานแบบเรียบง่ายเน้นประหยัด ไม่มีเรือนหอ ฮันนีมูนภายในประเทศ ลั่นแก่แล้วไม่ปั๊มลูกใหม่ ขออยู่กับภรรยาเบอร์ 2 แบบเพื่อน ดูแลกันและกันตลอดไป
ครองตัวเป็นพ่อม่ายมานานร่วม 10 ปี หลังเตียงหักแยกทางกับ “สิเรียม ภักดีดำรงฤทธิ์” จากนั้นได้ไปพบรักกับสาวนอกวงการนามว่า “น้ำฝน” กระทั่งบ่มรักสุกงอมมาได้ประมาณ 4 ปี นักร้องมาดเข้ม “บิลลี่ โอแกน” จึงประกาศจะสละโสดจูงแฟนสาวเข้าพิธีวิวาห์รอบ 2 ในเดือนมกราคมปี 54 โดยการจัดงานครั้งนี้จะจัดกันแบบเล็กๆ ในหมู่ญาติเท่านั้น
“งานแต่งน่าจะเป็นเดือนมกราคมครับ ส่วนจะวันไหนเดี๋ยวผมเรียนให้ทราบอีกทีแล้วกัน สถานที่ก็จะแจ้งให้ทราบอีกครั้ง จะไปเหรอครับ ไปแล้วใส่ซองเปล่า (หัวเราะ) เดี๋ยวแจ้งให้ทราบ แล้วก็ขอบคุณที่ถามถึง ช่วงนี้พยายามเตรียมงานอยู่หลายอย่าง ผมก็วิ่งเอาบัตรเชิญไปให้ ก่อนปีใหม่ เพราะเดี๋ยวจะหยุดกัน ก็ต้องพยายามให้ครบทุกคน ซึ่งคนที่เชิญมาร่วมงานส่วนใหญ่จะเป็นพี่น้องมากกว่าครับ พี่ชายผม น้องชายผม ก็อาจจะมีในส่วนของพิธีนิดๆ หน่อยๆ แต่จัดให้เรียบง่าย จัดเป็นงานเล็กๆ ประหยัด ตามความเหมาะสมกับสภาพเศรษฐกิจ ไม่ได้จัดงานใหญ่โต ก็หวังว่าทุกอย่างจะเรียบร้อย”
“เรือนหอไม่มีครับ ก็อยู่บ้านเท่าที่มีเป็นบ้านเล็กๆ มีเท่าไหร่ก็อยู่เท่านั้นแหละ ส่วนฮันนีมูนก็อย่าเรียกฮันนีมูนเลย เรียกว่าไปพักผ่อนดีกว่า ก็คงมีนิดหน่อยในประเทศ ไม่ได้บินไปไหน เพราะอยากให้เป็นไปแบบพอเพียง ประหยัดๆ เราไม่ชอบทำอะไรที่มันเกินตัวเรา”
ประกาศชัดไม่ขอปั๊มลูกใหม่ เพราะแก่แล้ว ขออยู่กับภรรยาเบอร์ 2 แบบเพื่อนกัน ดูแลกันไปจนกว่าชีวิตจะหาไม่
“แต่งแล้วจะปั๊มลูกเลยไหม คงไม่มีแล้วครับ อายุขนาดนี้แล้ว ตอนนี้ผมก็ 40 กว่าแล้ว ถ้าคิดจะมีลูกใหม่อีกตอนนี้ กว่าลูกจะโตผมก็ 60 แล้ว ผมจะอยู่ถึงตอนนั้นหรือเปล่าก็ไม่รู้ ตัวเจ้าสาวเองก็ไม่อยากมีลูก เราได้คุยกันแล้วว่า เราจะอยู่เป็นเพื่อนกัน แต่งเพื่ออยู่ดูแลกัน พออายุมากๆ มันก็ไม่ได้คิดถึงเรื่องว่าจะมีบุตรมีอะไร อยู่ดูแลกันจนกว่าชีวิตจะหาไม่กันไปชาติหนึ่งดีกว่า"

description.hltext_display: Q&A: Bringing New Technology To Market
description.content:
Richard Magoon, Vice President, MCD Technologies, Inc.
Developing new technology keeps the industry moving forward, but bringing new manufacturing solutions to market can be a difficult task. Food Manufacturing spoke with Richard Magoon, Vice President of MCD Technologies, Inc. and inventor of Refractance Window® heat technology, about the process of developing innovative manufacturing solutions.
Q: How did you come up with the idea for the product?
A: After spending many years in the aviation and marine autopilot industries, I traveled to Central America. The night before I left home, I helped my father put plums in a home air dryer. While in San Salvador, I saw lots of fruits and vegetables, but unfortunately in the hot, humid climate the food rotted before it could be consumed or transported and was thrown away.
Later that day, I went to an ocean beach to swim and began to think of a way to preserve these foods. After exploring several different ideas, I concluded that the most cost effective way to preserve food was to dry it.
While swimming underwater, I looked up to see that the waters surface acted like a mirror, only allowing me to see something floating on it but almost nothing else. I knew water was the best heat transfer medium in nature and wondered if perhaps water could be used to provide the energy needed to dry products. If so, it might do so more efficiently and without damaging the delicate and valuable nutrients in the food.
Once I had a rough design worked out I built my dryer. My wife, Karin, and I moved to my childhood home in Washington state and began designing and building the dryer, now called the Refractance Window® dryer. We formed our company, MCD Technologies, Inc., and began selling dryers, which are currently being used in nine countries.
Q: What obstacles did you face along the way?
A: Lack of money, lack of knowledge about the food industry, lack of knowledge about food science, lack of knowledge about marketing, sales, accounting, etc. Oh, and lack of money! One of the greatest challenges weve had has been getting the word out to the industry in general concerning the benefits of our drying technology and, in particular, to those who are looking for improved drying methods.
Q: How does Refractance Window® heat technology work?
A: Heat is transmitted by three methods: conduction, convection and radiation. Because all three heat transfer methods function within water, this makes water one of the most effective heat transfer media in nature. Yet, unlike most other media, water transmits very little infrared energy to its surroundings.
Water returns its energy to its surroundings by a combination of conduction and evaporation. Therefore, once a surface of water is covered by a transparent medium, such as plastic, only conduction can take place since the plastic prevents evaporation and associated heat loss. However, if a moisture-laden product (in this case, the product to be dried) is put in direct contact with the plastic surface, there is a window to the passage of infrared energy that is created at the point of contact of the liquid product with the plastic, where it bears on the water. At that time, all three forms of heat transmission methods are operating. This permits exceedingly effective heat transfer to take place.
As the product dries, the infrared window closes, as less and less moisture remains in contact with the plastic. The only heat transfer taking place at that time is by means of conduction. Since plastic is a very poor conductor, little heat is lost in this manner.
The patented technology used in our dryers and evaporators creates a window or passage to infrared energy at the speed of light into the product to be dried. A key feature of the MCD Refractance Window® Dryer lies in the proprietary use of an infrared-transparent plastic film. The product to be dried is placed on the film which floats on top of a heated (210 F / 99 C or less) body of water. Due to evaporative cooling, product reaches only 160 F / 71 C on the dryer and 140 F / 60 C on the evaporator.
Our dryers harness infrared energy by creating a window to the passage of this energy to dry the product. This drying takes place in the most efficient manner. The heat loss in the circulating water beneath the plastic film from evaporation is minimal (dryer) or none (evaporator), since the body of water is essentially covered or entirely encapsulated by the plastic film. The heat transfer that takes place is in locations where the product to be dried is resting on the film, so that heat transfer is directly into the product to be dried and exists almost nowhere else on the plastic film.
Q: How do innovative ideas like this improve the industry as a whole?
A: Products produced on Refractance Window® drying systems are raising the standard for dried products around the world. And, by raising the bar in one area, were all reminded that theres always room for improvements and inventions in all areas.
When we were asking the Washington Technology Center for our first grant, Mr. Richard Parks, who was then the third generation owner and president of National Dryer Corporation, was kind enough to write a letter stating that Refractance Window® drying was the first new drying technology developed in 50 years. We found his spirit of generosity and openness to a new development in his chosen field inspiring and surprisingly common in the industry.
Q: Do you have advice for those who are looking into developing a new processing technology?
A: Go for it! Be prepared to spend a long time shouting your products benefits to the treetops and have only the birds listen. Until you can build credibility in one way or another, what you say about the benefits of your new product or way of doing something is just talk. So figure out a way early in the process of taking your big idea to market to prove your product or project and be prepared to keep on doing that until you find success. And then keep on doing it.
Interview by Lindsey Coblentz, Associate Editor More Food Manufacturing Articles: Food Manufacturing, Advantage Business Media,

event_or_fact.property: Refractance Window drying was the first new drying technology developed in 50 years.

description.hltext_display: 洗澡水太热 皮肤会喊“痒”
description.content:
进入冬季，气候寒冷干燥，人体皮肤里的水分流失比较多，汗腺分泌的汗液和油脂减少，很容易造成皮肤干燥。如果不注意保养，洗澡过频，用过烫的水洗脚、洗澡等，都可能加剧皮肤的干燥状况，引发乏脂性湿疹，又称干燥性皮炎、冬季皮炎。 提醒大家，尤其是老年人应适当减少洗浴次数，洗澡、泡脚时不要用过烫的水，不要用碱性过强的肥皂等洗涤用品，沐浴过后还应适当抹些有保湿作用的润肤露。同时，饮食上要少吃辣、少饮酒，多吃些含维生素E和维生素A的食物，如猪肝、鱼肉、排骨等，以增加皮脂，促进皮肤新陈代谢。
中药内服外涂配合食疗，可很快缓解症状。
中药方：当归12克，白鲜皮10克，熟地30克，太子参15克，地肤子20克，白蒺藜15克，乌蛇10克，防风12克，蝉衣10克，蛇床子15克，丹皮10克，将上药水煎服，1日2次。如将药渣涂在患处，效果更好。
食疗法：蜂蜜适量，莲子15克，芹菜根90克，生薏仁40克，茯苓30克，将上述食材熬粥服用。(周国秀)

description.hltext_display: Elephant Talk Communications Signs Agreement With CLUB MOBIEL
description.content:
"Elephant Talk welcomes our new partnership with CLUB MOBIEL as an exciting opportunity to gain additional market share in the Netherlands marketplace," said Mr. Steven van der Velden, CEO of Elephant Talk. "This alliance is a great way to demonstrate the power and versatility of the Elephant Talk platform to virtually serve any business or community in forming a loyal customer base. Our deal with CLUB MOBIEL will help some of the most loyal soccer fans in the world to forge an even stronger bond with their teams. We look forward to expanding our services to the Eredivisie League to other sports fans in the future."
CLUB MOBIEL, which has served the Eredivisie League since 2007, plans to launch the first Eredivisie soccer clubs on Elephant Talk's mobile platform later this month and will incorporate the combined Elephant Talk platform and T-Mobile's radio access network as an enhanced service to fans.
CLUB MOBIEL will deploy the integrated capabilities of the Elephant Talk's Mobile Virtual Network Enabler (MVNE) platform to fans of teams such as FEYENOORD ROTTERDAM, PSV EINDHOVEN, NAC BREDA, N.E.C. NIJMEGEN, FC GRONINGEN, VITESSE ARNHEM, FC UTRECHT and others.
Frans Nomden, CEO of CLUB MOBIEL, said, "Our ambition is to deliver real added value for our customers and sport clubs, with features like mobile ticketing and loyalty programs. We believe we can achieve these goals by utilizing the Elephant Talk platform, industry expertise and developmental power. As an added benefit, we needed a supplier that could service us going abroad on very short notice, and Elephant Talk can meet this goal."
Martin Zuurbier, CTO of Elephant Talk, added, "CLUB MOBIEL, with Elephant Talk technology, can provide soccer fans with many new direct services including SMS/MMS/Video. For example when a team scores, users can get a credit added to their balance. A subscriber module from a fan's favorite soccer club will enable Elephant Talk's location-based services to offer fans special products and services of their favorite team."
CLUB MOBIEL offers subscriptions with free on net calling, extra minutes per goal, the latest club news and information and integration with other social networks. In cooperation with Elephant Talk, CLUB MOBIEL is looking forward to adding additional value to sport clubs to enable them to strengthen their relationships with fans and sponsors through new forms of communication.
About Elephant Talk Communications Elephant Talk Communications, Inc. (OTCBB: ETAK) is an international provider of business software and services to the telecommunications and financial services industry. The company enables both mobile carriers and virtual operators to offer a full suite of products, delivery platforms, support services, superior industry expertise and high quality customer service without substantial upfront investments from clients. Elephant Talk provides global telecommunication companies, mobile network operators, banks, supermarkets, consumer product companies, media firms, and other businesses a full suite of products and services that enables them to fully provide telecom services as part of their business offerings. The company offers various dynamic products that include remote health care, credit card fraud prevention, mobile internet ID security, multi-country discounted phone services, loyalty management services, and a whole range of other emerging customized mobile services. For more information visit www.elephanttalk.com
Forward-Looking Statements Certain statements contained herein constitute "forward-looking statements" within the meaning of the Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995. These forward-looking statements are based on current expectations, estimates and projections about the Company's industry, management's beliefs and certain assumptions made by management. Readers are cautioned that any such forward-looking statements are not guarantees of future performance and are subject to certain risks, uncertainties and assumptions that are difficult to predict. Because such statements involve risks and uncertainties, the actual results and performance of the Company may differ materially from the results expressed or implied by such forward-looking statements. Given these uncertainties, readers are cautioned not to place undue reliance on such forward-looking statements. Unless otherwise required by law, the Company also disclaims any obligation to update its view of any such risks or uncertainties or to announce publicly the result of any revisions to the forward-looking statements made here; however, readers should review carefully reports or documents the Company files periodically with the Securities and Exchange Commission.

description.hltext_display: 外国摄影师采风欢乐节 拍摄海南传统盅盘舞[图]
description.content:
来自美国、法国、意大利、新加坡等国家和地区的12名资深摄影师日前参加了作为2010年(第十一届)中国海南岛欢乐节内容之一的“外籍摄影师看澄迈”拍摄活动。他们的作品将在欢乐节活动主会场展出。图为两位外籍摄影家拍摄非物质文化遗产盅盘舞后跟小演员学舞蹈。
本报记者古月摄

description.hltext_display: 16 teams, plenty of top recruits to compete in IPSAC basketball event
description.content:
The event's namesake won't be in attendance this year -- the movie actor of "The Green Mile" fame is busy shooting another film -- but the Michael Clarke Duncan "You Can Do Anything" IPSAC Midwest Challenge will still feature plenty of future stars.
The eight-game boys basketball classic tips off at 10 a.m. today at Marshall High School. Event director and first-year Marshall coach Aaron Sembly believes this may be the best collection of talent in the four years of the challenge.
"We look for strong teams and strong individual players, and I think we have both of those this year," said Sembly, who previously coordinated the event at Howe, where he was the coach. "Once we got this field established, we felt pretty good about it."
The 16-team field includes defending Class A state champion Bowman Academy, current 2A top-ranked Fort Wayne Bishop Luers, defending 3A runner-up Gary Wallace, defending 4A regional champion Jeffersonville and Michigan's defending Class B champion, Birmingham Detroit Country Day.
The collection of individual talent is also lengthy: Country Day senior Amir Williams is an Ohio State commitment; Bishop Luers freshman James Blackmon Jr. and Tech freshman Trey Lyles are pledged to Indiana; and Lawrence Central junior Jeremy Hollowell, Jeffersonville sophomore Darryl Baker and Bowman Academy junior DeJuan Marrero are considered high-major prospects in their respective classes.
Tickets cost $10 and are good all day.
The action begins with Tindley vs. Gary Roosevelt at 10 a.m. Manual and Gary West play 15 minutes after the conclusion of the first game. The rest of the schedule (with approximate times): Arlington-Bishop Luers, 1:30 p.m.; Tech-East Chicago Central, 3:15; Northwest-Chicago Julian, 5; Lawrence Central-Cincinnati Aiken, 6:45; Jeffersonville-Bowman, 8:30; and Gary Wallace-Country Day, 10:15.
"There are some really strong teams off to good starts and some others that are a bit of a mystery," Sembly said. "I'm really looking forward to that Bowman-Jeffersonville game and want to see how Gary Wallace does against Country Day."
Sembly said he's also interested to see how the three Indianapolis Public School programs in the challenge -- Arlington, Northwest and Tech -- perform against outside competition.
Arlington's 5-10 senior Josh Johnson is averaging 29 points a game, and Northwest has a pair of promising freshman guards in Justin Baker and Mike Jones.
"With our freshman backcourt, we're going to have some good nights and some bad nights," Northwest coach Mosi Barnes said of his 3-3 team. "Everything for our future is built around those guys. You have to live with the good and bad right now, but I would say overall that the adjustment to varsity ball has gone pretty well."
Hall of Fame Classic
Tickets are on sale for next week's City Securities Hall of Fame Classic at New Castle Fieldhouse.
The girls tournament Dec. 29 features Jeffersonville (8-0) vs. Brownsburg (9-2) at 11 a.m., with Carmel (12-0) vs. Evansville Memorial (8-0) to follow. The consolation game is 6 p.m. and the championship game at 8.
The Washington (5-2) and Center Grove (5-2) boys play at 11 a.m. Dec. 30, with Bloomington South (7-0) and Warsaw (5-0) to follow.
Tickets are available through participating schools, the Indiana Basketball Hall of Fame, and at the fieldhouse on the day of the games. For more information, call (765) 529-1891 or e-mail info@hoopshall.com.

description.hltext_display: Elförbrukningen nära rekordnivåer
description.author: Corren.se
description.content:
Kylan får elförbrukningen att skjuta i höjden. I morse förbrukades över 26 300 Mwh per timme. Prognoserna talar om över 27 000 Mwh senare i eftermiddag, vilket i sådana fall skulle innebära en tangering av den högsta förbrukningen hittills. Det tidigare rekordet är från januari 2001.
Men det är ingen fara för effektbrist i dagsläget sedan Oskarshamn nu fått fart på sin reaktor 3.

description.hltext_display: Bayern ohne Lahm? Nicht mal eine Minute!!
description.content: Er ist der Dauerbrenner des FC Bayern: Philipp Lahm spielt seit 1995 - mit nur einer zweijährigen Unterbrechung - für den Rekordmeister. Und soll dies noch eine ganze Weile tun: Bis 2016 hat das Münchner Eigengewächs inzwischen seinen Vertrag verlängert. Die Bayern ohne Lahm - kaum mehr vorstellbar. Nicht einmal für eine Minute! Denn wie schon in der gesamten letzten Saison bestritt der WM-Kapitän der Nationalelf auch in der Hinrunde sämtliche Bundesligaspiele von der ersten bis zur letzten Minute. [ weiter... ]

description.hltext_display: Eckoh PLC Eckoh secures contract for Premier Inn
description.content: Eckoh plc ("Eckoh" or "the Company") Eckoh secures significant three-year contract to provide speech recognition services to Premier Inn Premier Inn's parent company, Whitbread plc, awards three-year contract for Eckoh's fully PCI DSS (Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard) compliant service Eckoh, the UK's leading developer of speech recognition solutions for customer contact centres, today announces that it has secured a new three-year contract with Whitbread plc ("Whitbread"), making Whitbread one of Eckoh's largest clients to date. The contract is for the provision of a fully PCI DSS compliant speech enabled reservations and cancellations service to Whitbread's hotel brand, Premier Inn. The service, due to be deployed in March 2011, will provide Premier Inn customers with the ability to book and cancel rooms at any Premier Inn hotel throughout the UK. Whitbread is the UK's largest hotel and restaurant company, operating market-leading businesses in the budget hotels and restaurant sectors. Premier Inn is the UK's largest and fastest-growing hotel brand, with 578 hotels and more than 40,000 rooms across the UK and Ireland. It is expected to add a further 1,905 rooms over the next six months, with the focus on increasing market share and continuing to meet the needs of its customers. Eckoh is a fully PCI DSS compliant Level 1 Service Provider, processing over GBP200 million payments annually. The Company's industry-leading VoiceXML platform provides the capability and scalability to meet Premier Inn's future growth requirements. Kenny King, Head of Procurement, Information Systems of Whitbread, said: "We chose Eckoh because they proved to us that they could provide us with the highest level of PCI DSS compliant infrastructure and the ability to scale up, both of which are crucial to our growth plans and commitment to delivering outstanding customer service." Nik Philpot, Chief Executive Officer of Eckoh, commented: "We are delighted to have been chosen by Whitbread to host Premier Inn's new booking service in our PCI compliant environment, which will ensure that their customers' cardholder data will be managed securely and they will receive the best possible customer service. This is the second significant contract win for our newly accredited service and, as such, is an affirmation of our strategy to invest in achieving the highest level of compliance. The Eckoh platform will provide Whitbread with the scalability to deliver on their growth strategy and, combined with our PCI compliant infrastructure, will ensure their customers' cardholder data is properly protected at all times." Ends Enquiries: Eckoh plc Nik Philpot, Chief Executive Officer Adam Moloney, Group Finance Director www.eckoh.com Tel: 01442 458 300 Corfin Public Relations Harry Chathli, Claire Norbury Tel: 020 7596 2860 Singer Capital Markets Shaun Dobson Tel: 020 3205 7500 Notes to Editors: About Eckoh plc Eckoh plc (AIM: ECK) is the UK's leading developer of speech recognition for customer contact centres. Eckoh's sophisticated technology enables routine enquiries, transactions or payments to be processed without the need for the consumer to actually talk to an agent. This significantly reduces its clients' operational costs, whilst freeing up agents to deal with more complex enquiries. Eckoh is the largest developer of such hosted services in the UK. Eckoh's secure and resilient infrastructure has the scalability to handle over 650,000 calls an hour and up to 8,000 calls simultaneously, which means calls can always be answered no matter how unpredictable the circumstances. For more information, visit: www.eckoh.com About Whitbread PLC Whitbread PLC is the UK's largest hotel and restaurant company operating market-leading businesses in the budget hotels and restaurant sectors. Its brands include Premier Inn, Beefeater, Table Table, Brewers Fayre, Taybarns and Costa Coffee. Whitbread PLC employs over 34,000 people and serves 9 million customers every month in its 2,000 outlets across the UK. Whitbread PLC is a FTSE 100 company, listed on the London Stock Exchange. It is also a member of the FTSE4Good Index. For more information, visit: www.whitbread.co.uk About Premier Inn Award-winning Premier Inn is the UK's largest and fastest-growing hotel brand with 578 budget hotels and more than 40,000 rooms across the UK and Ireland. Premier Inn bedrooms feature en-suite bathroom, TV with Freeview, and WiFi internet access. Premier Inn offers customers a money-back 'Good Night Guarantee' of a good quality room, comfortable surroundings and friendly service, which is unique amongst Britain's leading hotel chains. All Premier Inns feature a bar and restaurant; situated inside the hotel or adjacent, offering a wide range of food choices. Premier Inn was the first Britain-wide hotel group to sign up with national tourist board VisitBritain; this means Premier Inn is now part of a new quality assessment scheme, specially created for budget accommodation. In 2008 Premier Inn launched in Dubai and will be opening in India later this year. On a domestic front, Premier Inn is set to be the largest provide of budget hotels in London by the 2012 Olympics. For more information, visit: www.premierinn.com. This information is provided by RNS The company news service from the London Stock Exchange END CNTKMMZZMMZGGZZ

description.hltext_display: نواب?التضامن مع الوسمي: لا لسياسة السحل والأحذية الثقيلة
三亚一打工仔被割伤获赔万元 刚签协议就反悔[图]
description.content:
事起 小伙子玻璃店内受工伤
数月前，在三亚某玻璃店打工的小余工作时被割伤颈部，拿了老板给的医药费和赔偿金后，双方签下一纸协议。近日，小余又从湖北老家来到三亚，要求老板易先生再次给予赔偿。易先生认为当初的协议已经生效，遂拒绝出示企业资料进行工伤鉴定。
12月15日，商报记者接到小余的投诉，称自己在三亚打工期间受伤，老板现在不愿做工伤鉴定。小余介绍，他于今年2月来到三亚，并在易先生的盛宏玻璃店内打工，8月份，他在店内搬运玻璃时滑倒，被割伤颈部，当时被送往医院救治，事后接受了易先生的10000元赔偿，随后回了湖北老家。但最近他感觉受伤部位发麻，担心留下后遗症，又返回三亚找老板索赔。
结果 双方立字据老板已赔偿
当天下午，记者找到三亚盛宏玻璃店。提起此事，易先生也是一肚子苦水，他称，他和小余是湖北同乡，还有些亲戚关系。当初小余在店里时虽然没有签订正规劳动合同，但每月2000元的工资一直是按时按额支付。
易先生说，当天事发后，他马上叫人把小余送到医院，前后近万元的治疗费用也全部是店里出的。事后，小余要求整容并索赔，双方到劳动部门仲裁，劳动部门要求易先生给付小余2-3个月的工资作为赔偿，他给了小余10000元钱，当做务工补偿和营养费，双方还立下了一份字据，上面写道“小余出现任何问题，不再找玻璃店”。
易先生说：“这行(玻璃店)工作中有危险，工人也经常碰伤，换作没良心的老板，根本不会做出这样的赔偿，我们已经仁至义尽了。”但事情并没有像他想的一样圆满结束，小余10月离开三亚，12月又返回海南，并要求他再次做出赔偿，这让他感觉难以接受。
焦点 律师建议走法律程序解决
据了解，目前小余正在做工伤鉴定，但易先生却拒绝出具企业资料和相关意见，双方几次协商不下。
相关律师表示，小余受伤是工伤无疑，双方的字据也具备一定的法律效力，目前这种情况，可先通过劳动仲裁部门协调，如协调未果，建议双方通过法律途径解决争议。(记者 王春棠 李佳 摄影报道)

description.hltext_display: 中国已有4573万农民工纳入城镇职工医保范围
description.content:
中新网12月22日电 十一届全国人大常委会第十八次会议今日举行第二次全体会议，听取国务院关于深化医药卫生体制改革工作情况等工作报告。报告指出，中国已有4573万农民工已纳入城镇职工医保范围。
2009年4月，《中共中央国务院关于深化医药卫生体制改革的意见》和《国务院关于印发医药卫生体制改革近期重点实施方案(2009-2011年)的通知》相继发布，医药卫生体制改革启动实施，明确了到2020年基本建立覆盖全体居民的基本医疗卫生制度。
国家发展和改革委员会主任张平在报告中指出，医改实施以来，各项重点改革稳步推进，成效逐步显现。
一是着力扩大医保覆盖面，从制度上实现基本医保全覆盖。 张平表示，提前一年在全国范围内推开城镇居民医保，将在校大学生纳入城镇居民医保范围。中央投入509亿元，解决了历史遗留的600多万关闭破产国有企业退休人员参保问题，同时统筹解决了200多万其他关闭破产企业退休人员和困难企业职工参保问题。4573万农民工也已纳入城镇职工医保范围。
张平称，截至10月底，城镇职工和城镇居民医保参保人数增加到4.24亿人；新农合参合率持续稳定在90%以上，参合人数达到8.35亿人。
二是不断提高保障水平，保障范围从重点保大病逐步向门诊小病延伸。
张平表示，2010年，将各级政府对新农合和城镇居民医保补助标准提高到每人每年不低于120元，城镇职工医保、城镇居民医保和新农合最高支付限额普遍提高到当地职工年平均工资、居民可支配收入和农民人均纯收入的6倍左右，多数地区政策范围内住院费用报销比例分别达到75%、60%和60%。超过50%的统筹地区开展了城镇居民医保和新农合门诊统筹，泰州、珠海等地还对城镇职工医保门诊统筹进行了积极探索。
三是不断完善城乡救助制度，救助对象从五保、低保对象扩大到其他特殊困难群体，在住院救助的基础上兼顾门诊。
张平指出，2010年中央财政用于城乡医疗救助的资金达到110亿元，比2008年翻了一番。截至9月底，今年已累计资助4912万人参保参合，直接救助1026万人次。今年6月还启动了提高农村儿童先天性心脏病、白血病等重大疾病保障水平试点工作，已保障2300多名农村儿童患者得到及时救治。
四是提高经办管理和服务水平，方便群众就医结算。
张平称，大力推广“一卡通”等办法，90.6%的城镇基本医疗保险统筹地区实现了医疗费用即时结算；89.1%的新农合统筹地区首先实现县域内医疗费用的即时结算，并分别有1/2和1/3的统筹地区实现了地市级和省级医疗费用即时结算。
张平表示，此外，还出台跨制度、跨地区医保关系转移接续办法及经办流程，改进以异地安置退休人员为重点的医保异地就医结算服务，长三角等地区建立了异地就医区域协作机制，广受关注的医保关系转移接续和异地就医结算问题正逐步解决。(据中国网文字直播整理）

description.hltext_display: Στο αρχείο τέθηκε η έρευνα σε βάρος του Γ. Σανιδά για την υπόθεση Βατοπεδίου

description.hltext_display: Latvijā darbojas 64 uzņēmumi, kuru nosaukumā ir vārds "rūķis"
description.author: Nozare.lv
description.content:
, kā arī 54 uzņēmumi, kuru nosaukumā ir vārds "rūķītis", liecina Uzņēmumu reģistru apkalpojošās firmas SIA "Lursoft" apkopotā informācija.Patlaban Latvijā reģistrēti deviņi aktīvi uzņēmumi, kuru nosaukumos minēts vārds "ziema", divi uzņēmumi, kuru nosaukumā minēts "sniegs", trīs uzņēmumi ar vārdu "Ziemassvētki", septiņi uzņēmumi ar vārdu "dāvana" un 63 uzņēmumi ar vārdu "egle".Apkopojot datus par organizāciju amatpersonām un dalībniekiem, kuru uzvārdos ietverts ar svētkiem saistīts vārds, "Lursoft" secināja, ka visbiežāk uzņēmējdarbībā iesaistījušās personas ar uzvārdu Egle. Patlaban "Lursoft" datu bāzē reģistrēti 180 uzņēmumi, kuros kāda no amatpersonām ir ar šādu uzvārdu.
Mazāk populāri uzvārdi starp amatpersonām un dalībniekiem ir Ziema, Sniegs un Rūķītis. Patlaban datu bāzē fiksētas deviņas amatpersonas ar uzvārdu Sniegs un desmit dalībnieki ar uzvārdu Rūķis.

description.hltext_display: DGAP-Adhoc: Softing Group - New Order from Premium Car Manufacturer
description.content: Softing AG / Key word(s): Development of Sales/Forecast 22.12.2010 09:47 Dissemination of an Ad hoc announcement according to § 15 WpHG, transmitted by DGAP - a company of EquityStory AG. The issuer is solely responsible for the content of this announcement. --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Softing Automotive Electronics GmbH, a 100% subsidiary of Softing AG, has acquired another large order from a very well recognized German car manufacturer. This comes in addition to the recently reported contracts. Such, Softing has gained access to another premium car manufacturer. The long-term contract to develop and supply diagnostic and measuring equipment will show in the numbers of Softing Automotive Electronics starting in 2011. The resulting volume from project and product sales is expected to amount for several million EUR. About Softing: Softing is a global provider of hardware and software for industrial automation and automotive electronics. The company develops high-quality standard technology products in close cooperation with its customers. Softing Automotive Electronics GmbH is a specialist for the communication with and between embedded automotive electronic control units. Our services and products are used in the development, in the production and in the diagnostic of vehicles. The main customers of Softing Automotive Electronics are the large automotive and truck manufacturers and their suppliers. 22.12.2010 DGAP's Distribution Services include Regulatory Announcements, Financial/Corporate News and Press Releases. Media archive at www.dgap-medientreff.de and www.dgap.de --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Language: English Company: Softing AG Richard-Reitzner-Allee 6 85540 Haar Deutschland Phone: +49 (0)89 456 56-333 Fax: +49 (0)89 456 56-399 E-mail: InvestorRelations@softing.com Internet: www.softing.com ISIN: DE0005178008 WKN: 517800 Listed: Regulierter Markt in Frankfurt (Prime Standard); Freiverkehr in Berlin, Düsseldorf, Hamburg, München, Stuttgart End of Announcement DGAP News-Service ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

description.hltext_display: Dombrovskis neizslēdz nodokļu paaugstināšanu
description.content:
Ministru prezidents Valdis , veicot papildus konsolidācijas pasākumus.Dombrovskis trešdien LNT raidījumā "900 sekundes" teica, ka papildus konsolidācijas pasākumi skars praktiski visas jomas. "Nevar izslēgt arī pasākumus ieņēmumu daļā," teica premjers. Viņš nevēlējās nosaukt jomas, kuras konsolidācijas pasākumi neskars. "Es pagaidām negribētu vilkt kādas sarkanās līnijas. Jāļauj Finanšu ministrijai sagatavot priekšlikumus," teica premjers.Viņš stāstīja, ka Finanšu ministrijai ir dots uzdevums gatavot papildus konsolidācijas pasākumus. "Jau nākamā gada sākumā tas būs dienaskārtības jautājums - gan par apjomu, par ko turpinās sarunas ar starptautiskajiem aizdevējiem, gan par konkrētiem pasākumiem," teica premjers.Dombrovskis atzina, ka vēl skaidrības par to, vai tiešām papildus konsolidācijas pasākumi būs jāveic tieši 50 miljonu latu apmērā nav. "Mums ar aizdevējiem notiek diskusija gan par summu, gan par ieskaitāmiem pasākumiem. Summu ir iespējams samazināt, tas viss būs sarunu jautājums pārskata misijā," teica valdības vadītājs.
Premjers arī stāstīja, ka pašreiz ar aizdevējiem tiek saskaņots pārskata misijas laiks, kas sākumā bija paredzēts janvārī. "Pašreiz tas laiks tiek saskaņots un precīzs laiks nav zināms," piebilda Dombrovskis.
Jau vēstīts, ka Saeima pirmdien, 20.decembrī, ārkārtas sēdē pēc gandrīz astoņu stundu debatēm galīgajā lasījumā pieņēma 2011.gada valsts budžetu, kurā nodrošināta konsolidācija 290,7 miljonu latu apmērā. Par budžetu balsoja 54 deputāti, pret bija 38 tautas kalpi, bet atturējās viens.
Starptautiskie aizdevēji gan jau ir paziņojuši, ka ar šo apmēru nepietiek un Latvijai 2011.gadā budžetā būs jānodrošina papildu fiskālā konsolidācija 50 miljonu latu apmērā, jo aizdevēji ir neapmierināti ar iemaksu likmes otrajā pensiju līmenī nepalielināšanu un minimālās algas celšanu. Tādējādi Dombrovskis solījis gada sākumā budžetā veikt grozījumus.

description.hltext_display: Latvijā zemākais alus patēriņš Baltijas valstīs
description.author: Diena.lv
description.content:
Latvijā ir zemākais alus patēriņš uz vienu iedzīvotāju Baltijas valstīs, turklāt tas ievērojami atpaliek no vidējā alus patēriņa Eiropas Savienībā (ES), liecina Eiropas alus darītāju asociācijas apkopotie dati.Latvijā alus patēriņš uz vienu iedzīvotāju ir 62,9 litri gadā, kamēr Lietuvā un Igaunijās tas ir attiecīgi 83,4 litri un 85,4 litri. Turklāt Latvijas alus patēriņš ievērojami atpaliek arī no vidējā rādītāja ES, kas ir 75,3 litri.
2009.gadā Latvijas alus patēriņš sasniedzis rekordzemu rādītāju un nokrities pat līdz 2003.gada līmenim. Vēl sliktāki rādītāji bija vien 2004.gadā, kad alus patēriņš gadā uz vienu iedzīvotāju Latvijā veidoja 58,1 litrus. Ziedu laikus Latvijas alus nozare piedzīvoja 2007.gadā, kad alus patēriņš pieauga līdz 70 litriem.
Visaugstākais alus patēriņš uz vienu iedzīvotāju ES pēc Eiropas alus darītāju asociācijas datiem 2009.gadā bija Čehijā - 159,3 litri, tai sekoja Vācija ar 109,6 litriem un Austrija ar 106,2 litriem. Zemākais alus patēriņš ES vērojams Itālijā un Francijā, kurās tradicionāli lielā godā ir vīns."Lai gan alus darīšana Latvijā tiek uzskatīta par vienu no tradicionālajām nozarēm, statistika liecina, ka mūsu kaimiņi ir lielāki alus cienītāji. Lielu ietekmi uz Latvijas alus nozares attīstību atstāja krīze ekonomikā, kā arī nozarei nelabvēlīgā nodokļu politika," skaidro Aldaris un Latvijas alus darītāju asociācijas valdes priekšsēdētāja Ināra � ure.Starp Baltijas valstīm Latvija bijusi arī kūtrākā alus eksportētāja - attiecīgi 2009.gadā eksportēti 125 tūkstoši hektolitru alus, kamēr Igaunija eksportējusi 262 tūkstošus hektolitru, bet Lietuva 162 tūkstošus hektolitru.
Pēc Eiropas alus darītāju asociācijas datiem 2009.gadā Latvijā importēti 176 tūkstoši hektolitru, kamēr Igaunijā 192 tūkstoši hektolitru un Lietuvā 292 tūkstoši hektolitru alus.
Kopumā ES kopš globālās krīzes ekonomikā ievērojami samazinājies gan kopējais patēriņa, gan saražotā alus apjoms, nokrītot pat zem 2003.gada līmeņa.

description.hltext_display: Analītiķi: Latvijas IKP nākamajā gadā pieaugs par 3,5-5%
description.content:
Latvijas iekšzemes kopprodukts (IKP) nākamajā gadā pieaugs par 3,5-5%, aģentūrai BNS prognozēja banku analītiķi.Pesimistiskākais nākamā gada IKP pieauguma prognozēs bija "Citadele Asset Management" Tirgus analīzes daļas vadītājs Zigurds Vaikulis, kurš aģentūrai BNS sacīja, ka Latvijas reālā IKP apmērs 2011.gadā pieaugs par aptuveni 3,5%."Pieņemot, ka nākamgad situācija ārējos tirgos attīstās pēc pasaules analītiķu bāzes scenārija - tas ir, ekonomikas turpina lēnām augt, - saglabāsies labvēlīgais ārējais fons. Tomēr lielāks svars kopējās tendencēs būs iekšējiem faktoriem," teica Vaikulis.Viņš uzsvēra, ka 2010.gadā vairumā rādītāju (bezdarbs, algas, veikalu apgrozījums) bija vērojams pagrieziens pareizajā virzienā un, ja līdzšinējais kredītu atmaksas process Latvijā kļūs mazāk intensīvs, kam ir cerības, šī tendence turpināsies."Ja vietējais kredītu tirgus būs tikpat ierobežojošs kā šogad un/vai notiks satricinājumi ārējos tirgos, mūsu IKP pieauguma prognoze (+3,5%) diez vai tiks sasniegta," vienlaikus atzina Vaikulis."SEB bankas" makroekonomikas eksperts Dainis Gašpuitis aģentūrai BNS pastāstīja, ka nākamajā gadā Latvijas ekonomikas pieaugums turpināsies un to nodrošinās turpmāka fokusēšanās uz eksportu un arī iekšējā patēriņa atkopšanās, kas gan nesolās būt straujš."Runājot par turpmākajām tendencēm, jāapzinās, ka vēl daudzus turpmākos gadus procesus ekonomikā pavadīs nenoteiktība. Tas ietver pietiekami daudz risku, no kuriem būs atkarīga izaugsmes scenāriju (gan pozitīvāku, gan negatīvāku) īstenošanās Latvijas ekonomikā. Būtiskākie riski saistās ar parādu krīzi eiro zonā, ASV stimulēšanas programmu īstenošanas rezultātiem un sekām, kā arī to, cik prasmīgi tiks risināta Ķīnas ekonomikas pārkaršana. No iekšējiem faktoriem aktivitāti slāpējoša ietekme būs nodokļu sloga pieaugumam un budžeta izdevumu samazināšanai. Taču Latvijā turpinās ieplūst būtiski Eiropas Savienības (ES) fondu resursi, kuru efektīva un savlaicīga izmantošana būs ļoti nozīmīgs stimuls tautsaimniecībai. Arī investīciju ieplūde nākamgad aktivizēsies. 2011.gada izaugsme varētu sasniegt 4%," klāstīja Gašpuitis.
Viņš norādīja, ka 2011.gadā izaugsmes galvenie virzītāji saglabāsies tie, kas ir iezīmējušies šogad. Nākamgad turpinās attīstīties rūpniecības, tirdzniecības un tūrisma jomas. Rūpniecības izaugsme gan sagaidāma nedaudz mērenākos tempos, jo arvien aktuālāki būs jaudu palielināšanas un attīstības jautājumi. Arī tranzītam ir visi priekšnosacījumi izaugsmei, bet liela loma būs politiskiem faktoriem, tostarp starpvalstu attiecībām u.tml. Tāpat komercpakalpojumi un finanšu sektors uzlabos savu veikumu salīdzinājumā ar iepriekšējo gadu. Nelielu izaugsmi varam sagaidīt arī veselības, izglītības jomās. Savukārt kā viena no pēdējām no mīnusiem izies būvniecība - tā kā šī joma vairāk atspoguļo ekonomikā notiekošo, tās strauju atgūšanos nākamgad vēl neredzēs, un to joprojām uzturēs valsts un pašvaldību īstenotie projekti."Samazinoties peripetijām ap budžetu, svarīgi ir aktivizēt darbu pie investīciju piesaistes un turpināt uzlabot komercdarbības vidi. Tajā pašā laikā Latvijai nepieciešama aktīvāka pozicionēšanās noteiktās jomās, ne tikai tranzīta jomā. Liels traucēklis ir skaidru akcentu jeb prioritāšu, kas būtu zināmas arī ārpus Latvijas, trūkums. Tā dēļ investīcijas nereti aiziet uz valstīm, kur ir daudz skaidrāka investīciju politika un labāk sagatavota platforma investīciju ienākšanai," paskaidroja Gašpuitis.Arī "Swedbank" vecākais ekonomists Dainis Stikuts aģentūrai BNS sacīja, ka 2011.gadā IKP izaugsme būs diezgan strauja un varētu sasniegt apmēram 4%."Lielu daļu no pieauguma izskaidros bāzes efekts, kas būs jūtams investīciju un eksporta pieaugumos. Tomēr tik un tā ekonomika attīstīsies diezgan dinamiski. Aktīvākās būs eksportējošās nozares, piemēram, koksnes, metālu un ķīmisko preču eksports. Tomēr atkopties sāks arī būvniecības un iekšzemes tirdzniecības nozares, kas šogad būs sasniegušas zemāko izlaides līmeni. Bremzējošā ietekme būs vēl tikai nozarēs, kuras būtisku finansējumu saņem no valsts budžeta," klāstīja Stikuts.Savukārt "DnB NORD Bankas" ekonomikas eksperts Pēteris Strautiņš aģentūrai BNS prognozēja, ka IKP pieaugums nākamgad būs tuvu 5%, ja vien eiro zonas valstu parādu krīze nenovedīs pie ļoti lieliem satricinājumiem, kas iedzītu recesijā visas Eiropas ekonomiku."Ja tā turpinās attīstīties ar bāzes scenārijos prognozēto ātrumu, kas būtu tikai nedaudz mazāks kā šogad, tad Latvijas izaugsme pārsniegs budžetā ietvertās prognozes. Tā kā viegli prognozējami riski parasti finanšu krīzes neizraisa, jo tie tiek novērsti, tad jādomā, ka labvēlīgā scenārija iespēja nākamgad ir augstāka nekā nelabvēlīgā," teica Strautiņš.Viņš norādīja, ka situācija galvenajās tautsaimniecības jomās arī 2011.gadā būs kontrastaina, taču pieaugums sagaidāms visur, izņemot izglītību, valsts pārvaldi, visticamāk, arī medicīnas aprūpi."Rūpniecībā arī nākamgad sagaidu ar divciparu skaitli rakstāmu pieaugumu, tiesa gan, mazāku nekā šogad. Ja šogad galvenais nozares motors bija koki, tad nākamgad tie būs dzelži. Tāpat kāpums sagaidāms citās lielajās nozarēs - transportā, komercpakalpojumos. Arī tirdzniecībā, kur atšķirībā no rūpniecības pieaugums nedaudz paātrināsies. Celtniecība nākamgad izkļūs no mīnusiem, pateicoties investīcijām rūpniecībā, lielākai Eiropas Savienības fondu plūsmai ceļu būvē. Var pienākt brīdis, iespējams, 2012.gadā, kad tā būs straujāk augošā ekonomikas nozare, tas atkarīgs no dažādu projektu īstenošanas gaitas," atzina Strautiņš.Aģentūra BNS jau vēstīja, ka Latvijas IKP šogad deviņos mēnešos salīdzinājumā ar pagājušā gada deviņiem mēnešiem samazinājies par 1,5%, savukārt gada trešajā ceturksnī, pēc sezonāli neizlīdzinātiem datiem, IKP pieaudzis par 2,9%, salīdzinot ar pagājušā gada attiecīgo laika periodu.

description.hltext_display: Kenton County passes amended smoking ban
description.author: Kimberly Holmes &ndash
description.content:
Kenton County passed an amended smoking ban on Tuesday.
The smoking ban passed by the Kenton County Fiscal Court on Tuesday still allows for smoking to take place in bars and adult establishments -- essentially a bar where customers are at least 18 years old and workers are at least 18 years old.
Other establishments will not be allowed to have smoking indoors. Restaurants that have bars in them will be allowed to have smoking only if the bar is in a separate location with a separate ventilation system.
Jump to full article

description.hltext_display: Demam Bola Dorong Penjualan Paket Wisata
湖南“爬杆大盗”在洪灾中趁火打劫 偷盗变压器
description.content:
文昌警方抓获盗窃航天发射基地变压器及东环铁路电缆疑犯5人，该团伙作案60余起，盗窃变压器26台
犯罪嫌疑人周某山
犯罪嫌疑人彭某兵
10多名湖南籍男子结伙在文昌、琼海、昌江、海口、五指山等地疯狂盗窃变压器及电缆线等电力设备，据不完全统计，一年时间，该团伙作案60余起，其中盗窃变压器26台，被盗电力设备案值80多万元，其中包括盗窃国家重点工程文昌航天发射基地变压器及东环铁路的电缆。文昌警方经缜密侦查，日前破获这起特大盗窃电力设备案，抓获犯罪嫌疑人5名。
今年5月份以来，文昌市内及周边乡镇变压器、电缆线频频被盗，给群众生产生活造成巨大损失，群众反映十分强烈。案发后，文昌市公安局迅速介入调查，发现被盗变压器及电缆线案发现场地理位置均较偏僻，在调查中未找到目击者，办案一时陷入僵局，在警方介入调查后仍接到类似报警。
十一期间，我省普降大暴雨，文昌遭遇特大洪灾。正当全省上下忙于抢险救灾时，文昌市内又有多处变压器遭不法分子盗窃。10月上旬，清澜镇一个被洪水冲倒的变压器铜芯被盗;10月17日，龙楼供电所一台崭新的变压器被不法分子破坏，铜芯被盗走。
不法分子趁水灾疯狂盗窃变压器，造成部分地区停电，给灾后重建工作带来巨大影响。为打击不法分子嚣张气焰，专案组再次加大侦查力度，在多个路段日夜设卡进行盘查。
10月22日凌晨4时许，在抱罗镇抱翁公路冒雨设卡的民警发现两名男子向卡点走来。在盘查中，民警发现两人操外地口音，神色慌张，行迹十分可疑，两人身上带有手套，衣服上还有很浓的机油味，这引起民警的警觉。民警将两人带回抱罗派出所进一步审查。
经调查，发现两名男子分别为彭某兵(46岁)、孙某兵(41岁)，均为湖南省保靖县人，都是来琼务工人员。在审讯中，犯罪嫌疑人彭某兵交代了其伙同孙某兵、王某旺(湖南古丈县人，在逃)、彭某刚(湖南保靖县人)、“方老五”(在逃)、石某龙(湖南保靖县人，在逃)等人，于10月21日晚21时许，在文城镇一工地盗窃变压器的犯罪事实。
10月23日上午8时许，市公安局刑侦大队安其敏副大队长率领专案组民警在昌洒派出所的配合下，在昌洒镇抓获犯罪嫌疑人彭某刚、刘某，并在彭某刚住处缴获一辆作案用小轿车。经审讯，犯罪嫌疑人彭某刚对其伙同在逃的黄某、彭某清、方某平、彭某兵等人盗窃变压器及电缆犯罪事实供认不讳。随后，民警在昌洒一废品收购站抓获涉嫌销赃的收购站老板周某山。
经文昌警方调查，该团伙成员均为湖南籍，自2009年11月到2010年10月在文昌作案37起、琼海市作案15起、海口市作案4起(盗割东环铁路电缆2起)、昌江县作案2起及五指山等地盗窃电力设备，共计60余起，其中盗窃变压器26台，被盗电力设备案值80多万元，其中包括盗窃国家重点工程文昌航天发射基地变压器及东环铁路电缆。
目前，犯罪嫌疑人彭某兵、孙某兵、彭某刚、刘某及周某山均已被文昌市公安局刑拘，其他涉案人员正在紧张追逃中。(记者良子实习生王文瑞摄影报道)

description.hltext_display: Eindhoven Airport: recordaantal passagiers
description.content:
EINDHOVEN (ANP) Eindhoven Airport heeft dit jaar de grens van twee miljoen passagiers doorbroken. Dit jaar vlogen 2,14 miljoen passagiers van en naar Eindhoven Airport. Dat is een kwart meer dan in 2009 (1.712.000). Dat liet de regionale luchthaven woensdag weten.
Volgens de regionale luchthaven is een toename van het aantal nieuwe bestemmingen de belangrijkste oorzaak van de groei. Vanaf Eindhoven Airport kan worden gevlogen naar 32 lijndienstbestemmingen. Eind 2009 waren dat er nog 23.
Voor volgend jaar verwacht Eindhoven Airport 15 procent meer passagiers te vervoeren.

description.hltext_display: Aachener Trio gibt Vollgas
description.content: "Viele Spieler waren in der letzten Saison verletzt oder haben noch gar nicht in der 2. Liga gespielt, und müssen nun bei uns Vollgas geben", sagte kürzlich Aachens Manager Erik Meijer hinsichtlich seiner Verletztenmisere. Dabei wird er besonders an seine beiden Spieler Tobias Feisthammel und Marco Höger gedacht haben. Beide Akteure fielen vor dieser Saison eher in die Kategorie der "Nobodys". Und sind nun ebenso wie Timo Achenbach aus dem Aachener Spiel nicht mehr wegzudenken. [ weiter... ]

description.hltext_display: EBM överklagar friande Carnegiedom
description.author: Corren.se
description.content:
Ekobrottsmyndigheten (EBM) har överklagat den dom där Stockholms tingsrätt helt frikänner tre före detta värdepappershandlare på Carnegie, som åtalats för grov otillbörlig marknadspåverkan.
I sitt överklagande begär åklagaren Yngve Rydberg att hovrätten utser en ledamot med särskilda kunskaper om handeln med finansiella instrument.
Enligt Rydberg har männen fifflat med optionskurser, men tingsrätten fann att deras handel varit legitim.

description.hltext_display: لماذا صمت المجلس ورئيسه على حادثة الأربعاء؟!
Toshiba lanceert brilvrije 3D-televisie
description.content:
TOKIO (ANP) - Het Japanse elektronicaconcern Toshiba heeft woensdag in Japan de eerste driedimensionale televisie gelanceerd waarbij kijkers geen gebruik hoeven te maken van een speciaal brilletje. Dat heeft Toshiba woensdag bekendgemaakt.
De Japanse consument moet een bedrag van 119.800 yen (1089 euro) neertellen voor de nieuwe 3D-televisie. Kijkers hoeven daarbij geen gebruik te maken van een speciale bril die het mogelijk maakt om diepte te creëren.

description.hltext_display: A commandant who's out of step with new law
description.author: World's Editorial Writers
description.content: I am a fan of the old World War II movies, the ones where the platoon was composed of typical Americans, Hollywood-style. There was a guy named Farmer and one called Preacher and another called Brooklyn (who was killed shortly after receiving a salami from home), no blacks and, of course, an officer who was good-looking and clearly a white Anglo-Saxon Protestant of the John Wayne variety. Now, of course, we would have to add a gay soldier. I fear for him. He'll need someone to watch his back. The repeal of the odious "don't ask, don't tell" law has been 17 years in the making. It could have been done much sooner had it not been for the political cowardice and/or ignorance of much of Congress and some of the military. The nation as a whole was way out in front of these institutions, having learned from their own kids and society in general that gays and lesbians were not drooling perverts but human beings composed of a different - not better and not worse - sexuality. Most of us know this now. There's good reason to believe, however, that this lesson has not been universally learned. In the run-up to the vote in the Senate, Gen. James Amos, the Marine Corps commandant, showed how he felt about the prospect of open homosexuals serving in the Marines. He was particularly concerned about combat situations where, he thought, gays might be "a distraction." "Mistakes and inattention or distractions cost Marines' lives," Amos said. This was not the first time the general had expressed his doubts. Earlier, he had talked about what might happen when his Marines were "laying out, sleeping alongside of one another and sharing death, fear and loss of brothers. I don't know what the effect of that will be on cohesion. I mean, that's what we're looking at. It's unit cohesion. It's combat effectiveness." It's easy enough to dismiss Amos, but his concerns fall within the realm of possibility. After all, being gay is a sexual matter and young people are nothing if not sexual. This is the way it is supposed to be. This is also the problem with having women in the armed services or, if you are a radical feminist, having men. Sooner or later, a certain amount of unacceptable harassment will occur, abuses will be committed and, just more innocently, plain hooking up is going to happen. We know this. But we know also that this can be managed - contained, limited. It takes education. It takes training. It takes leadership. This is what concerns me about Amos. His views are on the record. He sees gays as somewhat out of control, possibly holding hands in combat, sneaking into one another's bunks at night, being distracted just as the enemy is coming over the hill. Not only is this silly and based on an ignorant misconception of who most gays are, but it can be dealt with. Amos, though, is the wrong man to deal with it. His subordinates know what he thinks of gays. They know he has not an iota of sympathy for what might be their difficulties or any tolerance for their lifestyle. If I were gay, I would not want to work for the man - or serve under him. He is just one step short of being a bigot. The racial desegregation of the military in 1948 also produced much blather about unit cohesion. It is true, of course, that race is not about behavior, but it is also true that race is obvious, spotted clear across a room - or a dance hall or an NCO club - and can produce a violent reaction. (Remember, the South was still an apartheid nation back then.) The military managed because it was commanded to comply. The leadership came from President Truman. He liked to have his orders followed. The Marines of today know that virtually the entire Republican Party stood up for bigotry. The corps knows that some important senators - John McCain and Jon Kyl, to name two prominent ones - furiously fought to retain the status quo, always in the sainted cause of unit cohesion. (Kyl said repeal could "cost lives.") Marines know, too, that in surveys, those on the front lines are least supportive of having gays among them and they are also aware that their brass fought to keep "don't ask, don't tell." The issue for me, as for Gen. Amos, is unit cohesion. That's why he has to go.

description.hltext_display: Richtingloze handel op Europese markten
description.content:
AMSTERDAM (ANP) - De Europese aandelenbeurzen kwamen woensdagochtend nauwelijks van hun plaats bij gebrek aan richtinggevend nieuws. Volgens handelaren is het onderliggende sentiment echter positief, mede dankzij goede macro-economische cijfers en overnamenieuws dat dinsdag naar buiten kwam.
Na ruim een half uur handelen noteerde de AEX-index van meest verhandelde fondsen in Amsterdam 0,1 procent lager op 355,64 punten. Dat is iets meer dan 2 punten onder de hoogste stand dit jaar.
De MidKap-index van middelgrote fondsen steeg 0,1 procent tot 634,56 punten. De graadmeters in Frankfurt, Londen en Parijs stonden tot 0,2 procent in de min.
Chemieconcern DSM (min 0,7 procent) was een van de sterkste dalers in de AEX. Amerikaanse advocatenkantoren onderzoeken of DSM de aandeelhouders van Martek Biosciences genoeg betaalt voor hun stukken. Na de aankondiging dinsdag van de overname voor circa 1,1 miljard dollar steeg het aandeel DSM 3,9 procent.
Chipmachinefabrikant ASML was de sterkste stijger bij de hoofdfondsen met een winst van 1,2 procent. Branchegenoot ASMI, deel uitmakend van de MidKap, schoot 3,9 procent omhoog. Handelaren zagen geen directe aanleiding voor de winsten.
De Britse branchegenoot ARM won in Londen 8 procent na mediaberichten dat Microsoft werkt aan een versie van Windows voor tablet-pc's. ARM is een toeleverancier van de Amerikaanse softwaregigant.
Grondstofgerelateerde bedrijven zoals staalproducenten en mijnbouwers koersten lager vanwege winstnemingen. Een prijsdaling bij enkele metalen zette beleggers ertoe aan de in de afgelopen tijd opgebouwde winst te verzilveren. ArcelorMittal daalde 0,8 procent. De mijnbouwers BHP Billiton, Rio Tinto en Xstrata moesten tot 1,1 procent terug.
Shell stond 0,2 procent lager ondanks een verdere stijging van de olieprijs. Een vat ruwe olie van 159 liter werd verhandeld voor 90,15 dollar, 0,4 procent meer dan een dag eerder.
De euro noteerde 1,3135 dollar in vergelijking met 1,3140 dollar bij het slot van de Europese beurzen op dinsdag.

description.hltext_display: Opposition threatens court over NSW parliament hiatus
description.content: The NSW Government has prorogued the state's parliament. The Opposition claims the Premier is trying to avoid a potentially embarrassing inquiry into the state's electricity sell-off.

description.hltext_display: 卫留成：“十二五”海南一定会有不同寻常发展
description.content:
http://news.hainan.net/ 时间：2010-12-22 8:23:00 来源：南海网-海南日报
卫留成在全省市县委书记座谈会上强调
进一步解放思想 勇担风险和责任
为推进海南国际旅游岛建设创造性开展工作
罗保铭出席会议
“没有一点闯的精神，没有一点‘冒’的精神，没有一股气呀、劲呀，就走不出一条好路，走不出一条新路，就干不出新的事业。”在今天召开的全省市县委书记座谈会上，省委书记、省人大常委会主任卫留成和与会人员重温了小平同志的这段话。他指出，“十二五”期间海南有条件走得更好更快，他寄语各市县主要领导要具备勇担风险和责任的素质，进一步解放思想、发扬敢闯敢试的特区精神，结合海南省情和县情真抓实干创造性开展工作，积极推进海南国际旅游岛建设，努力实现海南“十二五”期间经济社会全面腾飞。
省委副书记、省长罗保铭，中央第四地方巡视组副组长马瑞民，省领导王为璐、肖若海、陈辞、谭力、姜斯宪、林方略、符跃兰、李国梁、张力夫，以及省长助理、省旅游委主任陆志远出席座谈会。
今天，全省18个市县的党委政府主要负责人及省直有关部门负责人共聚一堂，通过回顾梳理2010年工作得失交流了经验和体会。海口、文昌、东方、屯昌、保亭、澄迈、乐东、琼中、文昌等市县委书记及省财政厅、省住建厅、省国资委、省农垦总局的主要负责人分别从“治乱”、狠抓干部人事制度改革、创先争优活动、大力推进保障性住房建设、加快产业园区建设、帮助农民发展生产增收等方面作了精彩发言。
卫留成说，大家的发言令人鼓舞、深受教育，让人对海南今后的发展更加充满信心。在一一列举了各市县的工作亮点后，卫留成说，现在到市县调研最直观的感受是，各市县领导摆困难谈问题的少了，要钱要项目的少了，更多的是思路清晰、满腔热情地谈发展、谈规划、谈项目。在和老百姓交谈时，也很少听到抱怨，更多的是喜笑颜开夸党好、政府好。透过经济指标看，我省各市县发展形势喜人，“十一五”期间，我省所有市县的地方财政一般预算收入的增幅都在两倍以上，其中国定贫困县陵水黎族自治县的增幅更是高达15倍。今年又将有6个市县的地方财政一般预算收入增幅超过100%。发展条件相对较差的中西部地区发展加快，少数民族和贫困地区变化尤其明显。
卫留成说，这些变化来自于市县班子特别是主要领导的变化。首先是大家都在千方百计谋发展、心无旁骛促发展，精神面貌新，创先争优劲头足。其次是大家领导科学发展的能力明显增强，对市县经济社会健康发展发挥了重要的引领和领导作用。再次是大家逐步树立了求真务实、真抓实干、艰苦创业的思想作风。
卫留成认为，这些变化与省委切实贯彻落实中央关于加强党的建设、作风建设、班子建设等一系列方针政策密不可分。近年来，省委通过各种形式，不断加强对各级领导的思想作风教育，不断加大对各级干部的培训力度。特别在选好配强市县党委一把手上，省委下了很大功夫，把一大批政治上靠得住，工作上有能力，思想作风好，群众威信高，想干事、会干事、能干成事又不出事的领导干部选拔交流到市县主要领导干部岗位，从组织上对市县快速发展起到保证作用。通过各种方式的培训和发展思路教育，各市县理清发展思路，领导驾驭市场经济、领导科学发展的能力明显增强，各地还特别注重保持发展思路的稳定性和连续性，通过扎实的作风，一件一件地抓，一件一件地落实，取得了明显成效。卫留成强调指出，我省进一步完善省直管市县体制，给市县下放了197项行政权力，赋予了各市县地市级的管理权，使大家从不会用权、不敢用权到会用权、敢用权谋发展，从而增强了市县的发展活力，为市县谋发展、做决策、干事业提供了强大的推动力和支撑力。
卫留成进而指出，这些变化意味着省直管市县的体制优势进一步凸显;意味着市县领导班子在发展中不断进步不断成长，领导能力在日渐增强;意味着我省各市县经济发展在“十一五”打下了良好基础，发展势头喜人。他表示相信，海南经济社会全面腾飞指日可待，后发优势会很快得到显现，“十二五”时期的海南一定会有不同寻常的发展。
会议对明年全省各市县的乡镇换届工作及做好年末岁初各项工作提出要求。

description.hltext_display: رسالة إلى أعضاء مجلس الأمة
description.content:
جلسة مجلس الامة بتاريخ 2010-12-28 ستكون أخطر جلسة تشهدها الكويت ففيها سوف يتحدد مستقبل الكويت ومستقبل الديمقراطية ومصير الدستور فإما ان ينتفض المجلس لكرامته وموقعه كسلطة تشريعية رقابية ممثلة للشعب الكويتي كله حسب المادة السادسة من الدستور أو يفرط بقسمه وعهده على المحافظة على الدستور ويتحقق ما قاله البعض بأن انقلاباً على الدستور قد تم تنفيذه من قبل قوات عسكرية.
لا يهم رأينا في النواب الذين تم الاعتداء عليهم فمهما قيل عنهم الا انهم أصبحوا ممثلين لهذا الشعب في مجلس الامة والاعتداء عليهم هو اعتداء علينا جميعاً.
القدر أوجدكم يا نواب الامة في هذه المرحلة الخطرة المفصلية في تاريخ الكويت ـ والكويت الان أمانة بأيديكم وواجبكم الحفاظ على هذه الامانة الغالية التي ضحى الكثيرون ممن سبقوكم لايصالها لكم وعلى رأسهم المغفور له الشيخ عبدالله السالم الصباح فكونوا رجالا على قدر المسؤولية.
ولا تجعلوا الكويت تنضم الى دول التخلف المنتشرة في أمكنة كثيرة بالعالم تتحدى العصر والتاريخ ومصيرها معروف.
كل خلافاتكم الثانوية انبذوها جانبا أمام هذا الخطر الاكبر. وعلى رئيس مجلس الامة مسؤولية خاصة في انقاذ الكويت فالرئاسة لم تكن يوما ما للوجاهة بل تعني الاستعداد لضرب المثل في التضحية من أجل الوطن.فلتكن المحاسبة بقدر الخطيئة.
وفقكم الله لخدمة وطننا الغالي.

description.hltext_display: Trabzonspor'un kamp programı belli oldu
description.content: Geen hafta izin verilen yabancı oyunculardan sonra dn Gaziantep Bykşehir Belediyespor ile Ziraat Trkiye Kupası'nda yapılan ve 2-2 sona eren karşılaşmanın ardından da diğer oyuncular 1 haftalık izne ıktılar. Bordo-mavili takım, 29 Aralık'ta Antalya Belek'te toplanarak, devre arasının ilk alışmasını gerekleştirecek. Bordo-mavililer, 5 Ocak'ta Werder Bremen ve 7 Ocak'ta da Schalke 04 ile hazırlık maları oynayacak. Trabzonspor, Ziraat Trkiye Kupası'nda Konya Torku Şekerspor ile 11 Ocak'ta yapacağı ma iin bir gn nce Konya'ya gidecek ve maı oynadıktan sonra Trabzon'a dnecek. AA

description.hltext_display: Zwei trotzten auch dem Winter - weitgehend
description.content: 21 Spieltage sind in der 3. Liga absolviert - mehr oder weniger. Zahlreiche witterungsbedingte Ausfälle haben nicht nur die Tabelle in ein etwas schiefes Bild geraten lassen. Insgesamt 22 Partien stehen für die Zeit nach der Winterpause auf dem Nachholspielplan. Kein einziges Team ist nicht davon betroffen, fünf Mannschaften konnten immerhin 20 Spiele absolvieren. Und zwei Spieler aus diesem Kreis kamen so auf genau 1800 Minuten: Mark Lerandy (1. FC Saarbrücken) und Jens Truckenbrod (Jena). [ weiter... ]

description.hltext_display: Meche Carreño escribe cine ecologista
description.content:
Ricardo Hernández/El Sol de MéxicoCiudad de México.- "Ahora estoy escribiendo el libro para niños Los Lamentos de mi Tierra, con el que también espero hacer conciencia entre los adultos acerca del daño que estamos haciendo al medio ambiente, especialmente por la deforestación que sufre el planeta", explicó la legendaria actriz veracruzana Meche Carreño, quien se hiciera famosa gracias a sus intervenciones en las cintas La Choca, Los Perros de Dios y su baile erótico en Zona Roja, entre muchas otras producciones fílmicas.
Entrevistada durante la presentación del calendario Mujeres del Bicentenario (de la también actriz Karla Barahona), la experimentada mujer señaló a EL SOL DE MÉXICO que espera llevar al cine esta historia que está desarrollando y al mismo tiempo dirigirla, pues le gusta involucrarse directamente en cada uno de sus proyectos artísticos."Un tema ecológico es el eje de este libro, que para el cine pienso combinar la animación con personajes de carne y hueso, con la intención de mostrar a la gente cómo todo tiene una causa y efecto desde cuando un niño mata a un pajarito hasta la tala de árboles, así como la construcción de enormes edificios, provocando un alto impacto urbano, donde los oportunistas abusan de su poder", explicó la nacida en la ciudad de Minatitlán.
Doña Meche agregó que los mismos seres humanos nos estamos matando con nuestras acciones negativas, al maltratar a la flora, complicándonos la existencia en vez de facilitarla para bien de todos.
La también protagonista de cintas como Los Papeleros y La Sangre Enemiga dijo estar contenta del rumbo que está tomando el cine de nuestro país, alabando el trabajo de Alejandro González Iñárritu, con quien le gustaría trabajar algún día."El cine es una representación de nuestras vivencias, dependiendo de ahí el éxito o el fracaso de una película, como ocurrió con La Choca, donde mi personaje de la Flor sigue existiendo en algún punto remoto de nuestro México, por lo que el filme se sigue proyectando de forma constante en televisión", expresó la jarocha, quien en Europa estelarizó la cinta Andante.
Con tres años de haber regresado a nuestro país luego de vivir en el extranjero, la actriz adelantó que tiene otro proyecto denominado Margarita Tierra (una historia de Óscar Flores Tapia que fuera gobernador de Coahuila), mismo que se encuentra adaptando para cine, al que pondrá por nombre La Casa de mi Abuela.

description.hltext_display: Abrirá Liverpool 10 tiendas en México
description.content:
5,000 y 6,000 mdp se destinarán en su mayoría a la apertura de 8 almacenes Liverpool.
Villahermosa, Tabasco
Reducir/Ampliar
Basado en las grandes oportunidades que ofrece el mercado en México y las expectativas de recuperación del consumo, El Puerto de Liverpool se ha propuesto crecer a un ritmo promedio anual para abrir de 8 a 10 tiendas en el siguiente quinquenio. La estrategia significará agregar entre 40 y 50 unidades hacia el 2015, lo que implicará una expansión del 70 por ciento.
"Tenemos identificadas las plazas donde podemos crecer en los siguientes años, reforzaremos la presencia en los mercados donde ya estamos y entraremos en varios nuevos", comentó José Antonio Diego, director de Relación con inversionistas de la operadora de tiendas departamentales más grande de México. La cadena, que preside Max David Michel, cuenta con 85 tiendas de las cuales 57 son del formato Liverpool, 23 Fábricas de Francia y 5 Duty Free.
Si se considera la muestra de las tiendas departamentales integrantes de la Asociación Nacional de Tiendas de Autoservicio y Departamentales (ANTAD), Liverpool detenta una participación de 32 por ciento.
El ejecutivo dijo que para 2011 la empresa ejercerá inversiones de capital de entre 5,000 y 6,000 millones de pesos, los cuáles se destinará en su mayoría a la apertura de 8 almacenes Liverpool, que le permitirán expandir entre 10 y 12% su área de ventas.

description.hltext_display: Current TV launches Bar Karma in February
description.content:
A CYNOPSIS MESSAGE FROM CBS COLLEGE SPORTS NETWORK
CBS COLLEGE SPORTS NETWORK is available to 94 million homes nationwide!
We congratulate Army, Navy and Air Force on their record-breaking 2010 seasons!
INDIANA HOOSIERS fans EVERYWHERE can watch their men's hoops team TONIGHT vs. N. Iowa at 7:30 ET (12/23, too)
Cynopsis
Good morning. It's Wednesday, December 22, 2010, and this is your first early morning briefing. As always, if you prefer to watch this morning's news instead of reading it, click here .
Tonight's Finales:
TLC: Untold Stories of the E.R. at 9p
USA Network: Psych at 10p
Yesterday, the FCC passed the net neutrality regulations by a 3-2 vote after FCC Chairman Julius Genachowski obtained the backing of the agency's two Democratic commissioners on Monday. The new regulations will take effect early next year and are designed to guarantee broadband web users equal access to all websites, online services and applications and prohibits internet service providers from blocking sites. Genachowski said yesterday's vote by the FCC was historic. "For the first time we'll have enforceable rules of the road to preserve Internet freedom and openness," said Genachowski. President Obama also hailed the FCC's vote as a benchmark, saying the government would "remain vigilant and see to it that innovation is allowed to flourish, that consumers are protected from abuse, and that the democratic spirit of the Internet remains intact."
Military Channel opens the new action series Greatest Tank Battles on January 5 at 10p. During 10 one-hour episodes, the series goes on location to battlefields around the world and uses realistic CGI animation to recreate the military maneuvers used in historic tank battles over the last century. The series is produced for Military Channel by Breakthrough Entertainment.
Current TV announced its community-developed original drama series Bar Karma from video game designer Will Wright (The Sims, SimCity) and Worldwide Biggies' CEO Albie Hecht is set to debut February 11 at 10p. The 12-episode series, for the first time, allows viewers the chance to control plots, characters and overall development of the series before it airs by utilizing the Storymaker application that is available online at current.com/studios or via the new iPhone App out this week. The series is shot in New York and action is set at a mystical bar at the edge of the universe with the plot taking shape around the scenario: "A guy or gal walks into a bar ..." The series stars William Sanderson, Matthew Humphreys and Cassie Howarth. Leading up to Bar Karma's February 11 premiere, Current TV is airing a half-hour special, TV You Control: Bar Karma on January 20 at 8p hosted by Matthew Humphreys. The special offers viewers a behind-the-scenes exclusive tour of how viewers can participate in the drama with interviews with the show's cast and creators.
FX is bringing back a sophomore season of its drama series Justified on February 9 at 10p. The 13-week series stars Timothy Olyphant and is based on the works by crime writer Elmore Leonard. Graham Yost developed the series that is produced by Sony Pictures Television and FX Productions.
A new season of Dangerous Encounters joins the lineup on Nat Geo WILD starting January 4 at 9p. The series, with five new episodes, follows professional herpetologist Dr. Brady Barr as he takes on some of the most dangerous creatures on earth.
All-new, one-hour episodes of Kimora: Life in the Fab Lane premieres January 9 at 9p on The Style Network. The docu-series' new season continues to highlight the business and personal life of fashion guru, model and mom Kimora Lee Simmons. Left/Right produces the series for The Style Network.
Planet Green launches a second season of Conviction Kitchen on January 14 at 10p. During the new season, executive chef Marc Thuet and his wife/business partner, Biana Zorich work with ex-cons and recovering drug addicts, who have no culinary experience, as they race against time to open a new restaurant. The eight-episode Conviction Kitchen is produced by Cineflix Inc. for Planet Green.
The Style Network's third season finale of Giuliana & Bill on Monday at 8p delivered a 0.87 rating with W18-49 and tallied more than 600,000 total viewers.
Steve Landesberg, best known as playing Detective Arthur Dietrich on the mid-1970s television series Barney Miller, died yesterday morning in Los Angeles. He was 65. In addition to playing Det. Dietrich on Barney Miller, which ran on ABC from 1975-1982, Mr. Landesberg had a dual role on the show also playing Father Paul. Mr. Landesberg received three Emmy nominations for his work on Barney Miller during the last three years of the show's run. In more recent years, Mr. Landesberg appeared in such feature films as Forgetting Sarah Marshall and Wild Hogs as well as the Starz series Head Case from 2007-2009. Furthermore, he appeared in the 2002 television series Harvey Birdman, Attorney at Law and had recurring roles on Harry and the Henderson and The Golden Girls and guest starred in several others including Seinfeld, Law and Order, Cosby, Ghost Whisperer and Everybody Hates Chris. Mr. Landesberg also hosted a special for NBC in 1983 titled The Steve Landesberg Show. He had the distinction of being discovered at an open audition hosted by Bill Cosby for NBC's The Tonight Show which led to stints at the Improv working with David Brenner, Jimmie Walker and Bette Midler. Mr. Landesberg also did voiceover gigs for animated series including American Dad, appeared on regional stage shows and in numerous TV commercials. He is survived by his wife, Nancy and a daughter.
Program Call: Cynopsis Media will be producing our annual NATPE Shopping Guide sent to all Cynopsis and Cynopsis Kids subscribers on Thursday, January 20, the week before NATPE 2011 in Miami. If you would like to have your programming included, please send us only the following info for your top 5 shows: title, availability date, number of episodes, length, type (i.e., movie, series, special, etc.), genre and your terms (barter, cash, etc.) as well as your company's stand/booth location. To be included in this free and highly-viewed special edition, please send your submission to lisa@cynopsis.com no later than Friday, January 14, 2011. A confirmation email will be sent following each submission from Lisa (if you don't receive a confirmation email, please resubmit).
A CYNOPSIS MESSAGE
Merry Christmas | Happy Holidays | Happy New Year
Cyn opsis Media will be off the week of December 27 - 31, 2010.
Don't forget to read the 2010 Year in Review on January 1st 2011!
Past e-publications, classifieds & industry calendar of events can always be found on our website.
Spanish-language network Mexicanal Network picked up new station affiliates in Texas and Nevada adding KVAT-LD in Austin and KELM-LP in Reno effective immediately to its roster. Mexicanal's digital broadcast distribution also includes affiliates in Los Angeles, San Diego, Tucson, Palm Springs, Oklahoma City, Boise, Twin Falls and Yakima.
Interviewer/talk show host Tavis Smiley is switching his co-producer for his weeknight PBS talk show, Tavis Smiley to WNET.ORG in New York. Previously, Smiley co-produced his show with KCET-TV in Los Angeles, though that station has decided to end its affiliation with PBS as of January 1. Smiley made a one-year deal with WNET which also allows WNET to oversee the show's website, outreach to schools, work with other PBS stations to secure time slots and help with fundraising even for Smiley's primetime specials. The half-hour Tavis Smiley will launch its eighth season in January and will continue to be taped at rented studios at KCET-TV in Los Angeles, though Smiley will now have access to WNET's studio at Lincoln Center. In the LA area, Smiley's show will air on KOCE-TV beginning in January.
OWN: Oprah Winfrey Network said Gayle King and HLN anchor Robin Meade will moderate the four two-hour primetime specials, Ask Oprah's All Stars featuring Dr. Phil McGraw, Dr. Mehmet Oz and Suze Orman as they answer viewer questions. The first of four specials premieres on January 2 at 8p and the subsequent specials air on consecutive Sundays on January 9, 16 and 23 at 8p. Meade will moderate the specials airing on January 2 and January 16 while King moderates on January 9 and January 23. Also The Gayle King Show will now debut a week later on January 10 at 10a since King is moderating the specials taping in Los Angeles during the week of January 2.

Saturday A18-49 Analysis: FOX held onto its lead Saturday night with a 1.5/5 among A18-49, according to final national ratings from Nielsen. At 8p, FOX was well ahead of the pack with its back-to-back Cops episodes at an average of 1.5/5 followed by CBS' Crimetime Saturday repeat edition at 0.8/3. All was steady-eddy for FOX at 9p as AMW: America Fights Back was #1 at 1.5/5 and ABC's encore movie presentation was next at 1.0/4. Then at 10p, ABC's movie and CBS' rerun of 48 Hours Mystery shared #1 at 1.2/4 each and NBC's Law & Order: SVU repeat and Univision's Sabado Gigante tied for #2 at 0.9/3 each.

Sunday A18-49 Analysis: NBC was the champ Sunday night with the A18-49 demo at 7.0/19, according to final national ratings from Nielsen. CBS opened the night a winner during 7p with 60 Minutes at 4.0/12 and NBC's Football Night in America Part 2 and Part 3 averaged a second place at 3.0/9. At 8p, NBC won with a combination of Football Night in America Part 3, Sunday Night NFL Pre-Kick and the Sunday Night Football which averaged a 5.8/16 followed by CBS with the remainder of 60 Minutes and the Survivor: Nicaragua Finale with an average of 4.1/11. NBC surpassed the competition at 9p with its Sunday Night Football match at 8.4/21 while CBS' Survivor: Nicaragua Finale was #2 at 4.1/10. NBC was victorious during the 10p hour with more NFL football ending at 8.8/22 and CBS stayed in second place with the conclusion of Survivor: Nicaragua Finale and the Survivor Reunion show with an average of 3.9/10.

At 8p, the season finale of NBC's The Sing-Off won with a 2.7/7 while the average of CBS' repeat comedies How I Met Your Mother and Rules of Engagement and the series premiere of FOX's Million Dollar Money Drop tied for second at 1.9/5 each. Univision's Soy Tu Duena topped at 9p with a 2.8/7 followed by the second hour of NBC's The Sing-Off conclusion at 2.6/7. Turner Sports Ad Sales tapped Will Blair as SVP/Sponsorships and Sales. Will joins from Cartoon Network and Adult Swim where he served as VP/Brand Activation and Media Partnerships. In his new capacity, Will now manages custom branded promotional initiatives for advertising clients involving the NBA, NASCAR, MLB, professional golf and the NCAA Division I Men's Basketball Tournament. Based in New York, Will reports to Jon Diament, EVP, Turner Sports Ad Sales and Marketing.
Lee Flaster was elevated to SVP/Planning, Strategy and Business Operations for Telemundo Ad Sales. Lee's scope of duties include working with business entities to develop business strategies and partnerships in order to spur added revenue for the networks encompassing Telemundo, Telemundo stations, mun2 and Telemundo Digital. Lee reports to Jacqueline Hernandez, COO, Telemundo and to Ed Swindler, EVP/COO, Ad Sales at NBC Universal.
TV advertising network, REVShare upped Michael Montgomery to VP/Ad Sales. Michael will handle national clients while based at the company's Temecula, CA headquarters.
As of January 3, Beth Fetzer joins ArnoldNYC as SVP/Director of Integrated Planning where she will spearhead the agency's integrated planning unit that offers business insights, consumer insight and digital strategy integration. Beth will report to Lynn Power, President, ArnoldNYC.
This day in History: 1976 - The last show of the original Let's Make A Deal aired.
