description.hltext_display: Ringde hedef: Altın madalya
description.content:
Boks Federasyonu Başkanı Eyp Gzge, Trkiye'nin olimpiyatlarda boks sporunda henz altın madalyası bulunmadığını belirterek, ''Amacımız bir ilki gerekleştirerek 2012 Londra Olimpiyatları'nda altın madalya almak'' dedi. Gzge, Trkiye Ferdi Boks Şampiyonası'na katılmak zere geldiği Mersin'de, AA muhabirine yaptığı aıklamada, boks sporunun son yıllarda atılım ierisine olduğunu syledi. Trkiye'de 250 civarında kulp bulunduğunu, amalarının bu sayıyı 500'e kadar ıkarmak olduğunu vurgulayan Gzge, kulp sayısı arttıka sporcu sayısının artacağını, bylece boks sporuna kalitenin geleceğini ifade etti.
Rusya'da 7 bin civarında boks spor kulb bulunduğunu vurgulayan Gzge, şyle devam etti: ''Oysa bizim 7 bin sporcumuz bile yok. Rusya nfus olarak bizden 4 kat fazla. Buna gre lkemizde 7 binin drtte biri yani bin 750 kulp olması gerek. Rusya milli takımı 11 sıklette birinci oluyor, Avrupa Şampiyonası ve olimpiyatlarda nemli başarılar elde ediyor. Bu nedenle daha iyi yerlere gelebilmemiz iin boks sporunu sevdirmemiz ve yaygınlaştırmamız, boksun kavgadan ibaret olmadığını gstermemiz gerekiyor. Bu erevede gelecek yıl yaklaşık 3 yıl aradan sonra yeniden liseler arası msabakalar dzenleyeceğiz. İlkğretim okulu dzeyinde alışmalarımız var. Karabk Ovacık'ta Boks Lisesi faaliyete geti. Pilot blgelerde uygulanan Boks Eğitim Merkezlerini artırmayı amalıyoruz. Genlik ve Spor Genel Mdrlğ bize her konuda destek veriyor.'' -TRKİYE, 185 LKE İERİSİNDE İLK 10'DA YER ALIYOR-
Federasyon başkanı Eyp Gzge, kimi zaman gerilese de Trkiye'nin dnyada boks sporuyla uğraşan 185 lke ierisinde ilk 10 ierisinde yer aldığını bildirdi. Bu duruma gre geride olmadıklarını, ancak almaları gereken ok yol bulunduğunu, bunun iin de ok alışmaları gerektiğini vurgulayan Gzge, şunları kaydetti: ''Gelecek yıl 2012 Londra Olimpiyatları iin alışmalara başlıyoruz. Mersin'de gerekleştirilen Trkiye Ferdi Boks Şampiyonası'nda başarılı olan sporcular milli takım kampına ağrılacak. ekirdek kadroyu oluşturup 2012 Olimpiyatları'na gideceğiz.
Azerbaycan'ın başkenti Bak'de yapılacak Dnya Şampiyonası ve olimpiyat elemelerinin birinci ayağı bizim iin ara hedef olacak. İstanbul'da yapılacak ikinci elemelerde de vize alıp 2012 Londra Olimpiyatları'na ok sayıda sporcu ile katılmak istiyoruz. Trkiye'nin henz boks sporunda olimpiyatlarda altın madalyası bulunmuyor. Amacımız ilki gerekleştirerek Londra olimpiyatlarında altın madalya almak.'' Boks sporunu ''dnyanın en nezih ve centilmen'' sporu olarak niteleyen Gzge, ''nk msabaka boyunca birbirleriyle kıyasıya dvşen sporcular, ma tamamlandığında birbirlerine sarılarak ringden ayrılır. Oysa futbol, basketbol gibi oğu branşta dargın ayrılırlar. Bu boks sporunun centilmenliğini ortaya koyuyor'' dedi.
AA

description.hltext_display: Volkswagen Personbilar: Dakar-rallyt 2011: Volkswagen siktar på tredje raka segern
description.content:
Extrema ökenpassager, svindlande höjder i Anderna och snabba
specialsträckor på grus - Dakar-rallyt är motorsportens längsta och
tuffaste test. Volkswagen-teamet är fast besluten om att vinna titeln
för tredje året i rad.
långt. För tredje gången körs det legendariska rallyt i Sydamerika, från
kust till kust genom Argentina och Chile. Start och mål sker i den
argentinska huvudstaden Buenos Aires.
Rallyts centrum är Atacamaöknen - den mest ofruktbara regionen på
jorden. 6 av de 14 specialsträckorna kommer att köras i dessa
ogästvänliga områden. Höga sanddyner med djup sand, två vändor i Anderna
på höjder över 4 700 meter över havsytan och hårda grusvägar ingår i de
dagliga utmaningarna.
Volkswagen har stått som segrare de senaste två åren och man siktar nu
på ett "hattrick".
- De två tidigare segrarna är de största framgångarna som Volkswagen
hittills har uppnått inom motorsporten. Men detta gör ingalunda
uppgiften lättare. Våra rivaler kommer att göra allt som står i deras
makt för att besegra oss. Vi ger oss in i rallyt med tillförsikt och
vårt mål är att vinna för tredje gången i rad, säger Kris Nissen, chef
Volkswagen Motorsport.
Volkswagen är den enda biltillverkaren som vunnit världens tuffaste
rally med dieselteknologi. I kommande rallyt ställer man upp med fyra
bilar som bygger på den nyutvecklade tredje generationen av Race
Touareg. Den dieseldrivna bilen utvecklar 310 hästkrafter.
- Vi har systematiskt optimerat Race Touareg samtidigt som mekaniker,
ingenjörer, förare och kartläsare har arbetat med detaljer för att vara
bättre förberedda än någonsin, fortsätter Kris Nissen.
De fyra teamen med förare och kartläsare har tidigare skördat stora
framgångar för Volkswagen i Dakar-rallyt:
· Carlos Sainz / Lucas Cruz (båda från Spanien): Segrare 2010
· Giniel de Villiers / Dirk von Zitzewitz (Sydafrika / Tyskland):
Segrare 2009
· Nasser Al-Attiyah / Timo Gottschalk (Qatar / Tyskland): Tvåa 2010
· Mark Miller / Ralph Pitchford (USA / Sydafrika): Tvåa 2009
Volkswagen erbjuder en möjlighet att följa rallyt via iPhone och iPod
touch. Via applikationen "Volkswagen Rally mobile" får man nyheter,
resultat, videos och bakgrundsinformation direkt i sin display före,
under och efter rallyt. Applikationen kan från och med nu hämtas
kostnadsfritt hos Apples App Store via
www.volkswagen-motorsport.com/dakar_iPhone (http://www.volkswagen-motors
port.com/dakar_iPhone).
Är du journalist och önskar ytterligare information? Kontakta då Marcus
Thomasfolk, Informationschef, 08-553 867 97 eller 070-35 896 57,
marcus.thomasfolk@volkswagen.se
------------------------------------------------------------
Denna information skickades av Cision http://www.cisionwire.se

description.hltext_display: PLCとPLCベースのPACサプライヤにとって、インドは� �実で持続的な成長の機会を提供する
description.content: ARC Advisory Groupの調査によれば、インドのPLC市場全体は2014年には4億ドルを越えるだろう。ARCが新規に発行した「PLCとPLCベースのPACのインド市場動向調査（PLC and PLC-based PAC Outlook for India）」では、インドにおけるPLC（programmable logic controller）とPLCベースのPAC（PLC-based Programmable Automation Controller）ビジネスおよびその分野についての深い分析を提供する。 市場分析と将来予測に加えて、調査報告書では現在と将来の市場に影響を及ぼす各種戦略的事項についても記述した。

description.hltext_display: 回访卫留成关注的新盈中学公厕 学生使用方便了
description.content:
省委书记、省人大常委会主任卫留成两次关注新盈中学公厕问题
2400学生“方便”真的方便了
临高县新盈中学拥有2400多名学生，因为公厕废弃致使该校学生无厕所可用一事，被省委书记、省人大常委会主任卫留成在今年的教师节座谈会上点名批评后，本报记者在第一时间进行了实地采访(详见本报9月9日4版报道)。报道引起临高县有关方面的高度重视，立即安排资金在新盈中学兴建新公厕。
12月20日省委书记、省人大常委会主任卫留成在接受新华社记者专访时，再次点到了新盈中学厕所的事。那么，3个月过去了，该校的新厕所是否已建好?12月21日下午，记者再次赶到新盈中学回访。
新盈中学新厕所干净卫生
本报9月9日4版报道版面新盈中学新厕所干净卫生
学校无公厕被省委书记批评
新盈中学系临高县一所镇级完全中学，现有2400多名学生。但该校刚创建时学生人数不多，当时学生厕所只设计18个蹲位，男生10个，女生8个，后来曾进行小补小修。随着在校人数增加，加上当时厕所设计问题，导致污水溢流，无法使用。2005年，县教育局曾安排资金6万元用于该校厕所建设，但几年来终因附近居民阻碍无法动工。2009年，投入资金4万元将旧厕所改建成35平方米、拥有17个蹲位的学校公厕。旧厕所改建使用3个月后，因排泄系统欠缺，附近居民意见极大，加上人为破坏，于2010年春季被迫停止使用。
学校厕所无法使用，在校期间学生“方便”成了大问题。男生上“小号”时可在学校小便处解决，上“大号”时就跑到校外解决。而女生在学校一般不上“大号”，在家解决，在学校上“小号”时，则到学校的小卖部借用卫生间。
省委书记、省人大常委会主任卫留成得知此事后，在今年的教师节座谈会上点名批评。本报第一时间赶到新盈中学予以报道。
县委重视新公厕立马动工
本报报道引起了临高县高度重视，县长郑柏安、副县长兼临高县教育局代局长蔡明率领教育局、新盈镇政府有关人员来到新盈中学实地考察，决定在该校运动场旁兴建一个公厕。9月11日，新的厕所动工兴建。
此外，当地政府还从两个方面增加厕所蹲位。第一是在即将新建的六层教学大楼上，每层两侧均建有学生厕所，每层厕所面积60平方米(14个蹲位)，共360平方米(共84个蹲位);第二是在新建的四层学生公寓，每间宿舍设一个厕所，一共28间，即28个厕所。以上工程规划完成后，厕所建设面积可达到标准要求，该校学生如厕难题将彻底得到解决。
临高县内没有公厕的学校还有临高一小。临高一小位于临城镇解放路，因为重建5层的教学大楼，原有公厕因教学楼重建于今年7月份拆除。为解决该校学生如厕难问题，临高县教育局已于今年9月在该校内新建1幢两层公厕。目前公厕正在施工，下个学期可投入使用。另外，重建教学大楼三至五层每层均设计两间厕所，共42个蹲位。这样，临高一小学生如厕难题也将彻底得到解决。
新厕所已建成投入使用
“学校新厕所已建好，投入使用一个多月了。”21日下午，在新盈中学，该校党支部书记陈方界对记者说。随后他带领记者到新厕所参观。
该校新厕所建在综合楼后面运动场旁。南国都市报记者看到，这是一座平房式公厕，新修的水泥小路从外面直通公厕，外墙贴着瓷砖。进入里面一看，地板便池也贴着瓷砖，很干净。据陈方界介绍，这个新厕所是11月中旬建成投入使用的，共23个蹲位，其中男生13个，另外还有6个小便站位。为保证厕所用水，学校在厕所顶上安装了一个不锈钢水塔，此外，以每月600元工资雇佣一名厕所管理员，以保证厕所的干净卫生。今后，该校还将在厕所周围铺设草皮种上花木，加以美化。
临高县教育局计财股曾股长说，新建的公厕面积约105平方米，共投入23万元，另外教育部门又追加投入5万元修了水泥路面及一些配套设施。现在学生公寓已动工兴建，教学大楼也将在这几天动工，等学生公寓和教学大楼建成投入使用后，新盈中学学生如厕难题将彻底得到解决。

description.hltext_display: Cancelan 9.4 por ciento de tarjetas para consumo
description.content:
El sistema bancario reportó 10.8 millones de contratos de tarjetas de crédito en el tercer trimestre de 2010
México, D.F.
Reducir/Ampliar
El sistema bancario reportó 10.8 millones de contratos de tarjetas de crédito en el tercer trimestre de 2010, una disminución de 9.4 por ciento frente al periodo previo y el nivel más bajo desde julio-septiembre de 2006, según el Banco de México (Banxico). Fitch Ratings opinó que lo anterior es resultado de que una vez que los bancos hicieron castigos en su cartera vencida, anularon contratos de tarjetas y que los clientes decidieron reducir el número de plásticos que tenían.
La banca llegó a tener 13.8 millones de contratos de tarjeta de crédito en enero-marzo de 2008, su máximo nivel desde que Banxico tiene registro. La tendencia a la baja comenzó desde el segundo trimestre de 2009, durante la crisis financiera, que inició hacia finales de 2008.
El Banco Central aclaró que una cuenta puede tener más de una tarjeta relacionada, por ello hay 21.8 millones de tarjetas a septiembre de 2010, de las cuales sólo se utilizan 14.6 millones. René Ibarra, director de Instituciones Financieras de Fitch Ratings, comentó que la cancelación de contratos es producto de la tendencia de desendeudamiento del consumidor y que los castigos de cartera vencida podrían implicar una reducción respecto a otros años, pues el contrato se anula o se cancela.
"La reducción sería todavía alguna consecuencia del proceso de desendeudamiento de las familias en un producto que es de los más caros, el del consumo. "Hay otros segmentos del crédito (hipotecario y empresarial) cuya reducción no se ha visto tanto como en el consumo, lo cual quiere decir que continúa el proceso de bancarización", comentó el analista. Ibarra previó que para 2011, el crecimiento del crédito al consumo sea marginal, toda vez que los criterios de originación de la banca son más estrictos.

description.hltext_display: Adalta Real PLC Notice of GM, AIM Cancellation, Admission to PLUS
description.content: FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE 22 December 2010 Adalta Real PLC ("Adalta Real" or "the Company") Notice of General Meeting ("the Notice") Cancellation of admission to trading on AIM Admission to trading on PLUS Change of Broker and Appointment of PLUS Corporate Adviser Since the sale of the Company's sole subsidiary, DawMed International Limited, in August 2009, the Company has been carrying on a commercial property agency and consultancy business in accordance with the first stage of its Investing Policy approved by Shareholders at a general meeting held on 30 July 2009. AIM have ruled that the Company has failed to sufficiently implement the Investing Policy in accordance with Rule 15 of the AIM Rules and the Company has until 9 February 2011 to make further investments or undertake a reverse takeover (as defined by the AIM Rules) to avoid the admission of its share capital to trading on AIM being cancelled. The Board consider that it is not feasible to make further investments within the timeframe and that undertaking a reverse takeover would not be the best use of the Company's resources and so have decided that the Company's best course of action is to cancel the admission of the Shares to trading on AIM and for its share capital to be admitted instead to trading on PLUS Markets. This will ensure that Shareholders have a ready market on which to buy or sell Shares in the same way as on AIM. The Cancellation is conditional upon a special resolution being passed at a General Meeting of Shareholders on 14 January 2011 and this is explained in greater detail in the circular to Shareholders being posted today and available on the Company's website: www.adaltareal.com. Set out below is an expected timetable of principal events. Record date 20 December 2010 Latest time for receipt of 12.05 pm on 12 January 2011 proxies for the meeting convened for 14 January 2011 General Meeting for the purpose 12.05 pm on 14 January 2011 of approving the Cancellation Cancellation of AIM admission 7.00a.m. on 24 January 2011 Admission to PLUS effective 7.00a.m. on 24 January 2011 Notes: 1. References to time are to London time. 2. lf any of the above times or dates should change, the revised times and/or dates will be notified to Shareholders by an announcement on a Registered Information Service. 3. All events in the above timetable following the General Meeting are conditional upon approval by Shareholders of the Resolution to be proposed at the GM. Change of Broker and Appointment of PLUS Corporate Adviser The Company have appointed Rivington Street Corporate Finance Ltd ("RSCF") as broker to Adalta Real with immediate effect. Under the terms of the PLUS Rules the Company must appoint a Corporate Adviser to act on its behalf in respect of the admission of its share capital to trading on PLUS. The Company has therefore entered into an agreement with Rivington Street Corporate Finance Ltd ("RSCF") (which is conditional upon the Cancellation (of trading on AIM) and the admission of the Shares to trading on PLUS) under which RSCF has agreed to act as the Company's Corporate Adviser for the purposes of the PLUS Rules. Contact: Adalta Real Plc Tel: 01295 670123 Kevin Gilmore Mob: 07785 396666 Beaumont Cornish Limited Tel: 020 7628 3396 Roland Cornish Rivington Street Corporate Finance Limited Tel: 020 7562 3363 Eran Zucker This information is provided by RNS The company news service from the London Stock Exchange END MSCLLFSDFDLLFII

description.hltext_display: Beauty powers better first impressions: Study
description.author: Kristen Thompson, Metro Vancouver
description.content:
The University of B.C. has uncovered yet another reason why it’s better to be beautiful.
According to a UBC study published in the December edition of Psychological Science, we identify the personality traits of people we deem beautiful more accurately than those we find average or ugly.
Previous research has shown that individuals tend to find attractive people more intelligent, friendly and competent than others.
Jeremy Biesanz, a professor at UBC’s department of psychology and co-author of the study, said there was also a clear positive bias toward beautiful people.
“If people think Jane is beautiful, and she is very organized and somewhat generous, people will see her as more organized and generous than she actually is,” said Biesanz.
He said people are motivated to pay closer attention to beautiful people because of curiosity, romantic interest or desire for friendship.
“Not only do we judge books by their covers, we read the ones with beautiful covers much closer than others,” Biesanz said.

description.hltext_display: 海南将建成全国低碳发展示范区 保护生态环境
description.content:
http://news.hainan.net/ 时间：2010-12-22 8:32:00 来源：南海网-海南日报
记者昨天从海南省发改委获悉，指导海南省低碳发展的第一部纲领性文件《海南省人民政府关于低碳发展的若干意见》(简称《意见》)已于近日出台。
《意见》提出海南省低碳发展的总体目标为：将海南建设成为一个以旅游休闲低碳产业为主体，以低碳能源为载体，引领国际低碳生产方式、生活方式和消费模式，建设生产发展、生活富裕、生态优美、文明健康的全国低碳发展示范区。到2015年，全省清洁能源占一次能源比例达到40%，第三产业增加值占地区生产总值比重达到50%以上，森林覆盖率达到并稳定在60%;2020年全省清洁能源占一次能源比例达到50%以上，第三产业增加值占地区生产总值达到60%以上，森林覆盖率稳定在60%以上，全省万元生产总值二氧化碳排放量比2005年下降幅度控制在国家分解指标范围内。
海南省将坚持统筹规划分步实施、科技支撑体制创新、政府主导市场运作三大原则，通过调整产业结构，构建产业低碳化体系;大力发展清洁能源，优化能源结构;推进节能工作，打造低碳工业、建筑、交通和绿色照明等体系;加强森林碳汇，创造低碳环境提高适应气候变化能力;弘扬低碳文化，形成低碳发展的社会氛围;加强试点工作，推进低碳经济发展等六方面工作，切实加快低碳发展。
《意见》的出台标志着海南国际旅游岛建设将在加快转变经济发展方式和保护生态环境上，秉承低碳、绿色发展的理念，在建设全国生态文明示范区过程中，坚定不移地走低碳发展、绿色发展之路，提高海南省应对气候变化的能力。

description.hltext_display: Woman asleep with babyis injured by stray bullet
description.author: JARREL WADE
description.content: A 24-year-old woman suffered a head wound Tuesday morning when a stray bullet came through the wall of her apartment as she slept in her bed with her 15-day-old baby, police said. The wound likely was caused by shrapnel, and the woman was taken by ambulance to St. John Medical Center as a precaution, Sgt. Jeff Cealka said. The baby was not injured, and the woman was able to walk and talk to police, he said. A group of people, apparently in several cars, was involved in an altercation outside the Edenwood Apartments in the 2100 block of North Hartford Avenue, and shots were fired about 11:45 a.m., Cealka said. No one involved was injured. Police found shell casings about 200 yards from the woman's apartment, he said. Officers also found a gun in a field nearby, but it wasn't known whether it was used in the shooting, Cealka said. Police are looking for a 2005 or 2006 maroon Chevrolet Monte Carlo and a white Ford Expedition that might have been involved, he said. Anyone with information about the shooting is asked to call Crime Stoppers at 596-COPS, send a text message to police or submit an online tip at tulsaworld.com/crimestoppers The Crime Commission offers rewards for information that leads to arrests, and callers can be anonymous. Jarrel Wade 581-8367 jarrel.wade@tulsaworld.com

description.hltext_display: Councillors to get raise in 2011
description.author: j.j. mccullough, Metro Vancouver
description.content:
The dawn of the new year will also herald a new era of pay raises for members of Vancouver’s city council.
This year’s adjustment will hike the annual pay of councillors 3.1 per cent, to nearly $64,000, while the salary of Mayor Gregor Robertson will increase at the same rate, to reach $144,000.
Vancouver councillors remain far from the best-paid employees at city hall, however, and are actually drawing much lower salaries than those of senior staff — many of whom are paid at least twice as much as the mayor himself. Several high-ranking city officials, including the city manager, deputy city manager, and city solicitor, all bring in more than $200,000 a year.
Coun. Suzanne Anton said that high pay for bureaucrats is necessary to attract and retain talent but that the same is true for politicians.

event_or_fact.property: high pay for bureaucrats is necessary to attract and retain talent but that the same is true for politicians.

entity.property: city manager , deputy city manager, and city solicitor

description.hltext_display: Crece 66% venta de cerdo
description.content:
El consumo de piernas y paletas ha sido cada vez mayor, porque es un producto más barato que los pavos.
Por: TabascoHOY.com • Reforma
México, D.F.
Reducir/Ampliar
Las importaciones de piernas y paletas de cerdo se incrementaron 66 por ciento en los últimos 4 años, debido a una mayor demanda del consumidor en las épocas decembrinas por su bajo precio.
Datos de la Secretaría de Agricultura, muestran que en 2009 se adquirieron 348 mil 900 toneladas de estos productos, esto es 66 por ciento más que en 2005. Y de enero a octubre de este año, se ha importado 80 por ciento de todo lo que se compró el año pasado, la razón: una mayor demanda por su bajo precio.
"El consumo de piernas y paletas para fin de año ha sido cada vez mayor, porque es un producto más barato que los pavos; hoy un kilo de pierna en los precios internacionales como commodities se vende en 30 pesos en promedio", dijo Vicente García, ex presidente de la Confederación Nacional de Porcicultores. Agregó que el alza en las importaciones se explica por la mayor demanda nacional y una menor producción.
"Las importaciones de piernas y paletas han aumentado porque hay una mayor demanda; el consumo va creciendo; somos más mexicanos y la producción no alcanza; otro factor son los precios, porque van 3 años que los precios van a la baja, de hecho son precios por debajo de los costos de producción, esto ha hecho que la demanda sea mayor", dijo.

description.hltext_display: Explosion on movie set injures six people
description.author: the Canadian Press
description.content:
A propane explosion on the set of a movie starring Dolph Lundgren sent six people to hospital, including actors wearing makeup and medieval costumes.
The blast happened yesterday afternoon in Golden Ears Provincial Park, east of Vancouver, on the set of In the Name of the King 2.
Six people suffered minor burns and one had a broken leg, said Chief Dane Spence of the Maple Ridge Fire Department.

Six people suffered minor burns and one had a broken leg

description.hltext_display: FPF não muda estatutos antes das eleições
description.content:
Presidente da assembleia geral indeferiu um requerimento apresentado por Fernando Gomes para debater uma nova proposta estatutária. Presidente da AF de Lisboa discorda da decisão.
As eleições para a Federação Portuguesa de Futebol (FPF) vão mesmo decorrer de acordo com os actuais estatutos. Isto depois de o presidente da assembleia geral (AG), Avelino Ribeiro, ter inviabilizado um requerimento apresentado pela Liga para convocar uma AG para 25 de Janeiro do próximo ano, com o objectivo de discutir uma proposta de novos estatutos, de acordo com o novo Regime Jurídico das Federações Desportivas (RJFD).
A proposta foi apresentada por Fernando Gomes, presidente da Liga Portuguesa de Futebol Profissional (LPFP), na última AG da FPF, no sábado passado, onde foram aprovadas as contas referentes ao último exercício federativo. O responsável pelas competições profissionais pretenderia apresentar uma proposta de novos estatutos, baseada num anterior documento elaborado pelas associações, ainda que com algumas alterações. Este documento pretendia ser um compromisso para sanar o braço-de-ferro latente nos últimos meses entre o movimento associativo e o Governo, que já levou à suspensão de parte do estatuto de utilidade pública da FPF.
Fernando Gomes decidiu avançar após um conselho de presidentes de clubes da LPFP (realizado no dia 8 de Outubro) o ter mandatado, por unanimidade, para encontrar uma solução que levasse à aprovação de novos estatutos na FPF, para este organismo reentrar na legalidade. O dirigente conseguiu reunir o apoio de mais de 40 por cento dos votos na AG (correspondentes à Liga, representantes dos árbitros e jogadores) e propor a realização de uma reunião magna para discutir a sua solução estatutária.
Esta hipótese caiu, no entanto, por terra face à decisão do presidente da AG. Avelino Ribeiro justificou a sua posição com o facto de ter já sido desencadeado o processo eleitoral para os órgãos sociais da FPF, marcado para o dia 5 de Fevereiro do próximo ano, com as listas candidatas a terem de ser entregues até dia 10 de Janeiro.
A decisão da AG da FPF apanhou de surpresa algumas associações que pretendiam resolver este diferendo. "Não faz sentido fazer eleições sem aprovar os novos estatutos, uma vez que estamos muitíssimo perto de chegar a um consenso. Ou pensávamos que estávamos", defendeu ao PÚBLICO Carlos Ribeiro, presidente da Associação de Futebol de Lisboa.
Apesar de tudo, este responsável admitiu que, neste momento, não existe unanimidade no movimento associativo. "Não me parece que as associações estejam num bloco. Do meu ponto de vista, existem sensibilidades diferentes no âmbito das associações quanto à decisão de aprovar novos estatutos. Existem várias associações que racionalmente pensam que esta situação já atingiu o seu limite e querem adaptar os estatutos à nova lei", referiu.

description.hltext_display: "El Brujo" Javier Bátiz visitó en exclusiva la Redacción de EL SOL DE MÉXICO para dar a conocer su deseo de actuar en el Vive Latino.
description.content:
Ricardo Hernández / El Sol de México
Ciudad de México.- Primera de dos partes"El Brujo" Javier Bátiz visitó en exclusiva la Redacción de EL SOL DE MÉXICO para dar a conocer su deseo de actuar en el Vive Latino, además de que se encuentra buscando disquera y oportunidades para actuar en conciertos masivos en la capital mexicana, aprovechando también para promover la comedia fílmica Suave Patria, donde acaba de actuar al lado de Omar Chaparro, Adrián Uribe y Karla Souza.
De visita en el Distrito Federal (donde vivió algún tiempo en la colonia Moctezuma, en la que una calle lleva su nombre) para pasar la Navidad y el Año Nuevo al lado de su hermana, la cantante Baby Bátiz, el famoso guitarrista tijuanense, que indujo a Carlos Santana a tocar dicho instrumento, comentó que también vino a negociar con una empresa de instrumentos musicales para comercializar una guitarra que bautizó como Tijuanera, que junto con un amplificador podrían llevar el nombre de "Combo Tijuanero"."Nunca ha habido una guitarra con mi nombre porque no lo había buscado, pero ahora espero poder concretar esa idea que surgió en mi mente hace tiempo. La guitarra que diseñé me ha acompañado en los últimos años como se nota en ella, pues tiene ya muchos rasguños y caídas, pero sigue sonando bastante bien."Otro motivo de mi vista a la capital mexicana es la de ver si encuentro compañía disquera porque desafortunadamente Discos Denver, donde estuve durante 17 años, no pudo seguir adelante, pero estoy muy agradecido con su director Octavio Aguilera, ya que ahí grabé 28 discos, aproximadamente."Ahora espero negociar con alguna disquera trasnacional para difundir la música que traigo ahora para darla a conocer a un nivel más amplio. Asimismo, aprovecharé para acudir a varios programas de televisión y radio, conducidos por René Franco, Ricardo Rocha y Omar Chaparro, entre otros", expresó el bajacaliforniano, quien para despedir el 2010 actuará el 31 de diciembre en el Bife del Padrino en el municipio de Naucalpan y el 7 de enero en la marisquería El Maleconero (al lado de 5Fingers), de San Cristóbal Ecatepec, Estado de México. Además, el 8 de enero lo hará en el 246 de las calles de Querétaro, casi esquina con Insurgentes, en la colonia Roma.
El legendario músico y compositor de 66 años, que cuenta con influencias de gente como Robert Jhonson, Muddy Waters, B.B. King, Elmore James y Chuck Berry, se encuentra celebrando 53 años de trayectoria artística, mismos que desea festejar en la próxima edición del Vive Latino, a celebrarse durante el mes de abril durante tres días."Quiero ir al Vive Latino, por lo que estoy buscando los contactos para lograrlo. Creo que sería bueno que el Bátiz estuviera ahí al lado de otros artistas latinoamericanos, ya que además ese festival se ha vuelto un excelente escaparate internacional", expresó con su ríspida voz el singular personaje que sigue luciendo su larga cabellera ensortijada (que ya luce algunas canas), su barba y sus clásicos lentes oscuros, con los que ha recorrido prácticamente todos los estados del país y muchas ciudades de Estados Unidos, donde su música sigue sonando. (CONTINUARÁ MAÑANA)

description.hltext_display: Endurecen seguridad de envíos a EU por temporada
description.content:
Cada paquete con peso mayor a 450gr debe presentarse abierto para que el personal de ventanilla lo revise
Villahermosa, Tabasco
Reducir/Ampliar
Original y copia, una identificación oficial, comprobante de domicilio y carta membretada de la empresa remitente, firmada por su jefe de Recursos Humanos, en la que se hace constar que dicha persona labora en la compañía, son algunas de los nuevas reglas que deberán cumplirse al momento de realizar envíos hacia Estados Unidos, a través del Servicio Postal Mexicano (Sepomex).
Las nuevas reglas dadas a conocer por la Secretaría de Comunicaciones y Transportes (SCT), será sólo en mensajería y paquetería con peso superior a 450 gramos, de manera temporal, en cualquiera de las más de mil 500 oficinas de atención al público del organismo descentralizado, sin excepción alguna. Entre los requisitos destaca que cada paquete con peso mayor a 450 gramos debe presentarse abierto para que el personal de ventanilla revise que su contenido coincida con la descripción de la declaración, y las personas físicas que lo envíen deben presentar, en original y copia, una identificación oficial y comprobante de domicilio del remitente.
Si el domicilio de identificación es igual al del remitente, no es necesario el comprobante de residencia. Quien entregue el envío en ventanilla, también deberá llenar y firmar el formato de Declaración de la situación del remitente de envíos mayores a 450 gramos, independientemente del de Declaración Aduanal que se entrega regularmente.

description.hltext_display: 三亚：样照似孙女老太欲索还 儿子争夺被人打伤眼
description.content:
12月20日晚上7时，在三亚海边从事快照的王女士向商报记者反映，她妹夫周某上午揽客时，一位老妇人声称周某手上拿的样照是她孙女的照片，要周某把照片还给她，双方争抢中发生肢体冲突，导致老妇人的儿子刘某眼角出血，派出所将周某关了起来。记者随后在派出所了解到，刘某被鉴定为轻微伤，如果调解不成，周某将面临多日拘留的处罚。
王女士告诉记者，当日上午10时左右，他们多人在三亚湾海边招揽生意，其中妹夫周某在滨海路吉祥街路口的海滩上揽客，周某看到海边有一位老妇人，于是上前拿着样照给老妇人看，老妇人突然声称其中一张样照是她孙女的照片，因此让周某把相片还给她。被周某拒绝后，老妇人纠缠不休，随后叫来了5个人，因双方争吵升级发生肢体冲突。在推搡中导致老妇人儿子刘某眼角受伤出血，刘某当场报警，警察随后就将周某带到派出所。
王女士说，冲突中刘某的确受伤，而周某遭到5人围攻，说不定也有内伤。再者照片上小女孩是朋友的孩子，刘某家人认错了，导致事件发生，所以刘某也有一定责任。
随后记者从受理此案的新居派出所了解到，经调查，此事确实因老妇人误以为孙女相片被当作样照，随后冲突导致刘某眼角受伤，被鉴定为轻微伤，而周某没有任何伤，按照相关规定，如果调解不成，周某将面临多日拘留的处罚。

description.hltext_display: SCB: PPI +0,8% I NOVEMBER, +2,2% JMF NOVEMBER 2009 (NY)
description.content:
(Tillägg: från stycke tre)
STOCKHOLM (Direkt) Producentpriserna steg med 0,2
procent i november, jämfört med månaden före, och steg med
2,2 procent jämfört med samma månad föregående år, enligt
statistik från SCB.
Enligt SME Direkt räknade analytiker med att PPI
skulle stiga med 0,5 procent från månaden före och stiga med
1,9 procent från samma månad i fjol.
Elektricitetspriserna steg med 5,8 procent jämfört
med oktober, och med 11,7 jämfört med november 2009.
Enligt tullverkets valutakurser stärktes kronan med
1,4 procent mot dollarn, stärktes med 1,2 procent mot
brittiska pund samt försvagades med 2,3 procent mot euron.
Kronan stärktes samtidigt med 1,1 procent mot den norska
kronan.
Procentuell förändring:
m/m y/y
PPI 0,8 2,2
PPI hemmamarknad 0,7 4,0
Exportpriser 1,0 0,3
Importpriser 1,0 0,1
Pris inhemsk tillg 0,9 2,1
-konsumtionsvaror 0,6 0,5

-insatsvaror 0,5 3,8
Energirelater varor 3,0 9,7

description.hltext_display: Newmark Security PLC Interim Results
description.content: Press Release 22 December 2010 Newmark Security plc ("Newmark" or the "Group") Interim Results Newmark Security plc (AIM:NWT), a leading provider of electronic and physical security systems, today announces its interim results for the six months ended 31 October 2010. Highlights: Electronic Division -- Appointment of Lee Abraham to the Board of Grosvenor Technology as Sales and Marketing Director bringing 16 years technical sales experience with both security integrators and manufacturers -- First working demonstration of SATEON access to be previewed at the Intersec exhibition in Dubai in January 2011 -- Extended Zilog 'EZ' or 'E-Zee' controller range in development and expected to be in production and available to work with SATEON software from May 2011 Asset Protection Division -- Product sales delivered from the start of a programme of work for a large UK bank requiring Eclipse rising screens and to HBOS for a branch reconfiguration programme -- Imminent completion of testing of the Cash in Transit protection case in partnership with Loomis. Production of the first order of 50 units is expected to be completed in March 2011 with a further roll out to other Loomis branches starting after the successful completion of the trial period -- Exclusive 5-year distribution agreement signed by Safetell with Wavetec, a Dubai based technology company to sell its Electronic Queue Management Systems, Information Display Systems, Information Kiosks and other electronic information display products in the UK and Europe -- Service and maintenance sales were up 6.5 per cent. due to an increased scope of work offered by the contract with the new Santander Group -- Support contract with a large financial institution is being finalised which should commence in early 2011 and run for three years Commenting on the results, Maurice Dwek, Chairman of Newmark Security plc, said: "Trading in the current environment continues to be difficult but the Board anticipates an easing of current market constraints resulting in a more positive second half of the financial year. In the longer term, the Group has many exciting developments including the Cash in Transit protection case, the SATEON access control system, the potential new market in the US for OEM products and the Wavetec distribution agreement in the U.K. and Europe. These developments will provide Newmark not only with a strong portfolio of products but also valuable revenue streams going forward." For further information: Newmark Security plc Maurice Dwek, Chairman Tel: +44 (0) 20 7355 0070 Brian Beecraft, Finance Director www.newmarksecurity.com Seymour Pierce Limited Mark Percy / David Foreman, (Corporate Tel: +44 (0) 20 7107 Finance) 8000 Katie Ratner (Corporate Broking) www.seymourpierce.com Media enquiries: Abchurch Henry Harrison-Topham / Mark Dixon/ Tel: +44 (0) 20 7398 Claire Dickinson 7718 mark.dixon@abchurch-group.com www.abchurch-group.com Notes to editors Newmark Security PLC is a leading provider of electronic and physical security systems, which focus on personal security and the safety of assets. Operating through two established and wholly owned divisions, Grosvenor Technology (Electronic) and Safetell (Asset Protection), the Group listed on AIM in 1997. Founded in 1989 Grosvenor Technology provides state of the art access control, security and data acquisition systems delivered via its flagship JANUS access platform and its CUSTOM brand OEM product range. Clients include BAE Systems, UK Air Traffic Control, BSkyB, Merrill Lynch (Europe, Middle East and Asia) as well as M&S, Morrisons, Tesco, Network Rail, British Royal Palaces, government departments and many universities. More information can be found at www.gtl.biz Offering staff and asset protection since 1987, Safetell is the UK's leading provider of fixed and reactive security screens, reception counters, cash management systems and associated security equipment. Safetell's customers range from leading blue chip organisations to single sites including banks and building societies, police forces and the Post Office, local authorities and government departments, forecourt retailers and supermarket chains. More information can be found at www.safetell.co.uk CHAIRMAN'S STATEMENT Overview The Board is pleased to announce the Group's interim results for the six months ended 31 October 2010. As stated in the annual report, trading in the first few months of the period was variable due to delays in customers placing orders prior to the general election and the emergency budget. Unfortunately this pattern has continued with the state of the economy affecting most of the Group's customers and in particular the public sector. Revenue in the period for continuing businesses of GBP6,085,000 was 13 per cent. below the corresponding period last year of GBP6,993,000. Earnings per share were 0.08 pence per share (2009: 0.17 pence per share). A detailed review of the activities, results and future developments of each division is set out below. FINANCIAL RESULTS Electronic Division Turnover for the six months ended 31 October 2010: GBP2,932,000 (2009: GBP3,400,000) Operating profit for the six months ended 31 October 2010: GBP441,000 (2009: GBP804,000) Revenue from JANUS access control systems fell but the Board consider that the result was better than across the access control market in the UK as a whole during 2010, and margins were reduced due to pricing pressures and the mix of business. JANUS Enterprise, Grosvenor's current high-end enterprise access solution, remains a key offering with its unique features for the larger client and there is evidence of a growing interest and quote book for this type of system. Health and safety features that are being introduced to JANUS Enterprise, such as advanced people-in-area tracking, employee passport records that include training and induction records, and proactive alerting to managers when training needs to be renewed, are all attracting particular interest. SATEON access will be previewed at the Intersec exhibition in Dubai in January 2011 including switchable on-the-fly English, Arabic, Turkish and Russian language capabilities. There will also be a preview of a completely new range of access controllers. In response to market research in both the UK and Middle East, Africa and Russia ("MEAR") the Group is developing an 'Extended Zilog' controller range. The EZ or E-Zee series is expected to be in production and available to work with SATEON software from May 2011. The EZ series will have more advanced features compared to existing JANUS hardware but the key element of the EZ controllers will be that hardware options will need to be added to the basic controller rather than being included arbitrarily as happens with JANUS controllers. The Group expects that this will improve the attractiveness of new system sales in the UK and will reinforce the Group's position in the UK and provide a solid and competitive platform to take SATEON to new territories and business partners globally. Sales of data collection products in the period were 14 per cent. lower than the same period last year (GBP1,033,000 compared to GBP1,202,000), reflecting the problems of economies across the Group's geographical customer base. However the Board remains very excited about future business in this sector. Negotiations with potential partners in the USA have progressed to the stage where the Group has possible future projects with orders for terminals numbering in the hundreds. The potential here is considerable with the Group's first three target partners having a combined annual requirement equivalent to 400 per cent. of Grosvenor's last year's total output of data collection terminals. The combination of the CUSTOM IT Linux terminals and CUSTOM Exchange middleware has generated positive reactions from customers. Within the last week we received a first order from one of these target customers (albeit a small one). Sales of N-TEC Access control systems have diminished partly due to price in a very competitive market, but also because the product lacks local language support such as Arabic and Turkish. Installation engineers can use English versioned software whereas local system operators normally require their own language. However, both of these issues have been addressed with the SATEON version of N-TEC which is expected to be released in May 2011. I am pleased to announce the recent appointment of Lee Abraham to the Board of Grosvenor Technology as Sales and Marketing Director. Lee is highly regarded for his exceptional management skills and in depth knowledge of how to win new business in competitive and congested markets and is a specialist in the design, sale and deployment of integrated IP network CCTV, access control and alarm based technology systems. With over 16 years technical sales experience with both security integrators and manufacturers, Lee joins Grosvenor from a leading manufacturer of enterprise end-to-end IP Video and Security Management Systems where he held the position of UK Sales Director. Asset Protection Division Turnover 6 months 31 October 2010: GBP3,153,000 (2009: GBP3,593,000) Operating profit 6 months 31 October 2010: GBP328,000 (2009: GBP389,000) Turnover in the Asset Protection Division was 12 per cent. lower than the corresponding period last year mainly due to the completion of the Post Office programme to refurbish Crown Offices in April, and the lack of any new major programme of work to replace this project. In addition, the Government announcements in April that Public Sector spending would be curtailed resulted in a reduction in orders from this sector. However the division has delivered product sales including the start of a programme of work for a large UK bank requiring Eclipse rising screens. In addition, sales of Eclipse rising screens to HBOS for a branch reconfiguration programme increased in the period and are expected to continue in the second half of the year. CounterShield Sales were 50 per cent. lower than the corresponding period last year due to the Public Sector budget cuts and, although Eye2Eye sales were 31 per cent. lower, improved order intake is expected to contribute to sales in the second half. The Post Office sub-post office network continue to place orders for cash handling equipment, but the anticipated roll out of the WH Smith Post Office agency branches has not materialised as expected. Fixed Glazing sales were 3 per cent. lower with orders received from long-standing customers. The roll out of the ATM Protection (UK) Limited ("ATMPUK") Cash in Transit protection case has been delayed due to product improvement after several months of testing. ATMPUK is working closely with Loomis in the development of the product and testing is expected to be completed in December with production of the first order of 50 units expected to be completed in March 2011. The product improvements should result in a shortened trial period and the roll out to other Loomis branches should start after the successful completion of the trial period. Safetell has signed an exclusive distribution agreement with Wavetec, a Dubai-based technology company to sell its Electronic Queue Management Systems, Information Display Systems, Information Kiosks and other electronic information display products in the UK and Europe. This five year agreement will open new markets, but also allow Safetell to expand its product offering to its current customer base. Sales of the Queue Management Systems are expected towards the end of the financial year, with sales of Information Display Systems materialising in the new financial year, although we have recently received a first small order for the latter. Service and maintenance sales were up 6.5 per cent. as the division capitalised on the increased scope of work the new Santander Group contract offers. Our multi-faceted service offering is attractive to blue chip customers who wish to reduce costs associated with having an excessive number of single skilled service providers. A support contract with a large financial institution is being finalised which should commence in early 2011 and run for three years. Safetell is confident that winning the new support contract will result in an increase in product sales to this client. Current initiatives include IT developments to improve stock control systems managing a diverse range of spares with a reduction of the working capital requirement. Balance sheet and cash flow Sales have varied over the period by different amounts within both our operating divisions and therefore net working capital has fluctuated significantly. It has been possible to reduce our stock holding still further as the stock for the old product ranges has been run down. Tight control on debtors has been maintained, and with our good communications with customers we have not incurred any bad debts of substance. The total trade debtors figure has not been reduced however due to the fact that many customers have been taking longer to settle our invoices. The investment in the SATEON development in particular has continued with the forthcoming launching of that product in 2011. The cash flow includes the payment of GBP124,000 relating to the payment of elements of the consideration for the acquisition of ATM Protection in April together with the payment of GBP100,000 to creditors at the date of acquisition which were settled as part of the purchase agreement. OUTLOOK Trading in the current environment continues to be difficult but the Board anticipates an easing of current market constraints resulting in a more positive second half of the financial year. In the longer term, the Group has many exciting developments including the Cash in Transit protection case, the SATEON access control system, the potential new market in the US for OEM products and the Wavetec distribution agreement in the U.K. and Europe. These developments will provide Newmark not only with a strong portfolio of products but also valuable revenue streams going forward. M DWEK Chairman 22 December 2010 STATEMENT OF COMPREHENSIVE INCOME For the six months ended 31 October 2010 Unaudited Unaudited Six months Audited Six months ended Year ended ended 31 October 30 April 31 October 2010 2010 2009 Notes GBP'000 GBP'000 GBP'000 Revenue 6,085 13,792 6,993 Cost of sales (3,621) (7,812) (3,917) ----------- ----------- ----------- Gross profit 2,464 5,980 3,076 Abortive acquisition costs - The statutory Annual Report and Financial Statements for 2010 have been filed with the Registrar of Companies. The Independent Auditors' Report on that Annual Report and Financial Statement for 2010 was unqualified, did not draw attention to any matters by way of emphasis, and did not contain a statement under 498(2) or 498(3) of the Companies Act 2006. After making enquiries, the directors have a reasonable expectation that the Company and the Group have adequate resources to continue in operational existence for the foreseeable future. description.hltext_display: "El Brujo" quiere tocar en el Vive Latino
description.content:
Ricardo Hernández / El Sol de México
Ciudad de México.- Primera de dos partes"El Brujo" Javier Bátiz visitó en exclusiva la Redacción de EL SOL DE MÉXICO para dar a conocer su deseo de actuar en el Vive Latino, además de que se encuentra buscando disquera y oportunidades para actuar en conciertos masivos en la capital mexicana, aprovechando también para promover la comedia fílmica Suave Patria, donde acaba de actuar al lado de Omar Chaparro, Adrián Uribe y Karla Souza.
De visita en el Distrito Federal (donde vivió algún tiempo en la colonia Moctezuma, en la que una calle lleva su nombre) para pasar la Navidad y el Año Nuevo al lado de su hermana, la cantante Baby Bátiz, el famoso guitarrista tijuanense, que indujo a Carlos Santana a tocar dicho instrumento, comentó que también vino a negociar con una empresa de instrumentos musicales para comercializar una guitarra que bautizó como Tijuanera, que junto con un amplificador podrían llevar el nombre de "Combo Tijuanero"."Nunca ha habido una guitarra con mi nombre porque no lo había buscado, pero ahora espero poder concretar esa idea que surgió en mi mente hace tiempo. La guitarra que diseñé me ha acompañado en los últimos años como se nota en ella, pues tiene ya muchos rasguños y caídas, pero sigue sonando bastante bien."Otro motivo de mi vista a la capital mexicana es la de ver si encuentro compañía disquera porque desafortunadamente Discos Denver, donde estuve durante 17 años, no pudo seguir adelante, pero estoy muy agradecido con su director Octavio Aguilera, ya que ahí grabé 28 discos, aproximadamente."Ahora espero negociar con alguna disquera trasnacional para difundir la música que traigo ahora para darla a conocer a un nivel más amplio. Asimismo, aprovecharé para acudir a varios programas de televisión y radio, conducidos por René Franco, Ricardo Rocha y Omar Chaparro, entre otros", expresó el bajacaliforniano, quien para despedir el 2010 actuará el 31 de diciembre en el Bife del Padrino en el municipio de Naucalpan y el 7 de enero en la marisquería El Maleconero (al lado de 5Fingers), de San Cristóbal Ecatepec, Estado de México. Además, el 8 de enero lo hará en el 246 de las calles de Querétaro, casi esquina con Insurgentes, en la colonia Roma.
El legendario músico y compositor de 66 años, que cuenta con influencias de gente como Robert Jhonson, Muddy Waters, B.B. King, Elmore James y Chuck Berry, se encuentra celebrando 53 años de trayectoria artística, mismos que desea festejar en la próxima edición del Vive Latino, a celebrarse durante el mes de abril durante tres días."Quiero ir al Vive Latino, por lo que estoy buscando los contactos para lograrlo. Creo que sería bueno que el Bátiz estuviera ahí al lado de otros artistas latinoamericanos, ya que además ese festival se ha vuelto un excelente escaparate internacional", expresó con su ríspida voz el singular personaje que sigue luciendo su larga cabellera ensortijada (que ya luce algunas canas), su barba y sus clásicos lentes oscuros, con los que ha recorrido prácticamente todos los estados del país y muchas ciudades de Estados Unidos, donde su música sigue sonando. (CONTINUARÁ MAÑANA)

description.hltext_display: 对话亚残运会主题歌词作者:一个不能听说的海南小伙
description.content:
http://news.hainan.net/ 时间：2010-12-22 9:03:00 来源：南海网-海南日报
亚残运会主题歌词出自海南万宁人王生宁
19日晚，广州亚运会亚残运会在广州奥林匹克体育中心壮丽闭幕，大型文艺表演《你让世界从此不同》为首届亚洲残疾人体育盛会和整个第十六届广州亚运会画上了圆满的休止符。记者20日从省文体厅获悉，拉开这台晚会序幕的主题歌《你让世界从此不同》的词作者，正是海南万宁人、听力一级残疾的青年词作家王生宁。文艺演出结束后，记者通过电子邮件与不能听说的王生宁进行了一番特殊“对话”，得知了他创作这首动听歌曲的幕后故事。
王生宁在电子邮件中告诉记者，《你让世界从此不同》这首歌的歌词，是今年7月应广州亚运会开闭幕式音乐主创栾凯邀请作词的。王生宁说，由于是命题作文，歌词写了好几个版本，经过了3个多月的修改，于11月份才定稿成最终这个演出版本。“刚开始导演并不提要求，后来不断加要求，开头的主歌部分要有母亲唱给孩子听的感觉，后来又要求加入个人真实感受，结尾还要写出大爱感觉，所以修改了无数次”，王生宁告诉记者，“有时一个字或词的修改要琢磨三五天，真可谓两句三年得呀”，王生宁写道。
王生宁说，本来，这首歌是为天后王菲量身打造的，因为7月份开闭幕式方案确定后就定下了由王菲演唱。“我们也根据她的空灵风格和相关要求定做这样的作品，10月份小样出来后王菲听了也非常喜欢。遗憾的是，到了11月份，王菲因年底演出排练干扰以及一些其他客观原因，最终唱不了了”。王生宁告诉记者，后来导演找了不少知名歌手录小样都不满意，直到闭幕式前20天进亚洲爱乐乐团录音时，导演才决定选用原来录过小样的一位新人雯靖演唱。她的嗓音和风格都跟王菲非常相像，“雯靖的演唱也挺不错的，我们都相信她会是下一个天籁之声传人”，王生宁说。
谈到与青年作曲家、解放军艺术学院音乐系教授栾凯的交往，王生宁还告诉记者这是一段“奇闻”。“我跟栾凯是在网上认识的，但却在心灵中跨越了距离”。王生宁告诉记者，“我们合作这首歌之前，栾凯老师不相信我听不到，他给我打电话，我接不了，我同学接。听到我的情况后，他的眼眶湿润了，这是我同学后来告诉我的。”王生宁告诉记者，“或许我们都是做文艺的，文艺人都很善良，特重感情吧。这样，栾凯老师就把这么大的一个机会给了我，我也觉得我必须好好珍惜，我就拿出了以前为张宏光老师等人写歌词时的干劲，与栾凯老师多次通过QQ聊内容，最终完成了这首歌词的创作。”
据王生宁透露，他今年25岁，但已与央视三套、四套多个栏目合作过。为著名作曲家张宏光写过多首歌词，作品先后被吕薇、郑绪岚、谭晶、庞龙等名歌手演唱，在《词刊》等国家级刊物发表歌词论文、评论多篇，并已结集成《歌词作家作品论析集》一书，对歌词创作颇有心得，这也是他获得栾凯教授及晚会导演认可的基础。另外,王生宁在科研领域也有所成就，本科毕业后撰写了近40万字的中韩文化文学交流学术论著，即将出版专著一本，合著两本。
王生宁告诉记者，他是万宁市万城镇北坡人。从小生活艰辛，依靠国家贷款和勤工俭学，于2008年读完延边大学中文系，目前虽然在北京做专项研究工作，但并没有稳定的生活着落。他一直不忘对歌词创作艺术的追求。他告诉记者，很希望能为家乡写一首歌。得知今年是海南国际旅游岛建设开局之年，他特意创作了一首悠扬的旅游形象歌《海南岛上》，希望能有机会制作推出，为家乡的发展贡献自己的力量。

description.hltext_display: Чудинов: трасса в Парамоново — как квадрат для конькобежцев
description.content: � оссийский скелетонист Сергей Чудинов рассказал о важности технической составляющей этого вида спорта. "Прошлый год у меня получился провальным. После его окончания выяснилось, что выступал на сломанном скелетоне. А я уж совсем отчаялся, чего только не думал. Сейчас хочу попасть в тройку на чемпионатах Европы и мира. Хотя трассы там не совсем "мои" — короткие и не очень сложные. Но меня это не пугает. Вот построили у нас в Парамоново — так скелетон там вообще не едет. Это всё равно, что конькобежцам, которые привыкли бегать по овалу, построили бы квадрат. Мы там пока, к счастью, не готовимся. Ходят слухи, что такие скелетоны, как у нас, уже в следующем году хотят запретить. Мы выступаем на латышских скелетонах, где рама к обтекателю крепится на силикон. Говорят, что это якобы работает как амортизатор, и нужно крепить на болты. 10 лет катались — и ничего. А как только латыши и русские стали выигрывать, вдруг появились такие подводные камни. В � оссии, если что, придётся менять весь парк скелетонов, даже у молодёжи. Штук 40–50, а это, сами понимаете, непросто", — приводит слова Чудинова "Спорт-экспресс".

description.hltext_display: SCB: PRELIMINÄR BEDÖMNING ROT-AVDRAG SÄNKER KPI MED 0,4%
description.content:
STOCKHOLM (Direkt) KPI justeras nedåt i januari 2011
som en följd av att underlag nu finns tillgängligt vad gäller
utfallet av ROT-stödet 2009. Enligt en preliminär bedömning
som SCB nu gjort skulle stödet ha bidragit till en sänkning
av KPI med storleksordningen 0,4 procent.
Det skriver SCB i ett pressmeddelande på onsdagen.
När ROT-stödet togs med i beräkningarna från och med
maj 2009 beräknades effekten till -0,1 procent baserat på
prognosen från finansdepartementet.
Inflationstal under 2011 kommer att baseras på en så
kallad skuggindexserie där den definitiva effekten tagits med
från maj 2009. Nivåjusteringen kommer därför inte få någon
direkt inverkan på de inflationstal som redovisas för 2011.
Skuggindexserien kommer också ligga till grund för
reviderade utvecklingstal under perioden maj 2009 till april
2010, skriver SCB.
Makroredaktionen +46 8 5191 7931
Nyhetsbyrån Direkt

description.hltext_display: Aumenta 30% subcontratación vía outsourcing
description.content:
Abrimos una posibilidad para las pequeñas y medianas empresas, ofreciendo servicios segun sus necesidades
Villahermosa, Tabasco
Reducir/Ampliar
De acuerdo a Adeco, empresa de outsourcing (subcontratación), cada año se emplean más de 22 mil 500 personas por este medio y no por el medio tradicional, lo que representa un crecimiento promedio de 30% al año. Esta situación ha provocado que las outsoursing volteen su mirada a las pequeñas y medianas empresas para introducirse a ese mercado y controlarlo.
Erica Castillo, responsable del programa "Desarrollo para Pymes" de la empresa ADECO, explicó que "Estamos abriendo una posibilidad para la pequeñas y medianas empresas, ofreciendo un portafolio de servicios de acuerdo a sus necesidades para tratar de fortalecerlas en su crecimiento en 6 meses aproximadamente".
Dijo que "el 90 por ciento de la Pymes tienen el potencial de crecimiento y para poder lograrlos necesitan corregir muchas deficiencias que tienen, de lo contrario corren el riesgo de que puedan ser compradas o que alguna competencia en el mercado pueda eliminarla con facilidad". Las outsourcing están ofreciendo a las Pymes cuestionarios vía Internet para realizarles un diagnóstico para luego brindarles las posibles soluciones que necesitan corregir para el negocio y recursos humanos y empezar la consultoría y un crecimiento de 15 al 30 por ciento en ventas.

description.hltext_display: El 'Gordo' ha visitado en dos ocasiones Logroño
description.author: EUROPA PRESS
description.content:
EUROPA PRESS El 'Gordo' de la Lotería de Navidad ha visitado la ciudad de Logroño en dos ocasiones, lejos de las 72 veces en las que ha recaído en Madrid en toda la historia del sorteo, según datos del Organismo Nacional de Loterías (ONLAE). El 'Gordo' de la Lotería de Navidad ha visitado la ciudad de Logroño en dos ocasiones, lejos de las 72 veces en las que ha recaído en Madrid en toda la historia del sorteo, según datos del Organismo Nacional de Loterías (ONLAE). Ampliar foto El año pasado, la capital ha vuelto a acoger al número afortunado en el sorteo, repitiendo suerte por tercera vez consecutiva. Por el contrario, Barcelona —la segunda ciudad más afortunada— no ha sido agraciada el año pasado, por lo que mantiene la cifra de 37 'Gordos' del año pasado.
A ésta le siguen Sevilla, con quince, Valencia y Bilbao, con once y Zaragoza y Cádiz, con diez cada una. También han recibido la suerte de forma múltiple Santander en ocho ocasiones, Málaga y Granada, en siete, San Sebastián y Alicante en seis, Palma de Mallorca y Gijón en cinco, La Coruña y Vic (Barcelona) en cuatro y Badajoz, Burgos, Lugo, Pamplona y Sort (Lérida) en tres.
El 'Gordo' ha visitado en dos ocasiones Sabadell, Córdoba, Linares (Jaén), Lérida, Alora (Málaga), Murcia, Palencia, Logroño, Segovia, Alcira y Manises (Valencia), Vitoria y Valladolid.
De las grandes ciudades, sólo ha pasado una vez por Almería, Castellón, Ciudad Real, Cuenca, Guadalajara, Huesca, León, Oviedo, Pontevedra, Las Palmas y Teruel, además de en otras localidades de menor tamaño.

description.hltext_display: 三亚查处交通违法 一年行政拘留710人[图]
description.content:
三亚交警在街头查处交通违法行为
商报记者从三亚警方获悉，今年以来，三亚市公安局交警支队多措并举，规范交通秩序，缓解道路拥堵，共查处交通违法行为12万余起，行政拘留违法人员710人，市区道路交通管理工作逐步走上规范化。
今年以来，三亚市委市政府加大了交通设施投入，共改造交通标志牌263块，增设交通标志牌439块、交通护栏3200米，新建红绿灯灯控系统、移动式灯控设备7套。与此同时，三亚多警种联动综合治理交通，通过开展专项行动，建立整治机制。共查处交通违法行为12万余起，其中扣车9952辆，刑事拘留30人，行政拘留710人。(驻三亚记者 柴彦明 特约记者 张运煦 摄影报道)

description.hltext_display: The world of sports on television just gets wider and wider
description.content:
These are 20 (more) facts, tried and true, about the widening world of sports television:
1. Have I ever mentioned that ex-jocks in the booth are sort of the athlete's foot of broadcasting?
2. If replay is going to involve coaches' challenges, somehow Regis Philbin should be part of the whole deal.
3. I was in a bar the other night and the barflies voted 4-3 to put hockey on the TV instead of "Dog the Bounty Hunter."
4. Sports talkers these days have mastered a specious skill: raising their voices without saying a thing.
5. If the eTrade baby replaced Tony Siragusa in the Fox end zone, I can't say there'd be a big drop-off in deep thought.
6. The Jewish Channel has "Rabbis Roundtable." It's pretty much "Around the Horn" with guilt.
7. ESPN's "30 for 30" series is a critical success (and deservedly so), but each time I graze upon any HBO Sports documentary, it reminds me those folks still set the gold standard.
8. By installing a flat screen in my shower, I never miss "SportsCenter."
(Column Intermission I: Earlier this autumn, author John Feinstein blurted an obscenity when involved in a fender bender while on an ESPN 980 radio show in Washington, D.C. This marks the third decade in which he has uttered a profanity on live airwaves, which, according to the Elias Sports Bureau, is a U.S. record.)
9. New drinking game: Every time ESPN's Rob Stone says "hambone" during a Pro Bowlers Tour telecast, I swig a PBR and crush the can.
10. It is inexplicable that some suit at Fox signed off on its new NFL in-game score box where the viewer must decipher team logos to figure out who's playing.
11. Seemingly effortlessly, Turner's Ernie Johnson is an eminently likable broadcaster.
12. On CBS' "The NFL Today," Norman Esiason often prefaces statements by saying "I'll tell you . . . " or "I'll tell you what . . . " or "I'll tell you something . . . " And then he tells you nothing.
13. Every time I see James L. Brooks' classic 1987 movie "Broadcast News" -- I'm approaching 50 viewings -- it appears better, smarter and funnier than before.
14. If NBC's NFL insider Peter King were an air traffic controller, a lot of planes would miss a lot of runways.
15. Sometimes I hit the mute button when I'm watching the World Series of Poker on ESPN, but my therapist says that's a form of self-mutilation.
16. Fox's Darryl Johnston never takes a play off. I wish he would.
(Column Intermission II: Here's my bigger problem with John Feinstein's foul-language wont: In pre-cell days, he would pull off the highway to make his never-ending radio appearances from pay phones. Now, with the new technology, he's endangering the lives of more than just his radio listeners by driving and talk-radioing at the same time.)
17. "Victory" is a better name for a sports cable network than "Versus." Heck, In Vitro is a better name than Versus.
18. Would it kill Curt Gowdy to rise from the grave and do "The American Sportsman" one more time?
19. After an incident at my second wedding, we banned clappers from my third wedding.
20. ESPN's Jon Gruden likes the term "hidden yardage," which, I assume, is yardage you cannot see. So if you can't see it, how do officials mark it?
Ask The Slouch
Q. Anonymous sources have reported the Kentucky's men's basketball program still has a senior on the team. Who has jurisdiction to investigate, the NBA or the NCAA? (Steve Wills; Carmel, Ind.)
A. Pay the man, Shirley.

event_or_fact.property: a profanity on live airwaves, which, according to the Elias Sports Bureau, is a U.S. record.) 9

description.hltext_display: DC Chief Lanier Talks About Her Future
description.content:
WASHINGTON - For the first time since last summer DC Police Chief Cathy Lanier met with reporters and answered questions Thursday on a variety of topics.
Revealing that she has met with the transition team assembled by Mayor-elect Vincent Gray but has not been told if she will remain as chief.
On the WTOP program Ask the Chief, Lanier told reporter Mark Seagraves she would like to keep the job.
Segraves asked, “Would you like to stay on as Chief of police?” Chief Lanier answered, "Of course I would, I'm a career employee here, I love the city and I love what I do".
(Segraves) “Have you told Mayor-elect Gray that you want to stay?”
(Lanier) “Of course, of course.”
(Segraves) “And you want to keep your command staff in place?”
(Lanier) "Sure."
(Segraves) “And he has given you no indication on what he plans on doing?”
(Lanier) "Not yet."
Chief Lanier also made her first public comments on the investigation of Assistant Chief Diane Groomes, who has been suspended with pay. Lanier told Segraves,
"The allegation that was made is the Assistant Chief may have compromised the test that was administered to some members of the command staff, so I think that narrows it down a little bit more, that the testing environment may have been compromised for a limited number of folks, the investigation is underway, I think I have to handle it as I would for anybody else and I think I have and when the investigation is complete there may be more that I can say."
Outside WTOP Lanier refused to provide further details.
The Chief did confirm her salary of $225,000 a year, which includes a very comfortable pension.
"I think it's 71.5 percent, (Segraves) and we are all math wiz's here so your retirement package comes out to about $160,000 a year.”
"Yeah, I guess," said Lanier.
When Segraves asked, "Why stay?”
Lanier answered, "Because I love what I do".

event_or_fact.property: she would like to keep the job

description.hltext_display: Los riojanos jugarán este miércoles unos 101,24 euros por habitante
description.author: EUROPA PRESS
description.content:
EUROPA PRESS Los riojanos jugarán este miércoles en el sorteo extraordinario de la Lotería de Navidad 101,24 euros por habitante. Los riojanos jugarán este miércoles en el sorteo extraordinario de la Lotería de Navidad 101,24 euros por habitante. Ampliar foto Las comunidades autónomas con mayor consignación este año son Madrid con 527.409.200 euros, Cataluña con 502.554,800 euros y la Comunidad Valenciana con 399.038.480 euros, según Loterías y Apuestas del Estado.
A estas tres comunidades le siguen Andalucía, Castilla y León con 250.571.000 euros y el País Vasco con 177.355.400 euros. Las de menor consignación son Navarra con 35.728.800 euros y La Rioja con 32.569.000 euros.
En cifras nacionales y por comunidades, La Rioja, una de las de menor consignación absoluta, está a la cabeza con una consignación de 101,24 euros por habitante, seguida de Castilla y León con 97,74 euros por habitante, Asturias con 91,73 euros y Aragón con 85,78 euros. Las de menor consignación por habitante son Baleares, con 39,76 euros; Canarias, con 41,70 euros; Andalucía, con 47,35 y Extremadura, con 55,08 euros.

description.hltext_display: Facebook's Zuckerberg visits Chinese tech firms
description.author: Michael Kan
description.content:
Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg continued his tour of China on Wednesday and met the head of Sina, the operator of a popular microblogging service and internet portal.
Zuckerberg visited Sina CEO Charles Chao to talk about China's internet market, said Sina spokesman Liu Qi.
"(Zuckerberg) exchanged his views on China's internet market and wanted to understand Sina's Weibo (microblog), the hottest internet product in the country," Liu added.
Photos of Zuckerberg making his visit also appeared on a Chinese microblog.
Zuckerberg said he would visit China during the holidays, given that his girlfriend has family in the country, according to an interview with Time Magazine. But starting this week, the Facebook CEO has been spotted visiting major tech companies in Beijing.
On Monday, Zuckerberg made a visit to Baidu, China's largest search engine, where he met with senior staff including the company's CEO Robin Li.
Local Chinese news outlets also reported that on Tuesday Zuckerberg visited China Mobile, the country's largest mobile carrier. China Mobile, however, has yet to confirm whether a meeting took place.
China is one of the world's largest internet markets, with more than 420 million internet users. But Facebook, which has more than 500 million active users, is currently blocked in the country, along with other popular US sites such as Twitter and Facebook. The Chinese government limits access to certain internet content it deems inappropriate or politically sensitive.
Meanwhile, other social networking sites from Chinese companies like Kaixin001.com or Renren.com have already become popular in the country.
Sina operates one of the country's leading internet portals. The company also launched its Weibo microblogging service in August 2009, only to see it attract more than 50 million users in over a year. Sina's CEO has said he believes the microblog's user base will reach 100 million by the first half of 2011. He has also added that the microblog should start making ad revenue next year.

event_or_fact.property: the microblog should start making ad revenue next year.

description.hltext_display: Orçamentos para os estádios da Copa-2014 não incluem itens essenciais; falta até grama
description.content: Depois de gastar R$ 696 milhões, o Distrito Federal terá construído uma estádio sem cobertura, sem telão, sem cabos de internet ou de transmissão de TV. Até mesmo sem gramado. Nenhum dos itens foi incluído na licitação para a construção do Estádio Nacional de Brasília, arena que receberá partidas da Copa do Mundo de 2014. Danilo Verpa- 01.dez.2010/Folhapress Funcionário trata o gramado do Castelão de Fortaleza Leia mais (22/12/2010 - 07h00)

description.hltext_display: 海南省工商局政务中心暂停办公两天 年检不受影响
description.content:
省工商局政务中心暂停办公两天
年检不受影响
从12月22日下午6时开始至27日，因省政府电子政务平台中心机房搬迁的需要，海南省工商行政管理业务信息系统暂停办公4天(其中两天为周末，属正常休息)。27日(下周一)上午8时将在位于五指山路的新址恢复正常办公。
记者了解到，搬迁期间，机关企业、个体登记、年检等行政许可业务将暂停办理。
政务服务中心一位工作人员告诉记者，由于年检期限是以月为计算单位，这2天暂停办理，年检不会受影响。此次暂停业务对在市工商局和工商所办理业务的经营者也没影响。(见习记者 王渝)

description.hltext_display: Marquinhos deixa o Santos e vai para o Avaí, que também leva Maranhão
description.content:
O Avaí anunciou nesta terça-feira, por meio de seu Twitter oficial, o retorno de um dos maiores ídolos de sua torcida: o meia Marquinhos, que jogou todo o ano de 2010 no Santos. O clube paulista confirmou a negociação, que acontece por empréstimo, e acrescentou que o lateral-direito Maranhão também foi cedido aos catarinenses.
“O Anjo Loiro voltou! Apresentação da contratação de Marquinhos será amanhã. às 10h, na Ressacada, com portões abertos”, diz o tweet oficial do Avaí. O jogador, de 29 anos e que possui até homenagem na Ressacada, foi revelado em 1999 pelo clube, que também defendeu em 2008 e 2009.
O meia também tem passagens por São Paulo, Flamengo, Paraná, Coritiba, Atlético-MG e Bayer Leverkusen, da Alemanha. Contratado pelo Santos em janeiro de 2010, teve uma passagem irregular na Vila Belmiro, na qual alternou bons momentos - principalmente no primeiro semestre, quando ganhou o Campeonato Paulista e a Copa do Brasil - e apresentações discretas.
Marquinhos possui tanto prestígio no Avaí que, em 2009, antes de um jogo contra o Corinthians pelo Campeonato Brasileiro, colocou seus pés na Calçada da Fama da Ressacada, juntamente com Ronaldo. Seu único título pelo clube, no entanto, foi o Campeonato Catarinense de 2009.

description.hltext_display: 三轮车避让摩托 琼海3岁女孩路边玩耍被撞死
description.content:
三轮车避让摩托
3岁女孩被撞死
12月19日晚，琼海市东平农场东平大道发生一起交通事故。一辆三轮车在行驶途中避让摩托车时冲向路边玩游戏的孩子，一名3岁女孩不幸被撞身亡。
据目击者称，事发19日晚8时，当时天色已晚，但在事故发生的东平大道上，仍有几名孩子在路边玩闹，其中包括一名3岁的女孩。据称，该路段经常有车辆通过，但很多家长放任孩童在路上玩耍。
事故发生后，琼海交警大队事故处理中队民警迅速赶到现场，及时开展侦查。并将司机黎某带回交警大队进行调查。
据民警介绍，初步调查该起事故是三轮车在避让摩托车时采取措施不当，目前具体的事故原因还在进一步调查当中。 (记者 徐培培)

description.hltext_display: Pacquiao-Mosley to fight May 7
description.author: Marv Dumon
description.content: Boxing� -� Eight-division champion and pound-for-pound king Manny Pacquiao (52-3-2) of the Philippines will face off against former three-division champion Shane Mosley (46-6-1) on May 7, 2011, according to Top Rank CEO Bob Arum.� The bout will take place at the MGM Grand Garden Arena in Las Vegas, Nevada. PHOTOS: Pacquiao vs Mosley will be promoted by Top Rank and the bout will be held at the welterweight limit of 147 pounds.� The Pomona, California native had declared last month that he was a "promotional free agent" having fought under Golden Boy Promotions for years, a rival of Top Rank.� Mosley's move seemed to have cleared the way for a shot at the sport's best boxer.

description.hltext_display: 李冰冰确定加盟海南欢乐节 并献唱歌曲
description.content:
http://news.hainan.net/ 时间：2010-12-22 9:27:00 来源：南海网-海南日报
李冰冰确定献唱欢乐节
本报海口12月21日讯 (记者李冰)记者今天从2010年(第十一届)中国海南岛欢乐节组委会获悉，去年年底凭借《风声》一片荣膺台湾电影金马奖影后桂冠的著名影星李冰冰确定将加盟欢乐节跨年晚会，并献唱歌曲。
近年来，李冰冰参演的《独自等待》、《天下无贼》、《云水谣》、《风声》等电影深受影迷喜爱，并屡获国内外大奖，先后捧得百花影后、华表影后、金马影后等多项桂冠。今年她因出演徐克导演的《狄仁杰之通天帝国》而获第67届威尼斯电影节“最佳女主角”提名;明年初，她与好莱坞巨星休・杰克曼、韩国明星全智贤主演的电影《雪花密扇》也将与全球观众见面。
此次加盟中国海南岛欢乐节，演而优则唱的李冰冰将为观众献上两首来自她自己专辑的歌曲――《时光》和《心的节奏》。

description.hltext_display: Marquinhos e Maranhão vão para o Avaí por empréstimo
description.content:
O Avaí anunciou nesta terça-feira, por meio de seu Twitter oficial, o retorno de um dos maiores ídolos de sua torcida: o meia Marquinhos, que jogou todo o ano de 2010 no Santos. O clube paulista confirmou a negociação, que acontece por empréstimo, e acrescentou que o lateral-direito Maranhão também foi cedido aos catarinenses.
“O Anjo Loiro voltou! Apresentação da contratação de Marquinhos será amanhã. às 10h, na Ressacada, com portões abertos”, diz o tweet oficial do Avaí. O jogador, de 29 anos e que possui até homenagem na Ressacada, foi revelado em 1999 pelo clube, que também defendeu em 2008 e 2009.
O meia também tem passagens por São Paulo, Flamengo, Paraná, Coritiba, Atlético-MG e Bayer Leverkusen, da Alemanha. Contratado pelo Santos em janeiro de 2010, teve uma passagem irregular na Vila Belmiro, na qual alternou bons momentos - principalmente no primeiro semestre, quando ganhou o Campeonato Paulista e a Copa do Brasil - e apresentações discretas.
Marquinhos possui tanto prestígio no Avaí que, em 2009, antes de um jogo contra o Corinthians pelo Campeonato Brasileiro, colocou seus pés na Calçada da Fama da Ressacada, juntamente com Ronaldo. Seu único título pelo clube, no entanto, foi o Campeonato Catarinense de 2009.

description.hltext_display: Signing won't end 'don't ask' right away
description.content:
WASHINGTON, Dec. 22 (UPI) -- A bill being signed into law by President Obama to end the U.S. military's "don't ask, don't tell policy" will not alter the policy immediately, officials said.
The president, along with Defense Secretary Robert Gates and Joint Chiefs of Staff Chairman Adm. Mike Mullen, must first certify to Congress in writing the U.S. armed forces have drafted necessary new policies and regulations and are ready to operate with openly gay, lesbian or bisexual men and women in military service. The certification must also affirm the changes will not hurt troop readiness, cohesion or military recruitment and retention, the new law states.
Once the written notice is submitted, there will be a 60-day waiting period before "don't ask, don't tell" is officially repealed.
U.S. Defense Department spokesman Geoff Morrell said he couldn't predict how long the administration would need to get everything in order, saying only the rules and regulations would be worked out at a "methodical" and "deliberate" pace. White House Press Secretary Robert Gibbs said he didn't expect the process would be "overly burdensome."
Gay rights leaders believe the military could end full enforcement in a matter of weeks, The Washington Post reported. Obama is to sign the bill at 9:15 a.m. EST Wednesday, ending a 17-year ban on gays serving openly in uniform.
A last-ditch effort by Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell, R-Ky., to block the change was blocked late Tuesday night by Sen. Joe Lieberman, I-Conn., Senate aides told Politico.
McConnell had tried to derail the change by adding an amendment to a defense-spending bill that would have required the four military-service chiefs to be part of the Obama-Gates-Mullen certification process.
That would have given U.S. Marine Corps Commandant Gen. James Amos, a vocal opponent of the repeal, power to delay or possibly prevent its implementation, The New York Times reported.

description.hltext_display: NASA's Cassini spacecraft captures dramatic views of Saturn's 2nd largest moon
description.content:
NASA's Cassini spacecraft has captured some dramatic views of Saturn's second largest moon Rhea.
Pictures reveal fractures cutting through craters on the moon's surface, revealing a history of tectonic rumbling.
"These recent, high-resolution Cassini images help us put Saturn's moon in the context of the moons' geological family tree," said Paul Helfenstein, Cassini imaging team associate, based at Cornell University, Ithaca, N.Y.
"Since NASA's Voyager mission visited Saturn, scientists have thought of Rhea and Dione as close cousins, with some differences in size and density. The new images show us they're more like fraternal twins, where the resemblance is more than skin deep. This probably comes from their nearness to each other in orbit," he added.
During the March flyby, Cassini made its closest approach to Rhea's surface so far, swooping within 100 kilometers (62 miles) of the moon.
Other pictures show a web of bright, "wispy" fractures resembling some that were first spotted on another part of Rhea by the two Voyager spacecraft in 1980 and 1981.
Since July 2004, Cassini's imaging cameras have captured pictures the trailing hemispheres of both satellites several times at much higher resolution - revealing that the wispy markings are actually exposures of bright ice along the steep walls of long scarps, or lines of cliffs.
This means that tectonic activity produced the features rather than cryovolcanism.
Images of densely cratered plains indicate that Rhea has not experienced much internal activity but suggest that some regions have ruptured in response to tectonic stress more recently.
The side of the moon that faces Saturn a slightly bluer area, possibly due to different surface compositions or to different sizes and fine-scale textures of the grains making up the moon's icy soil.
In future, Cassini will continue to chart the terrain of this and other Saturn moons.
"The 11th of January 2011 will be especially exciting, when Cassini flies just 76 kilometers [47 miles] above the surface of Rhea," said Thomas Roatsch, a Cassini imaging team scientist based at the German Aerospace Center Institute of Planetary Research in Berlin.
"These will be by far the best images we've ever had of Rhea's surface-details down to just a few meters will become recognizable." (ANI)
SEARCH

description.hltext_display: Havsa'daki Fırınlara Şafak Baskını
description.content: - Edirne'nin Havsa ilçesinde ekmek fırınları denetlendi. Havsa Belediyesi Zabıta ekipleri ve Çevre sağlığı Teknisyeni Yıldıray Çetintaş, ilçedeki 7 fırına şafak baskını yaparak denetledi. Ekipler denetimlerde, fırınlarda hijyen ve sağlık kurallara uyulup uyulmadığını ve çalışanlarının sağlık karnelerinin olup olmadığını ve portör muayenelerinin yapılıp yapılmadığını kontrol etti. Üretilen ekmeklerin ve diğer unlu ürünlerin sağlıklı bir ortamda üretilip üretilmediğini de kontrol eden ekipler, işletmelerin yasada belirtilen kurallara dikkat ettiğini tespit etti. Eksik gramajlı ekmeğe rastlamayan ekipler, iş yeri sahiplerini kurallara uydukları için teşekkür edip uyarılarda bulundu. (GÜR-RC-ÜNS) - EDİRNE (Anadolu Ajansı) 1 saat önce..[2430004]

description.hltext_display: 外省黏土砖大量涌入 严重冲击海南“禁实”工作
description.content:
最近一段时间，来自岛外广东、广西等省份的黏土红砖，受利益驱使，大量国家禁止的黏土红砖开始流向我省建筑市场，严重冲击我省的“禁实”工作。
据报料人说：我省开展“禁实”工作轰轰烈烈，先后关闭了很多影响生态环境的黏土砖场，加上海南国际旅游岛建设上升为国家战略后，一些农村地方建房多，受此影响，我省的黏土红砖一度上涨到每块最高达到9角钱的“天价”，甚至还没有货。在此情况下，来自岛外的一些商贩从中发现了商机。
于是，偷偷用木船或汽车，从两广一些地方运到海口，赚取差价。
据了解，由于黏土红砖在两广地区，每块就两角左右，即使运到海口，价格也不到五角，比本地的红砖便宜了很多。
由于有巨大的商机，业内人士估计，每天偷运到海口的红砖在几十万块以上。
业内人士称，由于大量的外地红砖充斥本地市场，给我省本来“禁实”工作带来很大的冲击。由于红砖流通，并没有违反有关法规，所以他们给有关部门做了反映，但效果不大，希望能通过本报进行呼吁，进一步把“禁实”工作落到实处。

description.hltext_display: Il passato e' oggi: Nedved e' Pallone d'oro
description.content:
Il ceco della Juventus precede Thierry Henry e Paolo Maldini
Il 22 dicembre 2003 Nedved vince il Pallone d'oro, piazzandosi davanti a Henry e Maldini. La rivista France Football annuncia che Pavel Nedved, centrocampista della Juventus, viene eletto miglior giocatore d'Europa per il 2003. Il 31enne ceco ha vinto il suo primo Pallone d'Oro dopo aver conquistato lo scudetto 2002/03 e dopo aver portato la sua squadra alla finale di Champions League, partita alla quale non ha preso parte perchè squalificato. A livello internazionale Nedved ha ottenuto la qualificazione con la Repubblica Ceca per l'Europeo 2004, precedendo l'Olanda nel gruppo 3.
Pavel diventa il secondo giocatore ceco, dopo Masopust nel 1962, ad essere incoronato miglior calciatore militante in una squadra europea. Il centrocampista è il sesto bianconero a ricevere il premio, dopo Platini (vincitore nel 1983, 1984 e nel 1985), Sivori (1961), Paolo Rossi (1982), Roberto Baggio (1993) e Zidane (1998). I giornalisti dei 52 Paesi affiliati Uefa hanno riservato ben 62 voti al ceco e hanno decretato il secondo posto per Thierry Henry, attaccante francese dell'Arsenal. Paolo Maldini, campione d'Europa con il Milan, si è piazzato al terzo posto.

description.hltext_display: Laientheater: Benni, der Tresorknacker"
description.content:
Ehingen – Die Ehinger Laienspielgruppe bereitet sich seit Wochen auf das traditionelle Theaterwochenende vor. Die Aufführungen finden in der neu renovierten Mägdeberghalle in Mühlhausen statt, die ein tolles Ambiente bietet.
Nach „Cola, Cash und Kaugummi“ im letzten Jahr kommt in diesem Jahr unter der Regie von Fritz Schoch das Stück: „Benni, der Tresorknacker“ am Samstag, 8. Januar, um 19.30 Uhr und am Sonntag, 9. Januar, um 14 Uhr zur Aufführung. Für die Vorstellung am Samstagabend gibt es Karten im Vorverkauf ab Donnerstag, 23. Dezember bei der Sparkasse Mühlhausen und einmalig am Donnerstag, 23. Dezember von 9-11 Uhr im Proberaum des ehemaligen Rathauses in Ehingen.

description.hltext_display: 海口双困房被“转卖”？有钱人入住开小车进进出出
description.content:
http://news.hainan.net/ 时间：2010-12-22 9:54:00 来源：海南在线
甸昆住宅小区，是海口市的双困房小区，由海口市政府投资1500万元修建，共建成小户型住房276套，在2002年，全部按廉租租金每月一块钱一平米的价格，出租给海口市低收入住房困难家庭。
但是最近，有市民向我们栏目反映，说这个双困房小区内，住的却是有钱人，他们每天开小车上下班。原本为经济困难的人家准备的双困房，怎么会住进去有钱人呢?

description.hltext_display: Report: Family homelessness up 9 percent
description.content:
WASHINGTON, Dec. 21 (UPI) -- Shelters for the homeless have become so crowded in many U.S. cities that they have been turning people away, a report released Tuesday said.
The U.S. Conference of Mayors issued its Annual Hunger and Homelessness Report on Homeless Persons Memorial Day. The National Coalition for the Homeless reports there were at least 2,600 deaths in 2009 among people living on the streets.
The report examined homelessness in 27 cities. It found a jump of 9 percent in those cities in the number of homeless families while homelessness among single people was up 2.5 percent.
In two-thirds of the cities, shelters reported having to turn people away for lack of space.
Advocates say the long economic slump is straining local agencies and charitable groups.
"More and more people are experiencing homelessness, and they're in grave danger with temperatures dropping. This is a wake-up call to stop the funding cuts and for the federal government to actually increase its investment," said Maria Foscarinis, executive director of the National Law Center on Homelessness & Poverty. "To call safety-net programs essential is an understatement. This is literally a life-or-death issue." Share
