description.hltext_display: R4i DSi Ensures Unlimited Fun
description.content: Of late, the desire of entertainment has made people passionate to explore various types of games and music. Youngsters from worldwide love to play electronic games. With the increasing demand of these games, a number of new technologies has stepped up in to the market and is coming up with pocket friendly rates. One of the fine and elegant technologies helpful to play electronic games is R4i Dsi. R4i is the brand new version of R4 series come up the market, supporting the both DS and Dsi so that known as R4i DSi.However, the R4i DSi is introduced for Nintendo Dsi, also compatible with both DS and DS lite. Comprising of 32 GB SDHC card, it has sound storage capacity. Supporting micro SDHC cards and compatible with version 1.4 of Dsi firmware, it does not need any sort of upgrades. Besides, pondered to be highly flexible and comprising of numerous features, the R4i card can even be employed with different versions of the Nintendo consoles such as Nintendo Dsi, DS lite and Nintendo DS applications.Knowing extensively about the R4 DSThe R4 DS is considered as the most popular and known Nintendo DS R4 Card available on the market. In fact, with the presence of the R4 DS card, individuals can watch videos and play music by employing Nintendo DS. In addition, the card is not compatible with SDHC.A quick review of R4i SDHCR4i SDHC is the most efficient and innovative flash card cartridge technology supporting the Nintendo DSi. These R4i SDHC flash cards come with a number of advantages and features. Some of the common benefits include they enable users to watch favourite movies, listen the best MP3 songs and store photographs from the digital cameras. In addition, such R4 flash cards can also be employed with DS Lite.Buying R4i DSiTo buy R4i DSi, customers need to look for reputed and established online stores. Apart from high quality and cost effective products, their services are unique and exclusive in the market. In addition, they accept orders round the clock, 7 days in a week.

description.hltext_display: Iraqi donkey in centre of three-way custody battle
description.content: Washington, Dec 22 (IANS) A donkey in Baghdad is in the centre of a custody battle involving a marine, now back in the US, a sheikh and an Iraqi family that has demanded $30,000 to give him up.

description.hltext_display: « La vie de nos enfants ne nous appartient pas »
description.content:
Le 5 décembre dernier, on fêtait l’anniversaire de la petite Andréane Miron, comme à chaque année. Sa mère Isabel, son père Sylvain et son frère Julien étaient tous trois présents, comme d’habitude. Seule la fêtée manquait à l’appel. Car Andréane Miron n’est plus. Elle s’est suicidée il y a deux ans. Ce dimanche-là, elle aurait dû avoir 15 ans.
Sujets :
TVA , Association québécoise de prévention du suicide , Bruno Marchand , Montréal , Canada
« Sa fête va toujours être fêtée, assure Isabel Ladouceur. Même si je braille toute la nuit quand la date approche. Je suis en deuil, pas en dépression. »
Depuis, Isabel a retrouvé le goût de vivre. Le suicide de sa fille, en septembre 2008, l’aura finalement tournée vers les choses essentielles de la vie – l’amour, la santé, la beauté, l’amitié. Isabel aura échappé à la maladie, la dépression, la léthargie et tous ces obstacles qui jonchent le long et solitaire chemin du deuil. Tellement qu’au début, avoue-t-elle, elle avait honte de sourire ou de rire devant les autres, de peur qu’on la juge insensible. Même cette gêne a fini par se dissiper.
« Je suis fière de moi, confie-t-elle. Je n’aurais jamais pensé passer à travers. Mais dès le départ, je me suis dit : "Je ne veux pas tomber dans la maladie". »
Isabel a rapidement pris les choses en main : d’abord, dans l’exercice physique, puis dans la rédaction de son livre, Mon Rayon de soleil, un témoignage bouleversant paru en septembre, et qu’elle a eu la chance de présenter elle-même au Salon du livre de Montréal, en novembre.
« Ce livre-là, c’est comme un accouchement, dit-elle. Ça m’a pris neuf mois l’écrire. Maintenant, je le vois grandir, à chaque jour. Je reçois des courriels de mes lecteurs. Au salon du livre, il y avait une file d’attente de gens venus me rencontrer! Ça a été un gros succès. »
En effet, la parution du livre semble avoir été un élément déclencheur pour Isabel. Elle a été tour à tour l’invitée des animateurs François Paradis et Denis Lévesque sur les ondes de TVA. Elle a contacté tout le monde, dit-elle : Pierre Karl Péladeau, Line Beauchamp, Gilles Duceppe.
À l’occasion du lancement du livre de sa conjointe, Sylvain Miron annonçait son intention de traverser le Canada à vélo, à l’été 2011. Il souhaite ainsi faire mieux connaître la mécanique sournoise du suicide, tout en promouvant les services d’aide du centre prévention suicide (CPS) le Faubourg – pour lequel il espère amasser la somme de 25 000 $. Le centre, qui reçoit plus de 8000 appels par année, souffre d’un sous-financement chronique, qui l’empêche d’ouvrir d’autres lignes, faute d’intervenants.
Le mal invisible
Dans son témoignage, Isabel fait remarquer que rien, dans le comportement de sa fille, ne laissait présager la tragédie à venir. « Elle a su nous cacher sa souffrance », répète-t-elle. À aucun moment, dans son livre, elle tombe dans le « j’aurais-donc-dû ». , écrit-elle. Pas question de se culpabiliser – on ne s’en sortirait pas, l’épreuve est assez dure comme ça. Mais maintenant, est-elle mieux en mesure de discerner des signes chez les autres enfants? Reconnaît-elle ceux qui sont à risque? « Il n’y a pas de façon de déceler ces facteurs de risque, répond-elle. Tu es chanceuse quand tu as un signe, quand, par exemple, ton enfant boude après un examen. Parce que, dans la plupart des cas, les enfants cachent leur souffrance. » Alors? « Il faut se parler, dit-elle. Il y a juste ça : parler. Plus tu vas parler avec tes enfants, plus tu vas réduire les chances. »
Le calvaire du temps des Fêtes
Pour finir, Isabel appréhende quelque peu l’arrivée le temps des Fêtes, qui lui est particulièrement pénible depuis la tragédie.
« Noël, c’est le pire, admet-elle. Je ne suis plus capable de magasiner. T’es à vif. La pire date, c’est le 24… »
Si Noël est l’occasion par excellence de se réunir, on peut imaginer l’effet qu’il a sur ceux que vient de quitter un être aimé.
Cependant, la croyance populaire qui veut que les appels de détresse ainsi que les suicides augmentent pendant les Fêtes s’avèrent tout à fait injustifiée.
Même que, selon Bruno Marchand, directeur de l’Association québécoise de prévention du suicide (AQPS), le mois de décembre 2009 a été celui où l’on a dénombré le plus petit nombre d’appels de détresse dans l’année.
« Noël peut avoir un effet bénéfique, on peut relancer des gens qu’on ne voit pas fréquemment, indique M. Marchand. On a des occasions de rencontres dans le temps des Fêtes qui n’existent pas le reste de l’année. En même temps, on peut se douter que, pour une personne qui est seule, ça peut être plus dur. »
Selon lui, les périodes les plus pénibles sont plutôt octobre et novembre, puis février, mars et avril.

description.hltext_display: Reception to Khaleda
description.content:
Dhaka, Dec 22 (bdnews24.com) BNP will accord a reception to its chairperson Khaleda Zia on Friday on her turn from China. "We won't defy laws. We'll receive our leader (Khaleda) with flowers exactly where police will obstruct us," party secretary general Khandker Delwar Hossain told reporters after an emergency joint meeting of it on Wednesday.
Khaleda, now on a five-day tour of China at the invitation of the Communist Party of China, is scheduled to return home on Dec 24.
Delwar urged the party leaders and activists to gather at the Shahjalal International Airport by 11am on Dec 24.
The leader deplored the authorities for barring BNP leaders from entering the airport to see their party chief Khaleda Zia off on Dec 18 before she left for China.
At a press briefing on Tuesday, Delwar said, "When the prime minister goes aboard, no ruling party leader is obstructed at the airport. Why are the opposition leaders being barred from?"
He urged the countrymen to remain alert whether the government was trying to create a situation to invite foreign intervention by deliberately creating anarchy in the country.
bdnews24.com/sm/adk/mr/1435h

description.hltext_display: Newport Partners Income Fund Provides Update With Respect to Debenture Exchange Transaction
description.content:
NOT FOR DISTRIBUTION TO THE U.S. NEWS WIRE SERVICES OR FOR DISSEMINATION IN THE UNITED STATES
Newport Partners Income Fund (the "Fund") (TSX:NPF.UN)(TSX:NPF.DB)(TSX:NPF.DB.A) announces today that in anticipation of the proposed exchange of the Fund's 7.5% debentures due December 31, 2010 (the "2010 Debentures") and the 7.0% debentures due December 31, 2012 (the "2012 Debentures" and together with the 2010 Debentures, the "Debentures") for newly created second lien notes and subordinated unsecured notes of the Fund (the "Exchange Transaction"), as previously described in a press release of the Fund dated November 30, 2010, the Toronto Stock Exchange (the "TSX") will permit the 2010 Debentures to continue to trade on the TSX after their maturity date of December 31, 2010, until the meeting of debenture holders referred to below. The 2010 Debentures are currently trading on an interest flat basis and will continue to trade on such basis.
Pursuant to the indenture for the Fund's 2010 Debentures, holders may convert the principal of their 2010 Debentures into units of the Fund ("Units") on or before the close of business on December 31, 2010 at the price of $9.50 per Unit, being a conversion rate of approximately 105.2632 Units for each $1,000 principal amount of 2010 Debentures. While the 2010 Debentures provide that in the event of such conversion, accrued and unpaid interest to but excluding the date of conversion will be paid in cash, the Fund is prevented from making such payment under the terms of the indenture governing the Debentures as a result of its continuing default to make payments on its senior indebtedness.
The Exchange Transaction is subject to the execution of definitive documentation and approval of the TSX and approval by the requisite majorities of holders of the Debentures. The Fund will advise holders of the Debentures once a record date and a date for a meeting of holders of Debentures to vote on the Exchange Transaction has been set.
About Newport Partners Income Fund
Newport Partners Income Fund is an unincorporated open-ended trust created to hold, through its investment in Newport Partners Commercial Trust, interests in Newport Private Yield LP, a limited partnership established under the laws of the Province of Ontario. Securities of Newport Partners Income Fund began trading on the TSX on August 8, 2005 under the symbol NPF.UN.
Newport Partners Income Fund is a publicly-traded diversified fund that invests in successful Canadian private businesses. The Fund, currently has $443 million invested in 13 companies representing a diverse cross-section of the Canadian economy.
Forward-Looking Statements
Certain information included in this news release may constitute forward-looking information within the meaning of securities laws. In some cases, forward-looking information can be identified by terminology such as "may", "will", "should", "expect", "plan", "anticipate", "believe", "estimate", "predict", "potential", "continue" or the negative of these terms or other similar expressions concerning matters that are not historical facts. Without limitation, information regarding the closing of the transaction constitutes forward-looking information. Such forward-looking information reflects management's current beliefs and is based on information currently available to management of the Fund and the businesses in which the Fund holds an ownership interest (the "Operating Partnerships"). Forward-looking information involves significant risks and uncertainties. A number of factors could cause actual events or results to differ materially from the events and results discussed in the forward-looking information, including risks related to the satisfaction of all closing conditions to the Refinancing and Exchange Transaction, the receipt of all required consents and approvals and the abilities, actions, financial condition and circumstances of other parties to the Refinancing and Exchange Transaction. These factors should not be considered exhaustive. In addition, in evaluating this information, investors should specifically consider various factors, including the risks outlined in the Fund's public disclosure documents filed on SEDAR at www.sedar.com, which may cause actual events or results to differ materially from any forward-looking statement. In formulating forward-looking information herein, management has assumed that business and economic conditions affecting the Fund and the Operating Partnerships and the other parties to the Refinancing and Exchange Transaction will continue substantially in the ordinary course, including without limitation, with respect to general levels of economic activity. Although the forward-looking information is based on what management of the Fund and the Operating Partnerships consider to be reasonable assumptions based on information currently available to it, there can be no assurance that actual events or results will be consistent with this forward-looking information, and management's assumptions may prove to be incorrect. This forward-looking information is made as of the date of this news release, and the Fund does not assume any obligation to update or revise them to reflect new events or circumstances. Undue reliance should not be placed on forward-looking information. The Fund is providing the forward-looking financial information for the purpose of providing investors with some context for the information presented herein. Readers are cautioned that this information may not be appropriate for any other purpose.

description.hltext_display: 海南发展论坛年度最“牛”ID和热帖评选火热进行中
description.content:
http://news.hainan.net/ 时间：2010-12-22 15:44:00 来源：海南在线
由海南在线发展论坛知名版主发起的“10大最"牛"ID和10大热帖评选活动”自12月 9日启动以来，正在海南发展论坛如火如荼的进行当中。此次活动以“海南发展的2010：10大“牛”ID、10大热帖投票”为主题，邀请广大网友为自己心目中海发版最“牛”ID和热帖投票，并将对10大“牛”ID的拥有者和10大热帖的作者给予一定的奖励。活动规模浩大，吸引了众多海南发展板块的网友前来投票。
据了解，所谓的“十大热帖”指的就是那些网友关注度高、参与度高、争议性强、社会意义积极的帖子。而十大“牛”ID则是指那些活跃度高、在版面上具有一定人气，或积极向上、或幽默风趣、或具争议性、或文字功力强;帖子内容可读性强、有代表性、版友跟贴率高的论坛ID。
经过了实达半个月的角逐，截至目前，海发版10大最“牛”ID累计投票数已达到283票，10大热帖累计投票数也达到206票，充分显示了海发版网友们对此次年终评选的热情。
在最“牛”ID的评选中，海发版块资深版主007cat有着较明显的优势，同时在海南发展论坛比较有争议的人世如“大同海南”、“黑脸包拯”等也都名列前茅;而在10大热帖的评选中，和房价有关的帖子“请记住海南2010年1月份两个数字!”暂居榜首，说明国际旅游岛房价问题这个大热门依然在延续。而帖子“说说海南男人的‘懒’”排在了第二位，显示出网友对海南某些特有的社会现象的关注。其他如反映今年我省热点问题的帖子“我对‘85’教育局副局长的个人看法”、“文昌：水成灾，人为祸?”、“从三亚人劳系统招考惊现99分牛人看海南的走后门现象”等均位居前列。
由于距此次投票截至日期还有3天，投票的最终结果还存在很大变数。希望广大支持海南发展论坛的网友能够参与到投票活动中来，为你喜欢的ID和关注的帖子投出自己宝贵的一票!(刘璐)

description.hltext_display: 茶髪は何歳まで？ - 人と程度による
description.author: nama
description.content:
世の中的に、茶髪は何歳までOKでしょうか？芸能人はアラサーアラフォーでも茶髪でも素敵な人はいますが、一般人で３０すぎて茶髪だと若作りに見えたり逆に老けて見える気がします。みなさんは何歳まで茶髪がOKだと思いますか？茶髪が素敵に見える耐用年数を知りたいです。
ちなみに私は27歳で現在茶髪なため、黒くするかどうか悩んでます

description.hltext_display: Steam Washer Buying Guide
description.content:
Steam used in washing machines is a match made in cleaning heaven. Steam helps in washers by keeping fabric soft and free of wrinkles. Depending on the make and model of washer you choose you may see different cycles that utilize the steam. In a prewash or soak setting the steam loosens up fabrics allowing the water and detergent to penetrate deeply. During the wash cycle the steam acts as additional heat to heat the water to a more effective cleaning temperature and also to dissolve the detergent more efficiently. In the post wash cycle the steam sterilizes the clothing and also softens it to prevent wrinkling. Some models offer a Steam Allergiene cycle that help sanitize clothing from dust mites and dander for people that have severe allergies. Steam does lengthen the cycles; however there is always the option to turn it off.
Besides the cleaning benefits of steam washers, there is also a benefit to the environment. Steam washers use less electricity and consume less water than conventional washing machines. A little quantity of water produces a lot of steam which heats water more efficiently and with less energy than normal washers.
Steam washing machines are not for everyone. However, if any of the features and benefits described above will benefit you and your family, a steam clothes washer may be worth considering for a modest additional expense.
For more information on home and kitchen appliances visit one of our New Jersey appliance stores or online at http://www.karlsappliance.com.

description.hltext_display: Weihnachtslotterie schüttet Milliarden aus
description.content:
Die spanische Weihnachtslotterie ist die größte Lotterie der Welt. Sie ist für die Spanier zu einer Tradition geworden und gehört zum Weihnachtsfest wie anderswo der Christbaum. Bei der Ziehung der Glückslose am Mittwoch werden 2,3 Milliarden Euro ausgeschüttet.
Madrid (dpa) - Ihre Kinder haben in Spanien Millionensummen unter die Leute gebracht, während die Mutter für ein Monatsgehalt von 1100 Euro als Putzfrau schuftet. Die in Madrid lebende Ecuadorianerin Elsa P. hat zwölf Söhne und Töchter. Drei von ihnen wurde in den vergangenen Jahren die Ehre zuteil, im Fernsehen die Hauptgewinne der spanischen Weihnachtslotterie zu verkünden. Die elfjährige Yajaira durfte vor einem Jahr einem Millionenpublikum gar die Glücksziffer mit dem Hauptgewinn, genannt «El Gordo» (der Dicke), vortragen. Auf jedes der 195 Lose mit der Gewinnziffer entfielen je drei Millionen Euro.
Bei der Ziehung an diesem Mittwoch (22. Dezember) wird Yajaira wieder mit von der Partie sein. Die spanische Weihnachtslotterie ist die größte Lotterie der Welt. Es wurden Lose für insgesamt 3,3 Milliarden Euro zum Verkauf angeboten, 2,3 Milliarden werden als Gewinne ausgeschüttet. Die Ziehung der Lose ist für die Spanier zu einem festen Bestandteil der Weihnachtszeit geworden. Die Prozedur dauert mehr als drei Stunden und wird live im Fernsehen übertragen. Aus einer Trommel werden die Ziffern der Glückslose gezogen, aus einer anderen die jeweiligen Gewinnsummen.
Nach einer alten Tradition tragen Schüler und Schülerinnen des Madrider San-Ildefonso-Internats, eines früheren Waisenheims, die gezogenen Zahlenkombinationen in einem monotonen Singsang vor. Diese Schule besuchen auch Yajaira und mehrere ihrer Geschwister. «Es tut mir in der Seele weh, dass ich meine Tochter am Mittwoch nicht in den Ziehungssaal begleiten kann», sagte die Mutter des Mädchens der Zeitung «El Mundo». «Ich muss arbeiten gehen.»
Die 48-Jährige war vor elf Jahren nach Spanien übergesiedelt, nachdem der Vater ihrer Kinder sie in Ecuador sitzengelassen und eine andere Frau geheiratet hatte. Sie kaufte sich keine Lose, bis ihre Tochter Eliana bei der Ziehung 2005 die Nummer des «Dicken» vortragen durfte. Seither erwirbt sie jedes Jahr vier Zehntel-Lose für insgesamt 80 Euro. Dies sind gut zehn Euro mehr, als die Spanier im Durchschnitt für die Weihnachtslotterie ausgeben.
Bei der Auswahl der Lose überlassen die Spieler nichts dem Zufall. Sie suchen die Losnummern mit Bedacht aus. Dabei ist eine gehörige Portion Aberglaube im Spiel. Die begehrtesten Lose waren die mit der Nummer 11710. Sie sind seit Monaten ausverkauft, denn sie enthalten das Datum des 11. Juli 2010, an dem Spanien zum ersten Mal die Fußballweltmeisterschaft gewann.
Da ein ganzes Los stolze 200 Euro kostet, kaufen die Spanier sich normalerweise nur Anteile in Form von Zehntel-Losen oder teilen sich Gemeinschaftslose mit Freunden und Kollegen. Dies hat zur Folge, dass auch die Gewinne aufgesplittert werden. Trotz der immensen ausgeschütteten Summen macht die Lotterie kaum jemandem zum Millionär, sondern verteilt ihre Gewinne auf die Bewohner ganzer Ortschaften oder Stadtviertel.
Die Weihnachtslotterie - Lotería de Navidad - ist nicht nur die größte, sondern auch die älteste Lotterie der Welt. Ihre Anfänge gehen auf das Jahr 1763 zurück. In der heutigen Form wird sie seit 1812 ausgespielt. Ihren Namen erhielt sie 1892.

description.hltext_display: 港股下午升幅收窄 收市升51点
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
中新网12月22日电 据香港媒体报道，港股下午升幅收窄，收市恒指报23045.19，升51.33，成交541亿元(港元，下同)。
欧美昨日上扬，美股创近3年新高，港股高开45点，重上23000点，之后最多升167点，报23160.44，是全日最高，中午收市升133点。内地股市下跌，港股下午升幅收窄，但波动不大，最终收市升幅为0.22%。
长实(0001)报120.4元，升4.1元；和黄(0013)报80.1元，跌0.3元；新地(0016)报130元，升0.6元；太古A(0019)报126.6元，升2.1元。
汇控(0005)报80.2元，升0.05元；恒生(0011)报131.4元，升0.6元；建设银行(0939)报6.91元，跌0.07元；中银香港(2388)报26.25元，升0.35元；工行(1398)报5.72元，跌0.05元。
中移动(0941)报77.15元，跌0.05元；港交所(0388)报178元，无升跌；中国人寿(2628)报31.95元，升0.25元；中石油(0857)报9.94元，升0.03元。

description.hltext_display: Commerzbank - Börsencompass: 22. Dezember 2010
description.content:
- Disclaimer: Der nachfolgende Text ist eine Kolumne der Commerzbank. Der Inhalt der Kolumne wird von 4investors nicht verantwortet und muss daher nicht zwingend mit der Meinung der 4investors-Redaktion übereinstimmen. Jegliche Haftung und Ansprüche werden daher von 4investors ausdrücklich ausgeschlossen!
Konjunktur / Rentenmärkte
Moody’s kündigte gestern eine Prüfung der Ratingeinstufung für Portugal an. Laut der Ratingagentur könnte das Rating aufgrund des schwachen Wirtschaftswachstums in Portugal um ein bis zwei Stufen zurückgenommen werden. Die Risikoaufschläge von portugiesischen Staatsanleihen gegenüber Bundesanleihen hatten sich in den letzten zwei Wochen bereits deutlich ausgeweitet. Die Meldung führte gestern zu einem nochmaligen Anstieg. Auch spanische Anleihen standen weiter unter Druck, obwohl es Spanien in diesem Jahr gelungen ist, sein Staatsdefizit wie geplant deutlich um 3% des Bruttoinlandsproduktes zu reduzieren. Portugal tritt dagegen auf der Stelle: Die geplante Defizitreduzierung von 9,3% auf 7,3% kann nur dann erreicht werden, wenn die regionalen Haushalte für dieses Jahr eine bessere Bilanz als für 2009 aufweisen. Die Stimmung der deutschen Verbraucher hat sich gemessen an dem GfK-Konsumentenvertrauen - nach sieben Anstiegen in den Vormonaten - minimal verschlechtert. Der Stimmungsindikator ist bereits höher als vor der Finanzkrise. Mit einer anhaltenden Erholung des deutschen Arbeitsmarktes dürfte sich auch die Verbraucherstimmung weiter aufhellen und sich auch in einem stärkeren privaten Verbrauch widerspiegeln. Die GfK-Umfrage zeigt ferner, dass die Inflationserwartungen steigen. Die Preisentwicklung wird sich aber nach unserer Einschätzung erst in 2012 beschleunigen. Heute dürfte das US-Wachstum im dritten Quartal nochmals deutlich nach oben revidiert werden.
Aktienmärkte
An den europäischen Aktienmärkten verzeichneten gestern alle Indizes Kursgewinne. Der breite Stoxx 600 konnte damit wieder das Niveau von vor der Lehman-Krise erreichen. Die Impulse für den Markt speisten sich aus einem stabilen GfK-Konsumklimaindex und der Nachricht des chinesischen Vize-Premierministers, der verkündete, dass China den europäischen Problemstaaten der Peripherie finanziell helfen würde. Die sorgte für überdurchschnittliche Gewinne an den Märkten der Peripherie, die auch durch die Ankündigung der Ratingagentur Moody’s, die Bonität Portugals möglicherweise herabzustufen nicht beeinträchtigt wurde. Unterstützung gab es auch von der Unternehmensseite. Hier wurden die Übernahmeaktivitäten von DSM (+3,9%) und UPM-Kymmene Oyj (+7,4%) positiv bewertet. Auf der Branchenebene konnten Grundstoffwerte (+2,4%) am deutlichsten zulegen. Der Sektor profitierte von steigenden Metallpreisen. Die geringsten Gewinne verzeichneten Healthcaretitel (+0,1%). Auch die US-Märkte konnten ihren Aufwärtstrend weiter fortsetzten. Positive Makrodaten, Unterstützung durch diverse Übernahmeaktivitäten und gute Unternehmensmeldungen aus dem IT-Sektor (Adobe nach besser als erwarteten Zahlen +6%) und die Nachrichten aus China bezüglich der Finanzhilfe im Zuge der Staatsverschuldungskrise in Europa gaben dem Markt Auftrieb. Der Dow Jones erreichte ein neues 2-Jahres-Hoch. An den asiatischen Märkten notieren die Indizes ebenfalls höher und auf Mehrjahres-Hochs. Angesichts der steigenden Rohstoffpreise profitierten Grundstoffwerte überdurchschnittlich, aber IT und Energiewerte waren ebenfalls stärk nachgefragt.
Topthema des Tages
Rohstoffpreisanstieg geht ins dritte Jahr
2010 war nach 2009 das zweite Jahr in Folge mit deutlichen Preisanstiegen bei Rohstoffen. Gold, Zucker, Baumwolle, Zinn und Kupfer erreichten sogar neue historische Höchststände. Am stärksten legten 2010 bisher Agrarrohstoffe mit 37%, gemessen am Goldman Sachs Commodity Index in US-Dollar (GSCI) zu, dicht gefolgt von Edelmetallen, die 32% gewannen. Industriemetalle (+15%) und Energie (+12%) waren weniger favorisiert. Auf Euro-Basis war die Performance sogar noch 7%-Punkte besser. Dies zeigt, dass sich die Rohstoffpreise relativ unabhängig vom Verhältnis des Euro zum US-Dollar entwickeln. Es ist auch ein Indiz, dass hinter den Preisanstiegen wohl mehr als nur konjunkturelle Zyklik steckt wie wir stets betont haben. 2010 waren es mehr diese strukturellen Faktoren als die Zyklik, die die Rohstoffpreise trieben, da die zyklischen Segmente Industriemetalle und Energie hinterher hinkten. 2011 wird jedoch wohl ein Jahr in dem die Zyklik wohl an Kraft gewinnt wie die Indikatoren aus den Industriestaaten, China und anderen Emerging Markets anzeigen. Die strukturellen Argumente (zunehmendes Gewicht und hohes Wachstum der Emerging Markets, weiche Währungen, enges Angebot) bleiben zunächst gleichermaßen stark. Da nach 2 Jahren kräftiger Nachfragesteigerungen die Angebotsreserven bei den meisten Rohstoffen sehr eng sind, oder bereits eine Defizitsituation besteht, sind die Voraussetzungen für eine breite und dynamische Preisaufwärtsbewegung 2011 somit sehr gut. Wir empfehlen für Rohstoffanlagen eine Mischung aus den relativ starken Rohstoffen – Gold und Kupfer sowie den vernachlässigten Platin und Rohöl.
( extern )

description.hltext_display: ASSI dropped for political reasons?
description.author: isleofman.com
description.content:
Date Posted: 22/Dec/2010 08:48
The director of the Manx Wildlife Trust is claiming the decision not to create an area of special scientific interest in Ramsey was made for political rather than environmental reasons.
Environment Minister John Shimmin said a flawed consultation process, biased in favour of his department, was the reason he dropped the idea.
It had been widely opposed in Ramsey, with many people believing it would prevent the long-awaited marina project going ahead.
But Duncan Bridges says scientific reasons weren't questioned and it was more a case of the minister being unhappy with the way ASSIs were put in place.
He also believes Mr Shimmin didn't want to tackle the issue before next year's general election:

event_or_fact.property: scientific reasons weren't questioned and it was more a case of the minister being unhappy with the way ASSIs were put in place
a flawed consultation process, biased in favour of his department, was the reason he dropped the idea

description.hltext_display: MS Dhoni worried by inept bowling
description.content:
Supersport Park, Centurion, Dec 22 (bdnews24.com) -- MS Dhoni has come down hard on his bowlers after India started yet another tour with a demoralising defeat.
"One of the things was we still couldn't get them all out," Dhoni said. "Although we all said the wicket was different to first day, but you have bowled on flatter tracks and you're still expected to get the sides out, so that's an area of concern because to win a Test you have to get 20 wickets," reports ESPNcricinfo.
It was not just the failure to bowl South Africa out that ought to concern India. They conceded 225 runs in one session on the third day, which hastened the declaration from South Africa.
The extra time South Africa gained proved to be a big factor in India's fight for a draw. "You're supposed to either take wickets or not let the opposition score at five runs an over in a Test match," Dhoni said. "The conditions are difficult out here, it's not like in India where it's turning and the ball doesn't come on. So you can tie the batsmen down and not let them score at a brisk pace.
"But over here scoring is quite easy, in the sense once you're set, the ball comes on nicely and you can score on both sides of the wicket. So that's also an area of concern. Even our scoring-rate, despite us losing wickets, was quite good. So that means, the only way out is to take wickets.
"It was difficult because there was not much help from the wicket. Our bowlers are not express quick. They don't generally bowl over 140-plus. They have to be very precise with their line and length.
"We tried different fields. We tried to work around their bowling aspects, which, more often than not, will work with a set batsman. We tried to contain them but it was not successful for a period of time."
Dhoni was also worried about the over-rates, which could potentially earn him a one-match suspension. "Another area of worry is the over-rate because we were five-and-a-half overs down at one stage," he said. "That's a lot. That's a big worry. We need to step that up. We need to bowl our quota in the time allotted."
Dhoni is looking forward to Zaheer's return, not just for what he does with the ball, but how he leads the attack. "It's not just that when Zaheer plays he always gets wickets," he said when asked if the attack was not even half as effective in Zaheer's absence. "But what is good with him is the amount of experience he has got, the way he comes up with new plans and changes his plans during the course of the game. What we need to see is if he can be there in the next Test, whether we can make something happen on the field."
Dhoni seemed resigned to India's tendency to start Test series poorly. "That's one quality we have," he said. "It's not only in India. Most of the Test series, the first Test has often gone bad, but after that we have come back really well. Again we are back to a start that we are quite used to now, hopefully we will cope with that in the coming two games."
That said, he had a few positives to draw on. "Apart from the first day I think we batted really well," he said. "In the second innings, if you have to achieve 400 or 400-plus score you are under pressure. It may be a flat track, but handling that pressure is very difficult. That [India handled it] is definitely a big positive."
bdnews24.com/smo/1438h

description.hltext_display: The almanac
description.content:
the 356th day of 2010 with nine to follow.
The moon is waning. The morning stars are Venus and Mercury. The evening stars are Jupiter, Uranus, Saturn, Mars and Neptune.
Those born on this date are under the sign of Capricorn. They include Nobel Peace Prize laureate Frank Kellogg in 1856; opera composer Giacomo Puccini in 1858; former Philadelphia Athletics' Manager Connie Mack, the "Dean of Baseball," in 1862; former first lady Claudia "Lady Bird" Johnson, wife of U.S. President Lyndon B. Johnson, in 1912; TV game show host Gene Rayburn in 1917; actors Barbara Billingsley in 1915 and Hector Elizondo in 1936 (age 74); baseball Hall of Fame member Steve Carlton in 1944 (age 66); TV news anchor Diane Sawyer in 1945 (age 65); Robin Gibb (age 61) and twin brother Maurice Gibb in 1949, members of the Bee Gees pop group; and actor Ralph Fiennes in 1962 (age 48).
On this date in history:
In 1785, the American Continental Navy fleet was organized, consisting of two frigates, two brigs and three schooners. Sailors were paid $8 a month.
In 1864, after his Civil War march across Georgia, Union Gen. William T. Sherman sent U.S. President Abraham Lincoln this message: "I beg to present you as a Christmas present the city of Savannah."
In 1894, French Capt. Alfred Dreyfus was convicted of treason by a military court-martial on flimsy evidence in a highly irregular trial and sentenced to life in prison for his alleged crime of passing military secrets to the Germans.
In 1944, ordered to surrender by Nazi troops who had his unit trapped during the Battle of the Bulge, Gen. Anthony McAuliffe of the U.S. 101st Airborne Division replied with one word: "Nuts!"
In 1956, the first gorilla to be born in captivity arrived into the world at the Columbus Zoo in Ohio.
In 1971, the U.N. General Assembly chose Austrian diplomat Kurt Waldheim to lead the United Nations.
In 1972, 5,000 people died when a series of earthquakes left the Nicaraguan capital of Managua in ruins.
In 1984, "subway vigilante" Bernard Goetz shot four would-be hold-up men on a New York City subway. He ended up serving eight months in prison for carrying an illegal weapon but was cleared of assault and attempted murder charges.
In 1986, political dissident and Nobel laureate Andrei Sakharov and his wife, Yelena Bonner, were allowed to return to Moscow after seven years of internal exile.
In 1989, Romanian President Nicolae Ceausescu, the last hard-line communist holdout against East Bloc reforms, fell from power in the face of continuing massive demonstrations.
In 1992, all 158 people aboard a Libyan Boeing 727 died when the jetliner crashed, apparently following an in-flight collision with a military plane.
In 1993, the daughter of Cuban President Fidel Castro was granted political asylum in the United States.
Also in 1993, South Africa's Parliament gave a strong endorsement to an interim constitution that ended centuries of white-minority rule.
In 1994, Italy's Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi resigned after seven months in office, following corruption charges against him.
In 1997, members of a pro-government militia attacked the village of Chenalh, Mexico, killing 45 people, including a number of children.
In 2001, American Airlines passengers and attendants overpowered a man trying to light a match to detonate powerful explosives hidden in his sneakers on a flight from Paris to Miami.
In 2004, 13 U.S. soldiers and nine others were killed in a suicide bomber attack on a U.S. military dining hall near Mosul, Iraq.
In 2005, Wal-Mart was ordered to pay more than 100,000 California employees $172 million for depriving them of breaks to eat.
In 2006, rape charges against three former members of the Duke University lacrosse team were dropped after the alleged victim said she couldn't be sure she had been raped.
In 2007, the U.S. Air Force reported finding major structural flaws in eight models of its F-15 fighter jets, grounding some U.S. air defense capabilities.
Also in 2007, 2 million children in Iraq faced malnutrition, lack of education and threats of disease and violence, the U.N. Children's Fund said in a report.
In 2008, a federal jury in New Jersey convicted five Muslim men of plotting to attack soldiers at Fort Dix, a plot prosecutors say was inspired by al-Qaida. The defendants were acquitted of attempted murder.
Also in 2008, an earthen retraining wall ruptured at a Kingston, Tenn., power plant, allowing 5.4 million cubic yards of coal and sludge to spill from a storage pond, blocking roads and rail lines, polluting 500 acres of land and contaminating the Emory River.
In 2009, Iranian security forces and anti-government protesters clashed in the holy city of Qom at the funeral of a founder of the Islamic revolution 30 years earlier. Grand Ayatollah Hussein Ali Montazeri, who died at 87, became a prominent critic of June's disputed presidential voting that re-elected President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad.
A thought for the day: James Dewar has been quoted as saying: "Minds are like parachutes. They only function when they are open."

description.hltext_display: Benfica in paradiso a Lisbona
description.content:
L'SL Benfica aveva raggiunto la finale di UEFA Futsal Cup nel 2004 e perso contro l'Interviú Madrid. Sei anni dopo le parti si sono rovesciate con una vittoria per 3-2 nei supplementari.
di Paul Saffer
SL Benfica celebrate ©sportsfile
Articoli
Pubblicato: Mercoledì, 22 dicembre 2010, 10.56CET L'SL Benfica aveva raggiunto la finale di UEFA Futsal Cup nel 2004 e perso contro l'Interviú Madrid. Sei anni dopo le parti si sono rovesciate con una vittoria per 3-2 nei supplementari.
L’SL Benfica aveva raggiunto la finale di Coppa UEFA Futsal nel 2004, quando ancora si giocava con la formula della gara di andata e ritorno, perdendo contro l’Interviú Madrid. Sei anni più tardi, il club ex campione d’Europa di calcio ha restituito il favore alla sola formazione capace di vincere tre volte il titolo europeo di futsal, imponendosi 3-2 ai supplementari davanti a 9.400 spettatori, pubblico record per il torneo, nel Pavilhão Atlântico di Lisbona.
Il primo titolo del Benfica non è stata l’unica novità della fase finale del 2010. Mentre in tutte le precedenti edizioni dall’introduzione della fase finale a quattro squadre nel 2007 aveva sempre visto la partecipazione delle prime quattro teste di serie, questa volta tre su quattro sono uscite nella fase d’élite. Il Benfica ha eliminato l’MFK Viz-Sinara Ekaterinburg, campione d’Europa nel 2008; gli azeri dell’Araz Naxçivan hanno sconfitto il Kairat Almaty, tre volte semifinalista; e infine gli italiani della Luparense C/5 hanno superato i campioni di Spagna dell’ElPozo Murcia FS.
La scelta del Pavilhão Atlântico come sede della fase finale ha segnato un ritorno alle origini del torneo, poiché l’edizione 2001/02 si era conclusa con una fase finale a otto squadre presso l’impianto in riva al mare di Lisbona. I campioni in carica dell’Interviú godevano dei favori del pronostico e sembravano destinati a regalare il sesto trionfo in nove edizioni alla Spagna, ma hanno dovuto faticare più del previsto in semifinale con l’Araz, che aveva lo stesso allenatore – Alesio – e il nucleo della rosa della nazionale azera che aveva raggiunto le semifinali di UEFA Futsal Euro 2010 tre mesi prima in Ungheria. L’Interviú si fa rimontare due volte, prima di segnare tre gol negli ultimi sette minuti vincendo 5-2. Molti gol hanno caratterizzato anche l’altra semifinale, con il Benfica vittorioso 8-4 contro la Luparense.
L’Araz ha quindi conquistato il terzo posto grazie al 5-4 ai calci di rigore contro la Luparense. Nel frattempo, lo stadio si era andato via via riempiendo quasi in ogni ordine di posto per l’inizio della finale. Marquinho porta in vantaggio l’Interviú, alla sua quinta finale, al 7’, ma Joel ristabilisce subito la parità sugli sviluppi di un calcio di punizione di Ricardinho diventando capocannoniere del torneo con 12 gol. Arnaldo, che militava nelle file del Benfica nel 2004 insieme a Zé Maria, Pedro Costa, Ricardinho, il portiere di riserva Zé Carlos e all’attuale tecnico André Lima, firma il 2-1 a inizio ripresa con un colpo di tacco. Betão risponde in maniera analoga tre minuti più tardi.
Il Benfica ha continuato a spingere e ai supplementari ha visto premiati i propri sforzi, quando il passaggio di Amado è stato girato in rete da Davi, sotto lo sguardo dell’aquila benfichista posizionata sulla porta dell’Interviú. Davi aveva già deciso la finale del 2005 con l’Action 21 Charleroi (Belgio), l’unica altra squadra non spagnola o russa ad avere vinto la Coppa UEFA Futsal.

description.hltext_display: Spiritual healing 'helps' woman paralysed for 23yrs walk again
description.content:
A woman, who became paralysed from the waist down after an accident, has after 23-years walked again following a visit to a British spiritual healer.
Delia Knox, 46, became paralysed after a drink driver hit the car she was a passenger in on Christmas Day in 1987, and after she lost all feeling in her legs, she almost gave up hope of ever walking again.
"This has turned my world upside down. I can stand in my kitchen and walk around my house. I'm like a little kid out of a baby carriage seeing things that were once so huge now seem so small," the Daily Mail quoted her as saying.
"I am in awe at seeing the power of God not just in my life but all over the world as a result of this miracle," she said.nd when she attended a meeting with preacher Nathan Morris earlier this year, she had no idea that spiritual healings would be taking place.
"I wanted to get in the presence of God and to see my good friends Pastor John and Brenda Kilpatrick. I knew it was an evangelistic meeting but I didn't know healings were taking place," she said.
"But Nathan Morris called my husband forward and I had no idea what was going on. I didn't want to make a scene when Nathan was praying for me.
"Then all of a sudden I felt a voice which I knew was the Holy Spirit saying to me, 'Get up', and I felt feeling in my legs and then faith came on me to walk.
"I wasn't going to let anyone take this away from me and I knew this was my night to walk out of the chair.
"I walked and walked and walked and felt I had entered another realm. I ended up on the floor and someone was touching my legs and I could feel my knees for the first time. They were bending and clicking into place," she added.
The footage, which has been viewed by 200,000 on YouTube, shows her being prayed for and lifted out of the wheelchair by the healer during a visit to the Bay of the Holy Spirit Revival in Mobile, Alabama.
Her "miracle moment", during the visit to the Bay of the Holy Spirit Revival in Mobile, Alabama, was filmed and has been viewed by 200,000 on YouTube where it has now become a favourite clip. (ANI)
SEARCH

description.hltext_display: La conseillère Jocelyn Ann Campbell nommée à la commission d’examen des contrats
description.content:
Jocelyn Ann Campbell
Publié le 21 Décembre 2010
Publié le 21 Décembre 2010
Jocelyn Ann Campbell, conseillère de l’arrondissement d’Ahuntsic-Cartierville, a été nommée à la nouvelle commission d’examen des contrats par le maire de Montréal, Gérald Tremblay, lors de la séance ordinaire du conseil municipal du 14 décembre dernier.
Sujets :
Commission d’examen des contrats , Conseil d’agglomération
Jocelyn Ann Campbell siégera à la nouvelle commission qui devra étudier tous les contrats octroyés par le conseil d’agglomération dont la valeur est de 10 millions $ et plus, les contrats de plus de 500 000 $ où il y a un seul soumissionnaire, les contrats où l’écart entre le premier et le deuxième soumissionnaire est supérieur à 10 % et les contrats qui dépassent de plus ou moins 10 % les estimés des coûts faits par la Ville.
«Cette nouvelle commission va garantir une meilleure transparence dans le processus d’octroi des contrats», a précisé la conseillère Jocelyn Ann Campbell. Je suis honorée d’avoir été nommée à cette nouvelle commission et je suis heureuse de contribuer à rétablir la confiance des Montréalais et des Montréalaises dans le processus d’octroi des contrats.»
La conseillère a également tenu à rappeler que le maire Tremblay avait fait campagne en 2009 «sur la nécessité d’améliorer le modèle de gouvernance de la Ville en assurant une plus grande transparence et plus d’imputabilité de la part des élus».

description.hltext_display: Today's Forecast: Wednesday, Dec. 22
description.author: Quincy Vagell
description.content:
At the bus stop: Clouds, chilly. Temp: 24.﻿
Today : Sun and clouds, chilly. High: 34.﻿﻿
Conditions have remained mostly dry and chilly across the Brookfield area, but there may be a snow storm to deal with before the next five days are over.
For now, there will be a good deal of cloudiness across the area. A stubborn low pressure system to our east will continue to spin clouds through the area. This will also help keep chilly air locked in, as highs for the next several days will only make it into the lower to perhaps mid-30s.
The forecast is really the same for Today, Thursday and Friday. The only minor details would include a possible flurry tonight or Thursday, then some more sunshine by Friday. Temperatures each day will start off within a few degrees of 20, then rise into the low and mid-30s by afternoon.
For Christmas Day, it looks like we'll start the day with sunshine, but clouds will be on the increase once again. With cold air locked in place, as highs struggle to reach freezing, the stage is set for Sunday.
A developing low pressure system across the Southeast coast will move up the Eastern Seaboard over the weekend. At this point, it appears that there is at least a possibility of some snow by Sunday.
Stay tuned to future forecasts for further information. It's far too soon to make any definitive forecasts, but begin to anticipate a winter storm affecting the area before the weekend is over.
Today : Sun and clouds, chilly. Highs in the mid-30s.
Tonight : Clouds, maybe a flurry. Lows in the mid-20s.
Thursday : A snow flurry is possible. Highs in the mid-30s.﻿﻿﻿
Christmas Eve : Sunshine and seasonable. Highs in the mid-30s.﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿
Christmas Day : Sunshine, followed by clouds late. Highs in the lower 30s.﻿﻿
Sunday : A possibility of snow. Highs around 30.﻿

description.hltext_display: Commissioners to review need for burn ban each week
description.content: Pottawatomie County commissioners are planning a weekly review of whether or not a burn ban should be enacted based on dry conditions. County commissioners can institute seven-day burn bans in their county, and the governor can also declare them. So far, a burn ban has not been requested or issued in Pottawatomie County, although conditions remain dry. During Tuesday?s county commission meeting, there was an agenda item for the board to consider such as ban. Don Lynch, Shawnee/Pottawatomie County emergency management director, told commissioners he didn?t think there was a need for one, at least at this time. He said area fire chiefs haven?t made any requests to him for a burn ban thus far, although there have been some grass fires in the county. ?The 30-day forecast continues to be very dry,? Lynch said, asking residents to ?continue to urge caution out there.? Lynch asked that the agenda item remain on the agenda each week through the winter for commissioners? consideration in case conditions change.

description.hltext_display: Debatte um FDP-Chef Westerwelle dauert an
description.content:
Berlin. Nach dem neuerlichen Umfrage-Absturz der FDP versuchen führende Liberale, die Debatte über Parteichef Guido Westerwelle zu beruhigen. Entwicklungsminister Dirk Niebel mahnte, die FDP könne nur bestehen, wenn sie zusammenhalte.
Gisela Piltz, stellvertretende Parteivorsitzende in Nordrhein-Westfalen, betonte, öffentliche Personaldebatten lösten keine Probleme. Der Vorsitzende der Jungen Liberalen, Lasse Becker, forderte Westerwelle aber auch zur Selbstkritik auf.
Becker appellierte an den Parteichef, beim Dreikönigstreffen in Stuttgart «selbstkritisch den einen oder anderen Fehler zu benennen». Zudem solle Westerwelle «die Menschen emotionaler als in der Vergangenheit ansprechen», sagte der FDP-Nachwuchspolitiker den «Stuttgarter Nachrichten» (Mittwoch). Von den Wahlergebnissen im Frühjahr 2011 hänge viel ab. «Und beim Bundesparteitag wird analysiert: Wer hat welchen Fehler gemacht, und wie baue ich ein zukunftsfähiges Team.»
Becker forderte zugleich eine inhaltliche Neuausrichtung der FDP: «Jedenfalls wird man nicht dadurch glaubwürdig, dass man zum 200. Mal eine Steuersenkung ankündigt. Wir brauchen einen Schwerpunkt beim Thema Haushaltskonsolidierung.» Die FDP müsse zudem klare Positionen bei der Ablehnung der Vorratsdatenspeicherung und dem Umbau der Sozialsysteme beziehen. «Und wir müssen uns beim Thema nachhaltige, ökologische Marktwirtschaft ein neues Feld erschließen.»
Niebel machte deutlich, dass er jüngeren FDP-Politikern den Parteivorsitz noch nicht zutraut. Die FDP habe zwar eine hervorragende Führungsreserve, sagte er dem «Hamburger Abendblatt» (Mittwoch). «Ich denke allerdings, dass wir denen noch etwas Zeit geben sollten, um ihre Fähigkeiten zu veredeln.» Vom Dreikönigstreffen erwarte er «ein Aufbruchsignal, das weit über Stuttgart hinaus in der Republik sichtbar sein wird», so Niebel. «Ich bin felsenfest davon überzeugt, dass Guido Westerwelle eine mitreißende Rede halten wird.»
Auch Piltz forderte ein Ende der Personaldebatte. Die Geschichte der FDP zeige eindrucksvoll, dass Personaldebatten in kritischen Situationen noch nie geholfen hätten, sagte die nordrhein- westfälische Partei-Vize «Handelsblatt Online». «Die FDP hat im Team gewonnen, und die FDP muss auch im Team Krisen meistern.» In der jüngsten Forsa-Umfrage ist die FDP auf drei Prozent abgesackt.

description.hltext_display: 一未成年少女与网友见面遭拘禁强奸 三亚警方解救[图]
description.content:
犯罪嫌疑人燕某被依法刑拘
四川一花季少女周某轻信网友，独身一人与网友见面惨遭强奸，之后被胁迫至三亚遭对方拘禁，期间被拍摄裸照威胁，多次被强奸。记者从三亚警方获悉，河西公安分河西派出所日前迅速行动，抓获犯罪嫌疑人燕某，成功解救这名未成年少女。
12月17日11时许，河西派出所接到周某亲属报案，称周某被人胁迫至三亚，遭对方拘禁强奸，现被拘禁在河西区第一市场一出租屋内。接到报案后，河西派出所高度重视，立即组织民警兵分多路进行调查摸排，迅速开展解救工作。于当日中午在一出租屋内当场将犯罪嫌疑人燕某(男，35岁，四川省长宁县人)抓获，解救出受害者周某。
经询问，受害者周某现年17岁，四川省人，于今年4月通过QQ聊天认识燕某，之后独身一身与燕某见面，在四川某宾馆遭对方强奸。11月23日，燕某以胁迫手段把周某从四川带到三亚，将周某拘禁在一出租屋内，并拍摄裸照威胁周某，让其不得与家人联系，期间多次虐待强奸周某。12月16日，周某趁燕某外出之机，打电话将遭遇告知家人，家人向警方报案，周某得以重见天日，与家人团聚。
因涉嫌强奸，犯罪嫌疑人燕某被移交给河西公安分局刑警队，经审讯，燕某对强奸周某的犯罪事实供认不讳。目前已被依法刑拘，案件还在进一步审理当中。三亚警方有关负责人表示，这类侵害案件的主要受害人，多是防范意识差、喜欢上网聊天的学生等未成年人。
警方提醒广大网民，上网聊天交友时应提高警惕，不要轻信网友承诺，不要和陌生人随便外出见面。即使见面也要认真核实对方身份，发现情况不妙立即报警。如遇歹徒实施暴力等手段，一般情况下不要与对方“硬碰硬”，以免人身受到伤害。做到巧妙周旋，伺机报警脱身。

description.hltext_display: SEB: AnlageFlash vom 22.12.2010
description.content:
- Disclaimer: Der nachfolgende Text ist eine Kolumne des Portfolio Management der SEB. Der Inhalt der Kolumne wird von 4investors nicht verantwortet und muss daher nicht zwingend mit der Meinung der 4investors-Redaktion übereinstimmen. Jegliche Haftung und Ansprüche werden daher von 4investors ausdrücklich ausgeschlossen!
Deutschland/Europa
Die europäischen Aktienbörsen schlossen gestern fester. Die positive Stimmung aus Übersee beflügelte. Ferner halfen Absichtsbekundungen Chinas, das die Stabilisierungsmaßnahmen der Europäischen Union zur Überwindung der Eurokrise unterstützen wird. Damit ist eine Jahresendrallye bei allerdings recht dünnen Umsätzen weiter im Gange.
Der EuroStoxx50 gewann gestern 1,3% und der DAX 0,9%. Das deutsche Kursbarometer markierte dabei mit 7.084,84 Punkten im Handelsverlauf ein neues Jahreshoch. Der MDAX überwand die 10.000er Marke.
Unter den Branchen fielen die Automobilwerte sowie Rohstofftitel auf, also jene Werte, die vom „Window Dressing“ profitieren. Rohstofftitel reagierten auf weiter steigende Metallpreise. Ferner stehen Konsolidierungsschritte in der Papierindustrie an. Die finnische UPM-Kymmene z.B. sprang um 6,8% in die Höhe. Stora Enso kletterte um 7,7%.
BMW verteuerten sich um 2,6%.
USA/Welt
Die US-Börsen markierte gestern ebenso neue Jahreshochs. Darunter erreichte der Nasdaq Composite mit 2.669 Punkten sogar den höchsten Stand seit Dezember 2007.
Bankwerte waren die Favoriten. Bank of America und J.P. Morgan waren mit jeweils rund 3% die Favoriten.
Die Stücke von Adobe kletterten um 6,0%. Der Adobe hat am Vorabend überraschend gute Zahlen präsentiert.
Unternehmen
Deutsche Bank gab gestern bekannt, mit einer Zahlung von 553 Mio. $ einen alten US-Steuerstreit aus den Jahren 1996-2002 beizulegen. Die Höhe ist in etwa die der Rückstellung. Dies ist für die Aktie ein Non-event. Ansonsten haben wir kürzlich die Aktie neu unter die Lupe genommen. Für Q4 erwarten wir zwar weitere Belastungen – durchaus nach dem Motto, im alten Jahr noch so manches reinzupacken -, aber dank eines erneut starken Investmentbankings sollte das Haus dies gut verarbeiten. Unser neues Kursziel 52 €. Strong Buy.
Ausblick
Es stehen heute einige Konjunkturdaten an, die Impulse setzen könnten. Ansonsten rechnen wir erstmal mit behaupteten Niveaus. Die fernöstlichen Aktienmärkte tendierten heute gut behauptet bis freundlich.
( extern )

description.hltext_display: 英男子认为圣诞树比前妻善解人意 决定与其结婚
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
中新网12月22日电 据台湾“中广新闻网”22日报道，英国一个热爱圣诞的男子安迪・帕克斯最近决定更上一层楼，跟认识2年的圣诞树结为夫妻。
现年47岁已离婚的安迪每天都过圣诞节。他以前一星期要花2万多台币吃圣诞大餐。今年经济不景气，花费缩减到1万台币。不过他每天还是要吃一个馅饼，拉几个拉炮，开一瓶香槟庆祝耶稣诞生。当然，女王的圣诞贺词也得再看上一遍。
两年前，安迪买了一棵塑料圣诞树，他每天都跟这棵树说话聊天。他发现这棵树比他前妻要善解人意，决定跟这棵树牵手过一生。
不过，目前还没找到愿意帮他跟塑料树证婚的神父。
(责任编辑：赵婷)

description.hltext_display: Ces autobus qui se volatilisent…
description.content:
Les autobus manquant à l’appel sont d’autant plus pénibles l’hiver (Photo : Patrick Deschamps)
Publié le 21 Décembre 2010
Publié le 21 Décembre 2010
Antoine Dion Ortega
Comme dans toutes les grandes villes, le transport en commun montréalais contient son lot d’irritants. Parmi ceux-ci, on comptera, bien sûr, les pannes et ralentissements de toutes sortes dans le métro, les bris d’escaliers mécaniques, les autobus bondés et les retards, la publicité criarde, la chaleur étouffante des quais. Mais – soyons francs – de tous ces irritants, il y en a un qui se démarque particulièrement : l’autobus qui ne passe pas.
Sujets :
Société de transport de Montréal , Hors service
Les usagers de la Société de transport de Montréal (STM) comprennent bien que les autobus puissent parfois être en retard – après tout, personne n’échappe à la congestion routière.
Là où on les entend par contre jurer assurément, c’est quand l’illusion initiale du « retard » – elle dure bien une dizaine de minutes – cède le pas à la désagréable conviction que leur autobus n’est tout simplement pas sur la route. Et sur les circuits où l’on compte deux autobus à l’heure, l’attente peut sembler – dans ce pays qui n’est pas un pays mais l’hiver – disproportionnée.
Une attente d’autant plus désagréable quand, à un coin de rue de là, sur une de ces lignes du réseau 10 minutes max, les autobus se suivent pratiquement à la queue-leu-leu, la plupart à moitié vides – ou plein, diront les plus optimistes.
Où diable est donc cet autobus?
Y a-t-il là un lien? En d’autres termes : la STM, afin de remplir ses audacieux engagements quant au réseau 10 minutes max, ne procède-t-elle pas à des ponctions de véhicules sur les autres lignes, dans les moments où la promesse se fait difficile à honorer? À la STM, on assure que l’implantation du réseau 10 minutes max, en août dernier, ne s’est pas faite au détriment des autres lignes.
« Les autres lignes continuent comme elles étaient », confirme Isabelle Tremblay, aux relations médias de la STM.
Dans le cadre du plan d’affaires 2007-2011, on prévoyait pour 2010 l’amélioration de l’offre de service sur les 31 lignes les plus achalandées.
« Avec le reste [des sommes dont nous disposions pour l’année], on a fait des améliorations ponctuelles, comme sur la ligne 25 Angus, par exemple », précise Mme Tremblay.
C’est donc ailleurs qu’il faut chercher les causes au problème de l’autobus fantôme. « Il peut s’agir d’un retard sur l’horaire, d’un accident ou d’une panne, explique Mme Tremblay. Un usager pourrait avoir eu un malaise. Un chauffeur pourrait avoir remarqué une défectuosité sur son véhicule. Il ne faut pas oublier qu’on n’a pas tant d’autobus en renfort que ça. »
Au service à la clientèle de la STM, en plus de tous ces aléas, on fait également mention de certains « sauts » dans le réseau.
« Qu’un autobus ne passe pas, il peut y avoir plusieurs raisons à ça, répond-on. Ça peut venir d’un problème mécanique, d’une coupure de personnel ou d’un chauffeur qui décide de ne pas faire ses arrêts pour rattraper du retard. »
Il faut comprendre que les chauffeurs travaillent sur un mode dit « interligne ». Loin d’être cantonnés à une seule ligne, leurs trajets de la journée sont distribués sur plusieurs lignes. C’est ce qui explique d’ailleurs ces fameux « Désolés / Hors service » : leurs chauffeurs sont tout simplement entre deux trajets et s’apprêtent à rejoindre une autre ligne.
L’horaire d’un chauffeur est déterminé d’avance : il fera, par exemple, le trajet de la ligne X vers l’est, puis celui de la ligne Y vers le sud, pour ensuite faire le trajet Z vers l’ouest – se mettant, entre chacun, en mode « Désolé ».
Or, explique-t-on au service à la clientèle, il est possible qu’un chauffeur accumule du retard sur son trajet X – les raisons en sont multiples. Mais au lieu de traîner ce retard sur les lignes Y et Z, il peut arriver que celui-ci décide de « sauter » Y pour directement rejoindre Z à l’heure. Les usagers d’Y, dans ce cas, sont laissés sur le carreau.
De l’avis même du service à la clientèle, certains chauffeurs « tournent les coins ronds », sautant certains arrêts, voire des trajets entiers, pour ne pas trop affecter leur horaire de la journée.
Aux relations médias, on admet qu’un tel scénario puisse se produire, mais avec un bémol majeur : ces « sauts » émanent de consignes claires venues du chef d’opération.
« Il peut effectivement arriver qu’un bus soit tellement en retard qu’il doive sauter un trajet, à la demande du chef d’opération, rectifie Mme Tremblay. Il ne peut pas le faire de son propre chef. »
Si un chauffeur était surpris à le faire, il devrait en subir les conséquences, assure-t-elle.
Celle-ci en profite d’ailleurs pour encourager les usagers à communiquer avec le service à la clientèle. « Tous les commentaires et toutes les plaintes sont acheminés aux centres de transport concernés. »

description.hltext_display: Be careful when quoting the Bible (44)
description.content: Quoting Bible passages without considering the time, place, and full context in which the passage occurs is often a misleading business. Yet, when some people believe that the Creator of the Universe limits saving grace only to Christians, quoting some New Testament passages (New International Version) might demonstrate that God?s goodness does not confine itself to narrow concepts. For example, when Peter finds a Roman centurion who is devout and generous, he says: ?I now realize how true it is that God does not show favoritism but accepts from every nation the one who fears him and does what is right? (Acts 10:34). When some Christians state a judgment, seemingly without doubt, that Muslims are going to hell, they might reflect on Jesus? warning to hypocrites who think they see errors in others? behavior but ignore the greater error in their own perceptions. ?Do not judge, or you too will be judged, and with the measure you use, it will be measured to you? (Matthew 7:1-5). Jesus made a point of using good foreigners to demonstrate lack of gratitude or generosity among his followers. When Jesus was near Samaria, he cured ten men of leprosy. Only the Samaritan, a ?foreigner,? came back to praise God (Luke 17:11-19; also see Luke 10:29-37). Paul says that in spiritual matters, we see ?but a poor reflection in a mirror,? which would seem to cast doubt on sharp distinctions about who is saved or not. The greatest quality is not faith or hope, but love, which we find almost everywhere in the world (I Corinthians 13: 12-13). Perhaps most worth pondering is the great pronouncement by Jesus that when the final day comes, those who are among the chosen will be people who, perhaps without knowing the ?right? language or set of beliefs, cared for those in need (Matthew 25:31-46). A Muslim, Hindu, Buddhist or a person of any belief could be chosen. These passages constitute one of many strands in the New Testament, but, for Bible believers, it is a set that should be remembered when we make judgments about who is saved and who is going to hell. We can know little about the deepest spiritual nature of our neighbors, and surely can know only as ?a poor reflection in a mirror? the mind of God. Joe Hall Shawnee

description.hltext_display: Gifts mistaken as trash found in landfill, returned to children
description.content: They say one?s trash can be another?s treasure, but what a Central Disposal employee found and recovered at a landfill site Tuesday was described as a ?Christmas miracle.? Several children?s Christmas presents mistaken as trash and accidentally thrown away ended up in a landfill but were found by the determined driver, Shawn Osborne, who searched through piles of garbage to find and return those gifts. The happy-ending story put those involved in the Christmas spirit. Linn Ingold, a teacher at Pleasant Grove Elementary School, told Osborne, ?You are my Christmas miracle.? For Osborne, a father himself, it was a joy to return the packages to the school, hand delivering them to Ingold and the intended recipients. ?That?s what Christmas is all about ? it?s for the kids,? he said. Each year, Ingold said she purchases Christmas presents for the four nieces and three grandchildren of Rosie and Captain Smith, the married physical education teachers at the school. Monday, she left a black trash bag ? full of labeled gift bags with Christmas presents for those children ? by their office door in the gym area so they?d get them Tuesday. But the night custodian, by mistake, thought that bag was trash and put it out in the school?s dumpster with the rest of the day?s garbage. Tuesday morning, Ingold discovered the coaches didn?t get those gifts, so a search began. They figured the presents had been placed in the dumpster and could be easily retrieved, but it wasn?t quite that easy ? Central Disposal workers had emptied the school?s dumpster about 5 a.m. It appeared all was lost until Ingold called Kellie Howard at Central Disposal to find the driver, who was notified and began to search the landfill. ?He was going through the dump ? what a wonderful man,? Ingold said. Osborne said he was called while on his route and told about the packages. From his drop-offs that day, he said he had a pretty good idea where that load was, so he, with the help of equipment operators at the landfill site, began searching through the piles of trash. There were many black trash sacks with blue draw strings, he said, making that search tedious. After digging more than an hour, ?I had just about given up,? Osborne said, when the dozer?s last scoop revealed two full black trash bags. And just like the Christmas miracle others believe happened, when Osborne checked one of those sacks, it was full of presents. He said the work was worth it. ?If it meant those kids would have some sort of Christmas, it was worth the time to do that,? Osborne said. ?I knew one way or another, I would find it.? Because he picked up many other dumpsters of trash that day, from businesses to restaurants, he was glad the presents weren?t ruined. ?When I opened the bag, everything was still dry and clean,? he said, although the bag had been ?smashed.? And while Ingold agreed the gifts ? including Nike backpacks ? were ?crunched up? some, she said the presents were still intact and fine in the gift bags. ?What a miracle,? Ingold said. ?Not a lot of people would have done what he did. This guy is an awesome guy.? Howard, who is the human resources director for Central Disposal, agreed, adding she is thankful Osborne could help. ?It gave us Christmas spirit around the office,? she said. If the presents hadn?t been found, Howard said owners of Central Disposal had already decided they would replace the childrens? gifts.

description.hltext_display: 日本經濟大臣:企業稅下調5%將提振經濟增長
description.content:
日本經濟財政大臣表示，企業稅下調5%的計劃將提振經濟增長，但是，需要時間來評估減稅的全部影響。綜合媒體12月22日� �導，日本經濟財政大臣海江田萬里(Banri Kaieda)22日� �計，企業稅率下調五個百分點的計劃將對日本經濟增長產生積極影響。
不過，海江田萬里稱，需要時間來評估減稅的全部影響。
上周，日本內閣府(Cabinet)通過了這一減稅計劃，但該計劃仍有待議會(Parliament)批準。
(鄭相羽 編輯)

description.hltext_display: Brookwater Announces Letter of Intent to Acquire Oil & Gas Concessions
description.content:
Brookwater Ventures Inc. (TSX VENTURE:BW.H) ("Brookwater") is pleased to announce that it has entered into a Letter of Intent dated December 6, 2010 to acquire (the "Acquisition") all of the outstanding share capital of Água Grande Exploração e Produção de Petróleo Ltda, a private limited Brazilian company ("Água Grande"), through the issuance of an aggregate of 13,250,000 common shares of Brookwater. Mr. Wagner Freire, the President of Água Grande will remain as President of the Brazilian subsidiary. Mr. Freire is a former E&P Managing Director of Petrobras and President of BRASPETRO, International Division of Petrobras, and a founder of Starfish Oil & Gas S.A., recently acquired by Sonangol, to become Sonangol Starfish Oil & Gas S.A. ("Sonangol Starfish"). Mr. Freire and the Água Grande technical team will strive to expand the Brazilian property portfolio through their wide reaching network in the Brazilian industry.
Água Grande is a party to a Farm-Out Agreement dated November 25, 2010 with Somoil Internacional de Petróleo Ltda. and Sonangol Starfish, pursuant to which Água Grande has the right, subject to the approval of the Brazilian National Petroleum Agency ("ANP"), to acquire an undivided 30% interest in certain oil & gas exploration concessions (Block REC-T-166) located in the Recôncavo Basin in Brazil (the "Concessions").
As one of the conditions to the completion of the Acquisition, Brookwater intends to complete a non-brokered private placement (the "Offering") in the aggregate amount of $1,500,000. Brookwater will be offering 6,000,000 subscription receipts at a price of $0.25 per subscription receipt, each convertible into one common share of Brookwater upon completion of the Acquisition. The Offering proceeds will be held in escrow until the Acquisition is completed. If the Acquisition is not completed by April 30, 2011, the Offering proceeds will be returned to subscribers. Pursuant to the Letter of Intent, Água Grande will also complete a debenture financing in the principal amount of $3,500,000, which will be convertible on closing of the Acquisition, at a deemed price of $0.25 per share, into an additional 14,000,000 common shares of Brookwater.
The concession for Block REC-T-166, which covers an area of 30 km², was awarded to Sonangol Starfish by ANP in 2007 as part of the bid-round process, and the relevant contract was signed on March 12, 2008. During the contract period (which expires on March 12, 2012), Sonangol Starfish is required to complete an exploration program consisting basically of seismic surveys and commence the drilling of an exploratory well.
Block REC-T-166 is well situated in the highly productive Recôncavo Basin (see Figure 1 below) which has been producing oil and gas since the late thirties and continues to produce 45,000 b/d of oil and 66,000 boe/d of gas. The recent discovery of the Jandaia field, containing 16 million barrels of 42º API oil confirms the discovery potential of the basin. Block REC-T-166 occurs immediately west of the large Água Grande field, which contained 675 million barrels of oil at discovery in 1952 and continues to produce 3,000 b/d. Figure 2 below shows the location of the major fields in the basin which are surrounding the REC-T-166 Block.
Sonangol Starfish reprocessed and reinterpreted the 2D seismic data available and completed a 3D seismic survey in order to define the potential of Block REC-T-166. Several prospects were defined.
The Água Grande E&P staff have independently completed a detailed review and identified several additional prospects which will be evaluated by the Joint Venture. Prospects and leads are related to pre-rift system, rift-Candeias system, rift-Ilhas system and fractured shales of Gomo Mb. of Candeias Fm. Sonangol Starfish staff had previously defined the Macaúba prospect, related to the Água Grande – Sergi pre-rift system and approved the drilling of 1-MAC-1-BA wildcat. Figure 3 illustrates the various producing structures in the basin and Figure 4 is a seismic section of the 1-MAC-1-BA prospect.
To view Figures 1 - 4 accompanying this press release, please click on the following link: http://media3.marketwire.com/docs/bw1221.pdf
In addition to the Macaúba prospect, Sonangol Starfish and Água Grande E&P have identified other prospects, in different structural settings, that will be considered for drilling by the Joint Venture.
In order to acquire its interest in the Concessions under the Farm-Out Agreement, Água Grande must (i) pay 50% of the costs and expenses incurred in relation to the drilling, logging, testing and completion or plugging and abandonment of one exploration well and thereafter pay its share of costs incurred in connection therewith; and (ii) in case of a commercial discovery, pay its share of the total agreed costs and expenses incurred prior to the execution of the Farm-Out Agreement.
Água Grande has commissioned a NI 51-101 report on the Concessions, which is expected to be completed and filed with the TSX Venture Exchange (the "Exchange") for review in connection with the proposed transaction. Further information on the Concessions and future exploration programs will be announced once the NI 51-101 report has received regulatory approval and has been filed on SEDAR.
The Acquisition will constitute a Change of Business under the policies of the Exchange, and will result in the graduation of the Company from NEX to the TSX Venture Exchange. Completion of the Acquisition is subject to a number of conditions, including Exchange acceptance and shareholder approval. The transaction cannot close until the required shareholder approval is obtained. There can be no assurance that the transaction will be completed as proposed or at all.
Investors are cautioned that, except as disclosed in the disclosure document to be prepared in connection with the Acquisition, any information released or received with respect to the transaction may not be accurate or complete and should not be relied upon. Trading in the securities of Brookwater should be considered highly speculative. Trading will remain halted pending further regulatory filings with the Exchange.
The securities of Brookwater to be issued in the financing will be subject to a four month hold period. The securities of Brookwater to be issued on the Acquisition will be subject to a four month hold period, in addition to the escrow requirements of the Exchange. The parties to the proposed transaction are at arm's length.
ON BEHALF OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF BROOKWATER VENTURES INC.
Scott Ackerman, President & CEO
Information in this press release expressed in barrels of oil equivalent (boes) is derived by converting natural gas to oil in the ratio of six thousand cubic feet (mcf) of natural gas to one barrel (bbl) of oil. Boe may be misleading, particularly if used in isolation. A boe conversion ratio of 5.7 mcf: 1 bbl is based on an energy equivalency conversion method primarily applicable at the burner tip and does not represent a value equivalency at the wellhead.
This news release may contain forward-looking statements. These statements are based on current expectations and assumptions that are subject to risks and uncertainties. Actual results could differ materially because of factors discussed in the management discussion and analysis section of our interim and most recent annual financial statement or other reports and filings with the TSX Venture Exchange and applicable Canadian securities regulations. We do not assume any obligation to update any forward-looking statements.

description.hltext_display: 海口农民工苦守半拉子15年 工钱至今无着落
description.content:
苦守工地15年的老蔡很无奈
“我在这工地守了15年，不仅没有拿到应有的工钱，最近买下这工地的人还把我赶了出来。”21日上午，站在海口市桂林洋农场海滨开发区一建筑工地前，71岁的农民工老林一脸愁容。和他同样发愁的还有这个工地的承建商老蔡，他为这个工程垫资了200多万元，自工程因故停工后就不断找工程建设方讨要，但至今仍未到手，无法偿还老林等农民工的工钱。
矗立了15年的半拉子
该工程建设单位――海南省旅游委下属的国际旅游开发服务中心((以下简称“旅游开发中心”)负责人向记者表示，该工程确实存在拖欠工程款的事情，由于纪检和警方已介入该项目工程有关问题的调查，要等调查结果出来后，才能与工程承建方坐下来协商工程款的事宜。
农民工苦守半拉子15年
在海口市桂林洋农场海边开发区，有一栋十分“抢眼”的4层楼。该楼的建筑面积约4500平方米，原为海南省旅游局国际旅游开发服务中心开发建设的综合楼，后因故停工。15年过去了，这栋楼在风吹雨打日晒中最终成了一栋半拉子。
“我50多岁就在这个工上干了。”今年71岁的农民工老林说，1995年，经熟人介绍，他跟随承包这个工程的老蔡来到了这个工地。该项目工程停工后，由于是本地人，因此老蔡就委托他和另外一名工友负责看管工地。但由于工程建设方一直没有支付老蔡工程款，他们的工资也就只好欠着。
在今年11月份，老林等看管工地的工人被人撵出了工地。因为该半拉子工程已经被旅游开发中心卖给了一家投资公司。
老林说，现在据说是一家公司花了160多万元将这栋楼买下来了，那家公司不仅将他们赶了出来，而且砌起了围墙，大门也都上了锁，但让老林不解的是，楼卖掉之后他的工钱还是没有着落：“既然这栋半拉子楼被卖了，卖楼的钱应该先支付我们的工资吧。”
承建商称被拖欠工程款
承建这个工程的是海南省第五建筑公司，老蔡是该工程的项目部经理。该综合楼工程于1995年1月开工，当年12月份，主体工程完工。但由于多方面的原因，该工程被迫停工，且一停就是15年之久。在该项目主工程完工后，承建方收到预付工程款221万多元。“原来工程总造价为380万元，但实际完成工程量为428万多元，建设方尚欠工程款206万多元。”老蔡接受记者采访表示，这笔工程款主要包括60多名民工的工资以及供应商的材料款等。
说起民工讨要工钱一事，今年65岁的老蔡满肚子苦水：“在我手下干活的民工大多是广西的，有60多个。因为我是工程的负责人，这些被拖欠工钱的民工只能找我讨要。”他说，每年的春节前，这些农民工都会派5-6名代表从广西来海口讨债，住在他家不走了，一讨就是15年。几年前，10多个民工代表在春节前来到他家，“我老婆煮了两锅饭都不够吃，在家里摊地铺睡，下脚的地方都没有。”
广西民工每次来讨工钱，老蔡只能向朋友亲戚借钱给他们路费，好好安抚他们，表示钱一旦要到，就通知他们。“每到春节前夕，我都为工程款的事情头疼不已，有时候甚至连家都不敢回。”蔡说，“他们见我确实没有要到工程款，每次来也没怎么为难我，但每次我或多或少要给他们拿些路费和过年钱。今年他们马上就又要来了，我真不知道该对他们怎么说。”
老蔡告诉记者，在15年里，他多次向建设方讨要工程款，但一直没有任何结果：“他们的领导已经换了好几批了，现任领导说要支付工程款，但就是不给我们。”
据了解，老蔡在15年间，多次打报告给当时的省旅游局负责人，主要负责人对此进行了批示，但最后还是不了了之。“本来早就要给我们的钱，为什么一直拖了15年之久呢?”老蔡说，希望原在他手下干活的广西农民工，今年是最后一次向他讨要工钱。
建设方称还要再等等
“我们与民工之间不存在债务关系，我们已经支付了相应的款项。”21日上午，记者来到了林先生等人所说的买下这栋半拉子的公司――海南景华实业投资公司核实相关情况。该公司一名姓盛的相关负责人接受记者采访时表示，他们确实向旅游开发中心购买了这栋半拉子楼，而且也支付了相关款项，并办理了有关手续，公司要求这些农民工不要再继续留在工地合理合法。
21日下午，记者也联系上了旅游开发中心的谢主任。谢主任向记者表示，确实有拖欠综合楼工程款一事，但尚欠的工程款究竟是不是老蔡所说的200多万元，还需要进一步核算确定。谢主任否认了该楼160多万元卖给他人的说法。他告诉记者，该综合楼最终并没有卖给他人，也就是说还不算交易成功。谢主任称，纪检和公安部门已经介入有关交易的调查，要等调查结果出来，他们再与承建方坐下来协商工程款支付问题。

description.hltext_display: Gifts mistaken as trash found in landfill, returned to children
description.content: They say one?s trash can be another?s treasure, but what a Central Disposal employee found and recovered at a landfill site Tuesday was described as a ?Christmas miracle.? Several children?s Christmas presents mistaken as trash and accidentally thrown away ended up in a landfill but were found by the determined driver, Shawn Osborne, who searched through piles of garbage to find and return those gifts. The happy-ending story put those involved in the Christmas spirit. Linn Ingold, a teacher at Pleasant Grove Elementary School, told Osborne, ?You are my Christmas miracle.? For Osborne, a father himself, it was a joy to return the packages to the school, hand delivering them to Ingold and the intended recipients. ?That?s what Christmas is all about ? it?s for the kids,? he said. Each year, Ingold said she purchases Christmas presents for the four nieces and three grandchildren of Rosie and Captain Smith, the married physical education teachers at the school. Monday, she left a black trash bag ? full of labeled gift bags with Christmas presents for those children ? by their office door in the gym area so they?d get them Tuesday. But the night custodian, by mistake, thought that bag was trash and put it out in the school?s dumpster with the rest of the day?s garbage. Tuesday morning, Ingold discovered the coaches didn?t get those gifts, so a search began. They figured the presents had been placed in the dumpster and could be easily retrieved, but it wasn?t quite that easy ? Central Disposal workers had emptied the school?s dumpster about 5 a.m. It appeared all was lost until Ingold called Kellie Howard at Central Disposal to find the driver, who was notified and began to search the landfill. ?He was going through the dump ? what a wonderful man,? Ingold said. Osborne said he was called while on his route and told about the packages. From his drop-offs that day, he said he had a pretty good idea where that load was, so he, with the help of equipment operators at the landfill site, began searching through the piles of trash. There were many black trash sacks with blue draw strings, he said, making that search tedious. After digging more than an hour, ?I had just about given up,? Osborne said, when the dozer?s last scoop revealed two full black trash bags. And just like the Christmas miracle others believe happened, when Osborne checked one of those sacks, it was full of presents. He said the work was worth it. ?If it meant those kids would have some sort of Christmas, it was worth the time to do that,? Osborne said. ?I knew one way or another, I would find it.? Because he picked up many other dumpsters of trash that day, from businesses to restaurants, he was glad the presents weren?t ruined. ?When I opened the bag, everything was still dry and clean,? he said, although the bag had been ?smashed.? And while Ingold agreed the gifts ? including Nike backpacks ? were ?crunched up? some, she said the presents were still intact and fine in the gift bags. ?What a miracle,? Ingold said. ?Not a lot of people would have done what he did. This guy is an awesome guy.? Howard, who is the human resources director for Central Disposal, agreed, adding she is thankful Osborne could help. ?It gave us Christmas spirit around the office,? she said. If the presents hadn?t been found, Howard said owners of Central Disposal had already decided they would replace the childrens? gifts.
