description.hltext_display: アメリカで家を買うには？ - ちょっときついでしょうねえ…
description.content:
アメリカ中西部在住です。現在のアパートをレントして４年が経ちました。アパートが狭いので、引越しを考えていたところ、家を購入するという案も出てきました。来年早々にアメリカ市民と結婚予定です。２人ともここが出身地ではないのですが、最低でもあと５年はいたいと思っています。彼のクレジットは全くダメです。私はそこそこいいらしいのですが、今までローンを組んだこともなければ、クレジットカードを持ち始めてからも数年程度です。
家の購入といっても、２人とも貯金はゼロなので、２ベッド程度でぼろい家foreclosureでもいいので安いものを買うつもりで前向きに考えています。が、私は家の購入はおろか、ローンの組み方など全くの無知です。もちろんこれから自分で調べていくつもりですが、アメリカで住宅購入の経験がある方や詳しい方、教えていただけないでしょうか？
まずどこに相談に行くべきでしょうか？銀行？不動産？例えば収入が月＄３０００の場合、毎月のローンの支払いはどのくらいに抑えるべきでしょうか？そのほかに毎月かかる費用（税金、保険などでしょうか）やクロージングのときにかかる費用など参考になることがありましたら何でもかまわないので教えてください。どうぞよろしくお願いいたします。
ユーザーID：0741858777
お気に入り登録数：0
古いレス順
レス数：15本
タイトル
投稿者
在米者
2010年12月22日 10:31
HGTV (Home and Garden TV)というケーブル局で放送されている
House Hunter
Property Virgin
My First Place
などを見られることをオススメします。
あと、コミュニティスクールなどで不動産購入の基本を教えてくれる講座があることもあります。
アメリカで普通に家を買う時には会社を通すというより、個人のrealtorが相手になりますから、知人などを通じて信用できる人を紹介してもらって相談すると良いと思います。
ただし、随分いい加減な人もいますのでその点はよく注意して下さい。
ユーザーID：4375035668
平民
2010年12月22日 10:51
先ずは信用できそうな不動産屋のエージェントに相談されてはどうですか。日本語の方がよければ、日本人のエージェントもアメリカ中にいる筈です。
そのエージェントが不動産購入の流れなどを教えてくれる筈です。また大抵のエージェントはモゲージ会社なども紹介してくれるので、そこであなたがどの程度の価格の家を購入できるとか、どの程度のローンが組めるとかを教えてくれます。
今はローンの審査がかなり厳しいので、貯金／頭金がゼロというのは難しいかもしれませんね。でも今は不動産の買い時ですし、聞くだけなら無料ですからね。頑張ってください。
ユーザーID：7319505517
yai
2010年12月22日 11:06
基本的に４年お住みに成っていて、貯金ゼロとはどんな御事情があるのですか、お家よりは貯金をする習慣をつける事が先ではないでしょうか、お相手の方もクレジットが駄目とのこと、楽天的な人が多いと云うアメリカでもお家を考えるには、飛躍しすぎていませんか、
もっともアメリカ人はそれが普通かもしれません、でも御病気でもされたら大丈夫ですか、年金や医療保険には加入されていますか、まったくの老婆心ですが、
ユーザーID：1109698829
junko
2010年12月22日 11:07
簡単な説明がこちらにありますので参考までに。。。
収入の３分の一が一般的な住宅ローンの支払額ということらしいですね。
当方、シアトル在住ですが保険や税金は購入する家の資産価値、場所によって様々かと思います。口座を持っている銀行で相談されることをお勧めします。
ユーザーID：3689546820
唄お
2010年12月22日 11:16
クレジットがダメダメな人と結婚して家まで買うなんてチャレンジャーですね。
頭金が多ければ多いほど借りる金額が減るから払う利子分も減ります。頭金が払えないとなるとその分余計に保険をかけなければいけないんじゃなかったっけ。。借りられればだけど。今お金無ければ結局たくさん支払わなければいけなくなりますよ。
銀行でもローンのこと教えてくれます。また家を買いたいと言えば不動産屋さんも教えてくれると思います。あと、本もいろいろ出てますよ。
ぼろい家でも良いとおっしゃいますが、ぼろい家だと今度引っ越す時に売れないと思いますよ。売りに出す時にも家の見栄えを良くする為などお金入り用になります。
これからお金で苦労する人生を歩みそうなトピ主さん。心配になっちゃいますが、彼と結婚して彼の為に家を買って、それで大丈夫なんですよね？
ユーザーID：7679828052
ファタモガーナ
2010年12月22日 12:17
初めて家を購入する人向けの本が出ているのでそれで概要を学びましょう。それから、自分たちの収入ではどの程度の家が買えるのか考えてみましょう。頭金は基本的に家の値段の２０パーセントは用意しておいた方がいいでしょうが、１０パーセントでもお金は借りられます。ただし毎月いくらかの保険料を支払うか頭金をセカンドモーゲッジとして借りる様に勧められるでしょう。とりあえず頭金の貯金から始めなくてはいけないようですね。それからブローカーにコンタクトした方がいいと思います。
彼のクレジットスコアが全くだめというのが気に掛かりますね。今からでもスコアを改善する様に努力しましょう。
それから、家を見るときに買う事ばかりを考えるのではなく売るときの事も考えておいた方がいいと思います。いざ家を売るとなって、この家で買い手が付くかどうかという事も考えておかないと失敗するかもしれません。
思いついたのはこのくらいです。参考になれば幸いです。
ユーザーID：7145148175
サブプライム
2010年12月22日 12:20
確かに今は住宅価格は底値だし、住宅ローンの金利は史上最低、住宅は買い時だと思います。
「このまま家賃を無駄に払い続けるなら買ったほうが・・・」と思うのも解ります。
しかしこちらを読んでください。
低金利といえども頭金なしだと金利５％程度。
貯金がないと、家や車にかかるコストを用立てるためにエクイティローンを借りたりして
借金が膨らむ危険もあります。
家は想像以上に維持にとてもお金がかかります。
それでもどうしても欲しければ・・
月収３０００ドルだと、月の支払いはローン＋ＴＡＸ＋保険で８００ドルくらいが限界だと思います。
欲しい家が決まったら、モーゲージブローカーか、銀行にローンの相談に行きましょう。
子供ができたりして生活スタイルも変わるかもしれないし（子供を授かったり）
数年後には２ＢＥＤの家は小さいと感じるかもしれません。
そのとき家が売れずにずっとその家に縛られる可能性がありますよ。
よ〜く考えてください！
ユーザーID：7483962300
ちなみ
2010年12月22日 12:55
住宅バブル崩壊を被った人たちの失敗、これだけ報道もされてますし
もちろん見聞きされてますよね？
クレジットがダメ、頭金なし、貯金もなし。
そもそも昨今の状況だとまともなモーゲージの審査通るのかという状況です。
しかも仮に買えたとしても、今の場所に何年いるのかもはっきりしない。
ロケーションにもよるでしょうが、2BR程度のボロ家なら恐らく転売性も低い。
ボロければメンテ費用も馬鹿にならない。
一般には今底で買い時と言われますけど、それってあくまで一般の話で、
個々の状況によってもちろん当てはまらない場合もあるわけです。
トピ文に書かれている内容だと、買って正解な条件が見当たりません。
買うと借りるのどちらが賢いか？はよくPF記事とかで取り上げられますが、
ご自分の希望が現実的な話なのかよく検討してみてください。
あと、図書館に行けば First time home buyer guide 的な本がたくさんあります。
ユーザーID：7156556157
在米
2010年12月22日 13:14
先ずは、不動産税ですが、カウンティーの役所に行けば、全ての家の評価額と税金が分かります。職員に訊けば、評価額の何パーセントが税金かも教えて貰えます。
ローンですが、男性側がクレジット評価が悪ければ、貴女一人の名前で登記とローンを組む可能性があります。従って、旦那側の収入がローン審査の対象にならない可能性もあります。
毎月幾ら払えるかは、二人とも貯金ゼロという事ですので、現在払っている家賃以下になりますね。安い家を購入したいという事ですので、手直しの分にお金が掛かりますし、定期的な修繕にお金を積み立てる必要があります。従って、今までの状況で貯金ゼロなら、それ以下の返済額でないと、家を直す費用が無くなります。保険については、ローンに付いて来ますので、問題ないでしょう。
トピを見る限りでは、お二人とも家の購入や金銭な事に対して知識が深くないようですので、今は止めた方が良いと思います。その地域を出るまでに、旦那さんのクレジットスコアを回復させる事と、貯金をする事を目標にした方が良いと思います。頭金が家の金額の二割が安全な目標です。頑張って下さいね。
ユーザーID：6991633233
フロリディアン
2010年12月22日 14:45
私は１０年近く前に購入しました。私の場合は頭金３０％の３０年モーゲージ、月々の支払いは税金と保険込みで手取りの２０％ほどでした。ただお金の使い道もないので一昨年全額返済してしまいました（税関係の利点は無くなります）。
まず頭金が無くクレジットヒストリーも良くないと利率も高いし保険（ＰＭＩ）が課される場合が多く、月々の支払いが思ったよりかなり高くなる可能性が高いです。それは銀行などで実際に算出してもらいましょう。市場にでている最低利率＋ＰＭＩ無しに比べてどの程度割り増しになるか分かればそれでも借りたいかどうか判断し易いと思います。
あとはボロい家でもとのことですが、家の維持というのは非常にお金がかかります。私も賃貸から持ち家に移って最初に学んだのがそれです。最低限でも配管、配線、害虫駆除、空調点検維持など。ボロい家は下手すると修理や維持にかなりのお金が飛んでいきます。下手にボロい中古車を買うと修理代にお金をつぎ込むのと同じです。新車は高いけど当分修理費はかかりませんよね。
購入価格が安ければ良いというものではないです。賃貸と違って維持修理も全部自分で払うのですから。
ユーザーID：3202651795
tasuke
2010年12月22日 14:57
銀行でローン審査を受けてみるといくらまで貸してもらえるかがわかります。ただ、ふたりとも貯金がゼロの時点でローンに通らないと思うのですが…。
ユーザーID：9711819198
フロリディアン
2010年12月22日 15:03
基本的にモーゲージの支払いは手取りの３０％に抑えるべきという人が多いといわれています。私は独身なので一時的に収入が途絶えたりしても払っていける額に抑えたいというのが目安でした。
とりあえず５年は住むけどそれ以降は売る可能性もあると言う場合、転売価値も考慮に入れておく必要もありますよ。例えば購入価格が安いからというだけでイマイチな立地でボロい家を買っても、５年後に売ろうとしたらあちこち手を入れない限り損出を出さずに売れないという場合も考えられます。
それに加えて５年間にかかった維持費や修理代を合算すると実は賃貸のほうが安かったなんてことも充分にあり得ます。
私なら価格が安いというだけでボロい家は買いません。予算に限りがあり転売の可能性があるのなら小さくて多少安普請でも築年数の浅いものとか立地が人気の物件などを探すと思います。うちの地元では最近は「アメリカ版建売住宅」が築１０年くらいで結構手放されています。５年なら私はそういう物件を考えるかなあ。低維持＋低予算＋転売も大きな利益は出ないけど何とか売れそうですし。
ユーザーID：3202651795
一産婦人科医
2010年12月22日 15:15
地域で評判もしくは懇意にしているRealtorがいる友人はいませんか？そういう人を見つけるのが近道です。アメリカの地方都市での不動産価格は、ほとんどが上物の値段です。土地などはほとんど無価値（250坪で＄5000位、家が＄100000）のようでした。購入に際しては、まず銀行に出向き仮審査を通さないといけません。そこで借入可能額が算定されます。収入が月＄３０００でしたらせいぜい月額＄600位にしていないと後々厳しいです。ぼろ家と言っても色々ですが小奇麗でも築５０年などざらにあると思います。ぼろ家はそれだけ劣化が来ていますので、水道管やら下水道やら暖房やらが壊れることも覚悟しておく必要があり、その修繕費用が結構バカにはなりません。また、必須の火災保険（幾らか忘れました）や固定資産税（私の家で年間＄2000位）も結構取られます。クロージングコストは購入側は確か無かったような気がします。せいぜいローンのためのAppraisal費用ぐらいじゃなかったかと。仲介手数料も販売価格の7％位が売り買いに携わったRealtorに持っていかれるので売主が負担ということになります。

description.hltext_display: ‘People think insurers don’t want to pay claims’
description.content:
Majority of the people think insurance companies do not want to pay claims when the need arises and it is necessary for the insurance operators to put the record straight, Justice Adesola Oguntade (retd), chairman, Nigerian Insurers Association’s Customer Complaints Bureau, has said.
Speaking during the inauguration of the bureau in Lagos recently, Oguntade said the decision of NIA to set up the bureau is a welcome development.
With such a bureau in place, he said the insurance industry would be better for it at the end of the day as members of the public will now have confidence in the insurance operators and believe that their genuine claims will be paid.
He assured that the bureau would serve as a one-stop shop for dealing with disputes about insurance services; resolve disputes quickly and with minimum formality and provide a prompt, user-friendly and unbureaucratic service to insurance companies and their aggrieved customers.
Accordingly, the bureau would take decisions, which are consistent, fair and reasonable while remaining cost-effective and efficient and accessible to all groups in the industry, including the vulnerable and the disadvantaged he promised.
Justice Oguntade also assured that the bureau would add good value to the industry by the industry in addition to earning the trust and respect of insurance consumers, operators and other interest groups as well.
The Customer Complaints Bureau serves as an ombudsman that will be resolving disagreements between insurance companies and their aggrieved customers, especially on the issue of claims payment.
The bureau serves as an Alternative Dispute Resolution (ADR) mechanism for the industry devoid of all the protocols and technicalities involved in normal court process.
The ombudsman also assured that the bureau would serve as a one-stop shop for dealing with disputes about insurance services and resolve disputes quickly and with minimum formality.
NIA Chairman, Mr. Olusola Ladipo-Ajayi, confirmed that membership of the bureau will include a representative of both the Nigerian Bar Association (NBA) and NIA even as it is free to co-opt or seek advice from any persons for the purpose of arriving at a fair and equitable decision.
According to him, the bureau would also serve as an independent opinion on disputes between insurance companies and insurance consumers in the country and reduce the cost of obtaining justice for aggrieved insureds across the country.
He added that all the 51 insurance companies in the country have also given their commitment to abide by the decision of the complaints bureau while aggrieved insurance consumers are free to either abide by the ruling of the bureau or seek further redress in the court of law.
“The bureau will listen, discuss, answer questions, provide information, and help develop options for resolving issues that may be brought before them. It is an alternative dispute resolution mechanism which is non-confrontational, impartial, and based on the principle of equity and good faith.
“It will serve as an independent and impartial office to investigate and mediate in disputes arising from insurance transactions and to recommend appropriate measures for amicable settlement.

the insurance industry would be better for it at the end of the day as members of the public will now have confidence in the insurance operators and believe that their genuine claims will be paid

membership of the bureau will include a representative of both the Nigerian Bar Association (NBA) and NIA even as it is free to co-opt or seek advice from any persons for the purpose of arriving ata fair and equitable decision.

description.hltext_display: Alain Bashung : Enfin une sépulture à sa hauteur...
description.author: Purepeople.com
description.content:
Plus d'un an et demi après sa mort, la sépulture d'Alain Bashung vient enfin d'être installée. Depuis les obsèques du chanteur emporté par un cancer, seule une plaque de béton recouvrait son cercueil dans le cimetière du Père-Lachaise dans le XXe arrondissement de Paris. Le monument est blanc, "simple à l'image du chanteur", glisse une fan interrogée par Le Parisien, on y retrouve le sillon des disques vinyles et cette inscription : "Alain Baschung. 1947-2009. Tant aimé." Baschung avec un "C", son vrai nom. Lire la suite l'article
Photos/Vidéos liées
Si l'installation a pris tellement de temps, c'est parce que la famille de l'artiste est entrée en conflit avec la société de pompes funèbres Pascal Leclerc, dans le 14e arrondissement parisien. Après plusieurs mois de bras de fer, rien n'avait été fait. La veuve de l'artiste, Chloé Mons, mère du dernier enfant de Bashung, une fille prénommée Poppée, avait décidé d'agir en saisissant la justice et en rendant l'affaire publique : "Depuis avril [2009], je me bats contre la société Pascal Leclerc, qui n'a, à ce jour, jamais posé de stèle sur la sépulture de mon époux Alain Bashung, et ce malgré diverses mises en demeure et notamment par une sommation du 24 septembre. La mémoire d'Alain est bafouée et trahie. Je suis atterrée et attristée devant tant de malhonnêteté et de désinvolture." Chloé Bashung et sa fille, la famille, les fans ont enfin obtenu gain de cause.
Par ailleurs Alain Bashung fera l'objet d'un album tribute édité par Barclay, sa maison de disques. On y retrouvera Bertrand Cantat - avec qui il chantait le duo Volontaire en 2000 - dans une reprise de Aucun Express. Vanessa Paradis - pour qui Bashung avait composé L'eau et le vin pour l'album Bliss - reprendra la très belle chanson Agora, parue en 1998, sur l'excellent Fantaisie Militaire.
Plus d'infos sur purepeople.comLes regrettés Alain Bashung et Pierre Desproges à l'honneur !La Révolution française : L'opéra-rock triomphal est de retour !Chloé Bashung : La mémoire d'Alain est bafouée et trahie !

description.hltext_display: 小灵通明年彻底退市 上海用户迁移方案陆续出台
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
小灵通在华十二载明年将退市
上海用户“迁移方案”陆续出台
晚报记者 秦川 报道 制图 邬思蓓
“小灵通，每个人的无线市话。 ”1998年，这句熟悉的广告语伴随小灵通进入了中国市场，用户数量一度突破1亿。但随着3G网络的崛起，它的历史使命也即将走到尽头。按照工信部的既定部署，小灵通明年将彻底退市，全面为3G让路。
根据工信部昨天披露的数据，截至今年11月底，全国小灵通用户已减至3000万。目前，现存小灵通用户的套餐转移和升级已在全国多座城市陆续启动。
小灵通明年将彻底退出市场
1998年，浙江余杭区正式开通小灵通，实行单向收费，月租费20元，资费每分钟0.2元，标志着小灵通正式进入我国市场。过去的12年间，小灵通在全国各大城市遍地开花，凭借低廉的收费，用户一度冲破1亿大关。
随着3G网络的异军突起，昔日风光无限的小灵通也迎来“入土”倒计时。 2009年2月，政府主管部门已明确要求所有1900-1920MHz频段无线接入系统应在2011年底前完成清频退网工作，以确保不对 1880-1900MHz频段TD-SCDMA系统产生有害干扰。这意味着，小灵通“寿终正寝”的日子已经不远。
昨天上午，工信部披露了最新的数据。截至11月底，全国电话用户11.48亿户，其中移动电话用户8.42亿；固话用户2.98亿，包含小灵通用户3034.7万，小灵通在固话用户中比例降至10.2%，降到历史最低水平。
近段时间以来，全国不少城市的小灵通纷纷表示接到运营商的提醒电话，告知其小灵通退市已进入倒计时，并提出了各种转换方案。“我们早已向上海地区的用户拨打关怀电话，提醒其注意时间节点。事实上，到明年年底以前，只要沪上还有一个用户在用小灵通，我们就会站好最后一班岗。 ”上海电信相关负责人昨对记者表示。
沪上用户迁移方案陆续出台
上海是全国最后一座被小灵通“攻克”的大城市，记者了解到，目前上海小灵通用户数量仅余10万左右。对于现有用户的整体迁移方案，上海电信方面表示，尚未接到集团和上级主管部门的统一指示。但据知情人士透露，目前已有针对一部分小灵通用户的升级方案出台，但范围有限。
根据记者所取得的初步方案，沪上小灵通用户目前可通过3种途径迁移。一是加入电信“我的e家”的三档套餐之一，包括e6、e9和尊享e9套餐，选择纳入“灵通维系包”，便可在套餐原有优惠和补贴的基础上额外获得200元终端补贴；二是用户前往电信营业厅，成功申请天翼宽带尊享e9加装版，可另行获赠150元补贴；三是直接加入各项天翼套餐，可获得100元补贴。上述补贴均用于在购买指定型号的3G手机时抵扣费用。
值得注意的是，上述迁移方案目前在上海电信官网上尚无法找到，也仅针对参加过“冬日送暖”活动的小灵通用户。该活动这是电信在几年前举办的一次推广，当时参与活动的用户可免除月租费。用户若不确定是否曾参加，可拨打10000人工咨询，报上小灵通号码、机主姓名和地址进行查询。据电信客服告知，目前针对全体小灵通用户的整体迁移方案还暂未出台。
最后一批“钉子户”顾虑几何？
目前上海还有谁在用小灵通？有总结认为，小灵通的最后守望群体主要可归纳为以下三类：一是中老年人群体，他们对通讯工具要求不高，也不需要太多功能；二是拥有多台手机的人士，他们把小灵通作为个人通讯的一种补充；三是外来打工者，这些人也因为资费较低的原因，选择了小灵通。升级成天翼套餐后，各项资费显然将高出走廉价路线的小灵通，加上更换手机的费用，便导致了一部分 “钉子户”的坚持。
通信业观察人士于斌认为，另一部分的“钉子户”可能是企业用户。有的集团当年批量采购小灵通是为了给员工福利，而且内部通讯录中都是写的小灵通短号，如果升级新号码，可能会上升财务成本及人力成本。
此外，原先一些“好号”用户也可能受影响，这些用户是花高价买的小灵通号码。目前上海详细的转网方案还未出炉，无法确定能否一机双号，致使这部分用户也有所顾虑。

description.hltext_display: Three more people abducted by "government agencies" in Balochistan
description.content:
State functionaries allegedly whisked away three people, including a human rights activist, in two separate incidents near Pasni and coastal highway Ormara in Pakistani province of Balochistan.
According to a press released issued by HRCP's Balochistan chapter, "government agents" abducted human rights activist Siddique Eido from Pasni on Tuesday.
"Eido was returning from a court hearing along with his brother when, on main Gwadar Road, several men in two vehicles used by the intelligence agencies in the area stopped the van the two brothers were travelling in and abducted Eido. At least four policemen were also travelling in the same van with the two brothers and were reportedly manhandled by the abductors," said the statement.
"Four police personnel were also in the vehicle and they humiliated and manhandled them when they put up resistance," the Daily Times quoted HRCP Balochistan Chairman Dr Mehdi Hassan, as saying in the press release.
The HRCP had serious concerns that the personnel would subject them to severe torture, and that their lives were in danger, said Hassan, demanding their immediate and safe release.
In another incident, Ilyas Baloch, a student of the , was going to Ormara from Pasni in a passenger van when armed men intercepted him and took him away at gunpoint. His relatives claimed that he was abducted by security personnel. The -Azad spokesman said in a statement that Ilyas was a BSO-Azad activist, and had been whisked away by security forces. (ANI)
SEARCH

event_or_fact.property: Four police personnel were also in the vehicle and they humiliated and manhandled them when they put up resistance
The HRCP had serious concerns that the personnel would subject them to severe torture, and that their lives were in danger

description.hltext_display: US government told to compensate Islamic charity
description.content: Washington, Dec 22 (IANS) A US court has asked the government to pay compensation to an Islamic charity after it was found that then president George W. Bush had ordered wire-tapping of the organisation after the 9/11 attack.

description.hltext_display: Will 2011 be the year of mobile malware?
description.author: Jeremy Kirk
description.content:
Perhaps one of the most common predictions of the last six years has been that mobile malicious software will suddenly proliferate, driven by widespread adoption of smartphones with advanced OSes.
None of those prognostications have really come to fruition, but it's likely that the coming year will bring a host of new malicious applications. Users - while generally aware of threats aimed at their desktop computers and laptops - have a good chance of being caught flat-footed with their mobile phones.
In the third quarter of this year, up to 80 million smartphones were sold around the world, which accounted for about 20 percent of the total number of mobile phones sold, according to statistics published last month by analyst firm Gartner. Smartphones are Internet- capable and therefore more vulnerable to attack than other mobile devices.
The threats against those devices are going to come in several categories:
Rogue applications: Marketplaces for mobile applications are becoming increasingly popular for platforms ranging from Apple's iOS and Google's Android to and Symbian. Apple maintains tight control over its App Store, which has helped reduced rogue applications from being offered. But bad applications for other platforms have popped up.
In September, researchers from security vendor Fortinet discovered a mobile component for Zeus, a notorious piece of banking malware that steals account credentials. The mobile component, which targeted Symbian Series 60 devices or BlackBerrys, intercepted one-time passcodes used to verify transactions.
The mobile app carried a legitimate signing certificate, which allowed it to be downloaded and installed on devices. The development was particularly disconcerting as many banks are looking at using mobile phones to send one-time passcodes by SMS (Short Message Service) rather than issuing separate devices that can generate the code.
There's little defence from sneaky rogue applications, but users should be generally careful about downloading programs, particularly for platforms where those applications may not be vetted so closely.
Traditional malware: While desktop OSes such as Windows are plagued by malware, there have been far fewer malicious programs aimed at mobile devices as of yet. But researchers have seen applications such as rogue dialers, which will send SMSes to premium-rate numbers owned by the fraudsters. Other threats include worms spread by communication protocols such as Bluetooth.
With the increase in use of tablet computers that use mobile operating system, those devices will also be subject to those same threats. "We do believe that is going to arrive in the next 12 months," said Bradley Anstis, vice president of technical strategy for security vendor M86. Malicious hackers are "lazy people, they will always go after the low-hanging fruit".
Privacy, data collection issues: Mobile applications can also have other privacy-related risks such as collecting, transmitting or storing data. Advertising networks and mobile application developers are often highly interested in metrics around how and where people are using their applications. Data may include information identifying a specific device, with users unaware they are being tracked. Apple, however, allows application developers to collect location information but only as long as users are notified.
Social engineering: Just like on desktops and laptops, fraud doesn't have to involve a technical trick. Phishing -- the practice of using a fake website to trick users into revealing sensitive information - is as much or more of a threat on mobile devices. People often trust their mobile device more than their computer and are therefore more vulnerable to phishing.
If a person is on a corporate network, phishing sites are usually blocked, Anstis said. But if someone is using a work mobile device over 3G, that connection is not going through a corporate gateway but the operator's network, which may not block those harmful sites. M86 has been developing a browser-based system that would send URLs to its data center for analysis and block malicious ones, Anstis said.
Other companies are also seeing opportunities for new services around mobile devices. Juniper Networks, for example, acquired SMobile Systems in July for $70 million. SMobile has a laboratory in Columbus, Ohio, that focuses on studying mobile malware, said Amir Khan, business development manager for the UK and Ireland.
"The reason we set that up is because we realise the threats in the mobile space are very specific," Khan said. "It's not just that desktop threats have migrated to the mobile world."

event_or_fact.property: We do believe that is going to arrive in the next 12 months
vice president of technical strategy, M86
business development manager for the UK and Ireland
M86 has been developing a browser-based system that would send URLs to its data center for analysis and block malicious ones
The reason we set that up is because we realise the threats in the mobile space are very specific; It's not just that desktop threats have migrated to the mobile world.
SMobile has a laboratory in Columbus, Ohio, that focuses on studying mobile malware
business development manager for the UK and Ireland
If a person is on a corporate network, phishing sites areusually blocked

description.hltext_display: 海口夫妇工作10年被炒 妻子用铁链自我捆绑讨薪[图]
description.content:
一妇女将自己绑在柱子上，拿横幅向物业公司讨说法(南海网实习记者王峰摄)
2009年，海口寰岛物业管理公司实行改制，将工作十年的一对夫妇辞退。法院为此判决该物业公司赔偿夫妇俩14058元。但至今为止，物业公司迟迟未付清。无奈之下，12月22日，妻子刘芬将自己绑在柱子上，拿横幅向物业公司讨说法。
工作十年却被炒，夫妻俩讨说法
当天上午，在海甸岛寰岛大厦前发生的一幕引来过往路人的注意：一位中年妇女将自己绑在柱子上，手上拿着一条横幅，上面写着“寰岛承协在哪里?”。经记者询问得知：将自己绑在柱子上的女子名叫刘芬，她和丈夫彭荣发从2000年开始进入海口寰岛物业管理公司工作，2010年不知因何原因全被辞退。丈夫在工作期间还立过功，目前夫妻俩全没工作，生活困难，她这样做是希望公司给他们一个说法。
刘芬告诉记者，刚进公司时她在食堂做早餐，丈夫也在食堂工作，后面她调到清洁部，丈夫则做了保安。今年1月31日两人都被辞退，由于工作期间没有签劳动合同，他们向劳动仲裁法庭起诉，法院最后判决海口寰岛物业管理公司赔给他们从2008年2月―12月31日工资期间应得的双倍工资合计14058元，目前这笔钱仍未付清，刘芬夫妇质疑道：难道法院的判决也是一纸空文吗?
物业管理公司：按照合理的法律途径解决
针对此事，南海网记者采访了海口寰岛物业管理公司的夏主任。他解释道，由于09年海口寰岛物业管理公司进行改制，要关闭原有的公司，所以要终止与旗下的某些员工的劳动关系，其中公司给员工进行了补偿，员工是结清工资后才离开公司的。2008年有了劳动合同法后，他们公司便要求员工在上岗前要签署劳动合同。考虑到刘芬夫妇在公司工作了十年之久，公司在改制后还将请他们回公司工作，但是他们不愿意签劳动合同，公司也没办法。
至于法院的判罚，夏主任表示，那是法院的一审判决，他们觉得不合理。要提出二审上诉，如果终审结果还是这样，他们会服从判决结果。公司希望按照合理的法律途径解决问题，而不是以这样极端的方式。
刘芬夫妇：公司骗人，拿不到钱不走人
在问及为何不愿意签署劳动合同时，刘芬说，不是他们不签，如果他们签了，他们应得的钱就拿不到了。公司这样说是怕他们把事情闹大。刘芬夫妇态度很坚决，表示拿不到钱决不走人。目前此事仍在调解中。

description.hltext_display: Slår alarm om skattemoral
description.content:
Økokrim slår alarm om norsk skattemoral. Det norske folk unndrar over 100 milliarder kroner fra beskatning årlig.
Fotball Live
fredag 21. jan. kl. 12:00
Lillestrøm - Hønefoss
Kampstart om:
30 dager 18 timer 47 min. 25 sek.
Søk i skattelistene
Søk på navn og/eller sted
Eksempel: Ola Nordmann Oslo
Se topplister i ditt postnr.
Eksempel: 2815
Se topplister i Kommuner
Gran Jevnaker Lunner
Jeb J. om Bygdefolk sier ja til ulv
hans M. Ø. om Bygdefolk sier ja til ulv
yngve h. om – Data-nei svekker krim-innsats
Inger M. om Ni av ti sier nei, Jens
hans M. Ø. om – Data-nei svekker krim-innsats
edgar b. om – Oljepenger er ingen garanti
Tips en venn på e-post:
Din kommentar
Del på nettet:
LES OGSÅ:
Innrømmer kjøp av svart arbeid 21.12.10 - 18:33
Nordmenn snyter skattemilliarder 19.09.00 - 06:58
– Trygd er som narko 01.09.10 - 07:13
For første gang har Økokrim sammen med blant andre økoteamene i politidistriktene foretatt en risikovurdering, hvor de rangerer ulike former for kriminalitet, skriver VG Nett.
Skattekriminalitet, trygdebedrageri og korrupsjon endte på toppen av lista.
– Dette er områder vi ut fra en risikobetraktning mener bør prioriteres de neste årene. Skattekriminalitet er en stor risiko for samfunnet, fordi omfanget er så enormt. Skattekrim tapper samfunnet for anslagsvis over 100 milliarder kroner. Det forteller litt om perspektivene og grunnen til at dette er et område som må prioriteres, sier Økokrim-sjef Trond Eirik Schea til VG Nett.
– Det samme gjelder trygdebedrageri. Det dreier seg om små beløp i enkeltsakene, men samlet snakker vi om milliardbeløp. Hver femte nordmann er på trygd. Funn i Sverige viser at halvparten av feilutbetalingene til trygd skyldes bevisst feilinformasjon fra søkeren. I rapporten griper politiet spesielt fatt i enkelte innvandrermiljøer.
«Mange synes å være godt kjent med sine rettigheter, men ikke fullt så godt kjent med sine plikter. I spesielle miljøer kan det synes som om misbruk av det norske trygdesystemet er akseptabelt, og det er indikasjoner på at oppskrifter på hvordan velferdsordninger kan utnyttes, sirkulerer».
– Vi ser en trend som vi synes vi bør fortelle om, sier Schea. (ANB-NTB)

description.hltext_display: JPY - Yen Rises Vs. Euro and Pound; Weakens Vs. Dollar
description.content:
Latest News in Forex
RATE STORY: The Japanese yen saw mixed results against the major currencies on Tuesday's trading session. The yen gained about 60 pips against the euro, and the EUR/JPY pair is once again trading below the 110.0 level; the yen saw similar gains against the British pound as well. On the other hand, the yen fell about 60 pips vs. the U.S. dollar.
The yen's fluctuations have reflected the general mood in the market. The yen gained vs. the European currencies following the ever-deepening concerns regarding the euro-zone's stability. The latest reports regarding a possible credit cut of Portugal and Greece have intensified this trend.
The yen slightly fell against the greenback due to estimations that the Commerce Department will correct its release today, and will state that the U.S. economy grew more than previously calculated in the third quarter.
Looking ahead to today, traders are advised to follow the leading publications from the U.S. and the euro-zone as these are likely to affect the market today. Special attention should be given to reports regarding a possible credit downgrade in Europe, as unusual volatility might take place as a result.

description.hltext_display: Tarsus'ta Elektrik Akımına Kapılan Tedaş Görevlisi ...
description.content: Mersin'in Tarsus ilçesinde yüksek gerilim hatlarının bulunduğu elektrik direğindeki arızayı gidermek isteyen görevli, akıma kapılarak öldü. Alınan bilgiye göre, arıza servisinde görevli Nuh Tokbaş (24), Kütüklü köyünde elektrik direğine çıkarak, arızaya müdahale etmek istedi. Müdahale sırasında akıma kapılan Tokbaş, olay yerinde hayatını kaybetti. Tokbaş'ın cesedi otopsi için Adana Adli Tıp Kurumuna gönderildi. Olayla ilgili soruşturmanın sürdürüldüğü bildirildi. (ACE-AYC-ECN) - MERSİN (Anadolu Ajansı) 15 dakika önce.. [2430130]

description.hltext_display: 开发商拿证不开盘 北京住宅近11万库存量创新高
description.content: 昨日，记者从北京市房地产交易管理网获悉，截至12月上中旬，北京住宅库存达到10.9万套，逼近11万套，创下年内新高。业内分析认为，受预售资金监管影响，北京楼盘赶末班车集中拿证使得供应量大增，但拿证楼盘不开盘，导致住宅库存持续上升创下新高。 12月供应持续创新高 据北京市房地产交易管理网数据显示，截至昨日，北京共有43个住宅期房获得预售证，供应住宅套数为13609套，超过了11月全月数据，创下年内新高，12月将成为最近2年供应最高的月份。 在供应大增的同时，住宅库存同步增长。截至昨日，北京期房住宅库存达77338套；现房住宅达32107套。北京住宅库存合计达到10.9万套，面积达到1361万平米，创下年内新高。据悉，今年以来，住宅库存维持在10万套以下的水平，截止到目前首次逼近11万套大关。 开发商拿证不开盘 针对12月北京住宅库存持续上升的现象，中原地产三级市场总监张大伟认为，这是预售资金监管新政效应出现。据悉，预售资金监管政策从12月1日起实施，北京预售项目申请预售证，其预售款必须存入专用账户，优先用于支付项目建设施工，开发商按工程进度分节点领取。 张大伟分析，该政策导致的末班车效应，使大量的项目提前入市。但领证项目并未及时开盘销售。根据市住建委规定，新盘获批预售许可证3日内必须开盘。12月领证的楼盘，近40%至今却并未开盘。如此造成住宅库存量随之上升。 一位赶在12月1日前申请拿证的开发商告诉记者，他已经把项目能拿出来卖的房源一次性拿下预售证了，预售资金监管新政让开发商在捂盘惜售和受资金监管之间做一个选择，挤出了不少的供应。 记者在采访中了解到，部分楼盘为了赶在预售资金监管前拿证，并没有做好开盘准备，有的拿证了还没有户型图，有的虽然也开盘卖，但是必须全款，这些门槛导致购房人无法顺利购房，开盘时间也被拖延到明年。

description.hltext_display: Where Will the Next Cardium Oil Opportunity Be?
description.content:
“Completion techniques are improving, leading to higher production profiles over the initial months,” says Kevin Shaw, an energy analyst at Wellington West Capital Markets in Calgary. “Costs are coming down as the industry connects ‘more wellbore to more reservoir.’� � (The producers) have shifted from 600-1,000 meter horizontals legs to 1,100-1,400 m laterals with some looking to test 2,000 meter-plus horizontals.”
“With longer horizontal legs, the industry has moved from six to eight to 12 plus frac stages.� And both the longer legs and bigger fracs are being executed for less cost.”
Midway Energy (MEL-TSX)
“We learned some big lessons in our frac (short for fracturing) spacing, and what types of fracs to use.� We started off very conservative and generic, doing 1,000 meter horizontals, putting in ten stages of frac, which is easy to manage.”
“Then we start to push on it and increased the number of fracs.� When someone puts in 20 stages of frac, there is more of a chance of error.
“And we got faster with each drill as we learned what muds and (drill) bits work best. We’re doing a well in 12-13 days now, down from 18 days, and a day of drilling is worth approximately $50,000 plus ancillaries.
“We would get an IP (intermediate pressure) at 1,000 barrels equivalent a day then have it drop to 150 because of pumping problems.� We used to go to a pump jack right away, but we found the oil was trying to flow past the pump.� Now we let them flow until they die and then swab� to get them flowing again, and continue to do that over and over until the well loses its energy, and then put the pump jack on.”
(Swabbing a well is like having a plastic cup, or buckets on a string, that pulls the oil up and encourages it to move up the well bore.� Then the oil will start flowing on its own for awhile).
Everybody agreed that the Cardium in 2011 will separate the haves from the have-nots – who has the highly productive property…and who doesn’t.
“It’s very variable,” says Doug Bartole, CEO of Vero Energy (VRO-TSX)
“There are definitely sweet spots,” agrees Shaw.� “Not all areas are created equal in-terms of the ability to “blanket drill” and get solid results.”
Shaw says several areas in the Cardium are outperforming:
“Garrington� has done well for Midway (MEL-TSXv) and NAL (NAE.UN-TSX) “Willesden Green� and South Pembina, or the entire “West Trend” as I like to call it, running from Willesden Green up through the Ferrier and Brazeau areas and ending up near Big Stone have been very good to bigger players like PennWest (PWT.UN-TSX)
“Willesden Green, for example, has seen repeatably some of the best Cardium horizontal wells with some of the thickest gross pay, and higher GORs (gas to oil ratio).� This is considered a good thing given the gas helps drive more oil to surface – achieving higher oil rates – which is a big deal in tight resource plays like the Cardium.”
Producers have now pushed out the edges of� the Bakken The answer, says Bartole, partially depends on the price of oil.
“We’ll continue to see it step out if the price of oil is good. “There are thin sections (in the Cardium).� We target five to six meters of pay, but there is a lot of ground with three meters of pay” which could become economic at a certain oil price, he says.
“The Bakken is laid out in a larger area,” says Ratushny.� “The Bakken is more continually laid out.� The Cardium is found in more defined pools.”� He adds “It will be interesting to watch the guys who are pushing the envelope (of where the Cardium is productive) in� 2011.” Shaw says areas like Brazeau and Lochend in the Cardium are relatively new areas that weren’t really considered productive when the Cardium started to open up a couple years ago, and these new areas could conceivably continue to be discovered.
Of course, everybody wants to know, where will the next Cardium be – the next big oil play that a basket of junior explorers can develop big reserves.
“Source rock oil might be the next Cardium,” concludes Ratushny.� “It could be Crescent Point (CPG-TSX) in the Alberta Bakken or the Nordegg (formation) in Peace River Arch, or the Duvernay.”
“But it will be somewhere that hasn’t produced economically before.� And if you think you have a good zone that’s been overlooked you can’t tell a soul.”
Follow this link for Part 1 of� my� . Keith Schaefer is publisher of www.oilandgas-investments.com. E-mail him at editor@oilandgas-investments.com. © 2009, Oil & Gas Investments Bulletin
The Cardium oil play has turned into Canada’s second biggest tight oil play, after the Bakken in Saskatchewan.
Economics improved in the Cardium during 2010, as producers refined their completion techniques (i.e. they found continually better ways to fracture the formation) which has generally meant a $500,000 reduction in cost per well.� Most wells are now completed for just under $3 million.
“Completion techniques are improving, leading to higher production profiles over the initial months,” says Kevin Shaw, an energy analyst at Wellington West Capital Markets in Calgary. “Costs are coming down as the industry connects ‘more wellbore to more reservoir.’� � (The producers) have shifted from 600-1,000 meter horizontals legs to 1,100-1,400 m laterals with some looking to test 2,000 meter-plus horizontals.”
“With longer horizontal legs, the industry has moved from six to eight to 12 plus frac stages.� And both the longer legs and bigger fracs are being executed for less cost.”
Midway Energy (MEL-TSX)
“We learned some big lessons in our frac (short for fracturing) spacing, and what types of fracs to use.� We started off very conservative and generic, doing 1,000 meter horizontals, putting in ten stages of frac, which is easy to manage.”
“Then we start to push on it and increased the number of fracs.� When someone puts in 20 stages of frac, there is more of a chance of error.
“And we got faster with each drill as we learned what muds and (drill) bits work best. We’re doing a well in 12-13 days now, down from 18 days, and a day of drilling is worth approximately $50,000 plus ancillaries.
“We would get an IP (intermediate pressure) at 1,000 barrels equivalent a day then have it drop to 150 because of pumping problems.� We used to go to a pump jack right away, but we found the oil was trying to flow past the pump.� Now we let them flow until they die and then swab� to get them flowing again, and continue to do that over and over until the well loses its energy, and then put the pump jack on.”
(Swabbing a well is like having a plastic cup, or buckets on a string, that pulls the oil up and encourages it to move up the well bore.� Then the oil will start flowing on its own for awhile).
Everybody agreed that the Cardium in 2011 will separate the haves from the have-nots – who has the highly productive property…and who doesn’t.
“It’s very variable,” says Doug Bartole, CEO of Vero Energy (VRO-TSX)
“There are definitely sweet spots,” agrees Shaw.� “Not all areas are created equal in-terms of the ability to “blanket drill” and get solid results.”
Shaw says several areas in the Cardium are outperforming:
“Garrington� has done well for Midway (MEL-TSXv) and NAL (NAE.UN-TSX) “Willesden Green� and South Pembina, or the entire “West Trend” as I like to call it, running from Willesden Green up through the Ferrier and Brazeau areas and ending up near Big Stone have been very good to bigger players like PennWest (PWT.UN-TSX)
“Willesden Green, for example, has seen repeatably some of the best Cardium horizontal wells with some of the thickest gross pay, and higher GORs (gas to oil ratio).� This is considered a good thing given the gas helps drive more oil to surface – achieving higher oil rates – which is a big deal in tight resource plays like the Cardium.”
Producers have now pushed out the edges of� the Bakken The answer, says Bartole, partially depends on the price of oil.
“We’ll continue to see it step out if the price of oil is good. “There are thin sections (in the Cardium).� We target five to six meters of pay, but there is a lot of ground with three meters of pay” which could become economic at a certain oil price, he says.
“The Bakken is laid out in a larger area,” says Ratushny.� “The Bakken is more continually laid out.� The Cardium is found in more defined pools.”� He adds “It will be interesting to watch the guys who are pushing the envelope (of where the Cardium is productive) in� 2011.” Shaw says areas like Brazeau and Lochend in the Cardium are relatively new areas that weren’t really considered productive when the Cardium started to open up a couple years ago, and these new areas could conceivably continue to be discovered.
Of course, everybody wants to know, where will the next Cardium be – the next big oil play that a basket of junior explorers can develop big reserves.
“Source rock oil might be the next Cardium,” concludes Ratushny.� “It could be Crescent Point (CPG-TSX) in the Alberta Bakken or the Nordegg (formation) in Peace River Arch, or the Duvernay.”
“But it will be somewhere that hasn’t produced economically before.� And if you think you have a good zone that’s been overlooked you can’t tell a soul.”

description.hltext_display: Mavericks beat new-look Magic for Florida sweep
description.content:
Dallas Mavericks center Tyson Chandler, left, hangs in the air after dunking the ball in front of Orlando Magic forward Earl Clark during the first half of an NBA basketball game in Orlando, Fla., Tuesday, Dec. 21, 2010.(AP Photo/Phelan M. Ebenhack)
ORLANDO, Fla. — All the uncertainty around Orlando couldn't have worked out better for the Dallas Mavericks.
Not that they've had a problem with anybody lately.
Caron Butler scored 20 points, Dirk Nowitzki had 17 and the streaking Mavericks became the latest team to topple the reconstructed Magic in a 105-99 victory Tuesday night.
"We still know who they had," Nowitzki said of a Magic team that just overhauled its roster. "Dwight (Howard) is their focus. They have a bunch of shooters, Jameer (Nelson) and all those guys."
In other words, still not good enough to beat the NBA's elite.
Nowitzki also passed Celtics great Larry Bird for 25th on the NBA's career scoring list, finishing the night at 21,798 points. Tyson Chandler added 16 points to help the Mavericks pull away in the fourth quarter for their 16th win in 17 games.
A night after snapping Miami's 12-game winning streak, they shot 50 percent from the floor, including 46 percent from 3-point range.
"We feel like we're one of the best teams in the league, if not the best right now," Butler said. "We're playing great basketball, so we want to capitalize on every opportunity."
And Orlando provided a perfect one.
The Magic again looked like a team that hasn't had time to hold a practice since newcomers Gilbert Arenas, Jason Richardson and Hedo Turkoglu were acquired on Saturday. They've lost the first two games since the pair of blockbuster trades and dropped eight of their last nine.
The latest came on another monster night for Howard, who had 26 points and 23 rebounds but got no help from his new teammates. Howard has had at least 20 rebounds in three straight games.
"It can't get any worse," Howard said of his team's slide.
The Magic can only hope not.
Their next two games come against the league's top two teams: San Antonio and Boston.
The struggles were a big reason they orchestrated two trades that brought Arenas from Washington and Turkoglu, Richardson and Earl Clark from Phoenix. They gave up Rashard Lewis, Vince Carter, Mickael Pietrus and Marcin Gortat, plus a 2011 first-round draft pick, in the deals.
The three biggest newcomers have so far been unspectacular. After a loss at Atlanta in their first outing together, their home debuts were equally troubling: Arenas had two points (1 for 6), Turkoglu nine points (2 for 11) and Richardson 10 points (4 for 13).
"None of those guys are shooting the ball very well right now," Magic coach Stan Van Gundy said. "I don't know if it's being in a new situation or putting too much pressure on themselves. All three of them are struggling to shoot the ball."
The problem now is sorting out how this revamped roster is supposed to work.
It wasn't until the Mavericks went ahead by 12 points in the fourth quarter that the Magic — at least those other than Howard — showed any consistent fight.
Richardson's 3-pointer with 56 seconds remaining trimmed the deficit to three. Then Jason Terry came back with a mid-range jumper from the wing, and Richardson followed with another from beyond the arc with 24 left to bring Orlando within two.
But the Mavericks would shoot free throws the rest of the way, and Orlando couldn't find any more Magic on this night. While they sort out how their revamped roster is supposed to work, opponents have already exposed their biggest weakness.
Dallas coach Rick Carlisle activated four centers against the suddenly undersized Magic, who are without a true backup center with Gortat gone but are exploring options to receive another inside presence. The big lineup turned out to be a big plus.
The Mavericks went ahead by 12 points in the first quarter behind strong play from Nowitzki. The 7-foot sharpshooter benefited often when he was guarded by Turkoglu, usually a small forward, and other undersized opponents.
Orlando did show some zip with a a 17-2 run between the first and second quarters. The spurt was sparked by Arenas and Clark — and, surprisingly, with Howard and Jameer Nelson on the bench — and pushed the Magic ahead 31-29, with Howard leading a chest-bumping bonanza with every player and even Van Gundy during a timeout.
Turned out to be a premature celebration.
NOTES: Howard also had three straight 20-plus rebound games from Dec. 28-31 in 2007. ... Magic PF Malik Allen sat out the game with a sprained left ankle. ... The Mavericks don't play again until Monday at Oklahoma City.

event_or_fact.property: We still know who they had; Dwight (Howard) is their focus. They have a bunch of shooters, Jameer (Nelson) and all those guys.

None of those guys are shooting the ball very well right now; I don't know if it's being in a new situation or putting too much pressure on themselves. All three of them are struggling to shoot the ball.
We feel like we're one of the best teams in the league, if not the best right now; We're playing great basketball, so we want to capitalize on every opportunity.

description.hltext_display: 中共海南省委五届九次全体会议海口开幕
description.content:
http://news.hainan.net/ 时间：2010-12-22 15:59:00 来源：新华网海南频道
中共海南省委书记卫留成同志代表省委常委会向全会作报告。 新华社记者 傅勇涛 摄
中共海南省委副书记、省长罗保铭同志作了《中共海南省委第十二个五年规划的建议》说明。 新华社记者 傅勇涛 摄
中共海南省委五届九次全体会议22日上午在海口市举行。 新华社记者 傅勇涛 摄
中共海南省委五届九次全体会议22日上午在海口市举行。中共海南省委书记卫留成同志代表省委常委会向全会作报告。
卫留成指出，2010年是海南国际旅游岛建设的开局之年，是全面完成“十一五”规划、承接“十二五”规划的重要一年。在这一年里，省委常委会认真贯彻党的十七大和十七届四中、五中全会精神，以科学发展观为统领，以国际旅游岛建设为中心任务，抢抓机遇，乘势而上，全面推进海南省经济、政治、文化、社会、生态文明建设和党的建设，实现了海南国际旅游岛建设的良好开局，圆满完成了“十一五”规划的目标和任务。
全会上，中共海南省委副书记、省长罗保铭同志作了《中共海南省委第十二个五年规划的建议》说明。
22日下午，全会将分组讨论海南省委常委会的工作报告和中共海南省委关于第十二个五年规划的建议(讨论稿)。
全会预计于23日上午闭幕。
记者 傅勇涛

description.hltext_display: どんな賄い食べたのですかっ！！【駄】 - 懐かしい
description.content:
くだらないトピにお越し頂きありがとうございます。
飲食店など賄い付きで働いた経験がある方、どのようなお店でどんな賄い食を食べましたか？
お店のメニューにあるもの、別に作る物などいろいろかと思いますが、具体的に教えてください。
お腹がペコペコなんです。
ユーザーID：3879250966
お気に入り登録数：4
古いレス順
レス数：9本
タイトル
投稿者
ん〜
2010年12月21日 22:05
和食レストランで働いていて、お店の普通のメニューが割引価格で食べられるといっていました。和定食のようなものです。
ユーザーID：1635065844
小市民
2010年12月22日 9:14
もうトピ主様のお腹は満たされたでしょうか。
飲食店ではないのですが、季節柄…正月の神社で巫女さんのバイトをしたことがあります。
まかないは、お手伝い（氏子の方かな）？に来る５０代女性？が作る、煮付けとかカレー、豚汁でした。おしるこも出たような…。
女の子の巫女さんバイトだけで３０人くらいいて、年末〜三箇日まで作業していたから、そういう大人数用の食事でしたよ〜。
まかないとは離れますが、長期入院中小児科の入院食に冬だろうが夏だろうがお構いなく「焼き茄子（そのままだったり味噌汁に入ったり）」と「ザーサイ」が頻繁に出てきました。栄養士の方が好きだったのか？？冷凍食品で買いすぎたのか？
ユーザーID：4137071359
どんぶり
2010年12月22日 11:21
お寿司やさんでバイトしてた学生時代。
いつも入らないランチタイムにたまたま働けると(学生なので普段は夜に働いてました)、豪華な海鮮丼を食べてました。
板前さんが「好きなネタ書いて。」とメモを渡され、提出。
私が穴子が大好きなのをその板前さんは知ってるのですが、その海鮮丼には乗ってなく、がっかりしてると、実は２層になってて食べ進めた所、ごはんとごはんの間に穴子がびっしり！
そんな賄いを食べてました。
今、お金を払って海鮮丼を食べても満足しないようになってしまいました…。
ユーザーID：2369963365
嬉し悲し
2010年12月22日 11:33
毎食、ちらし寿司でした。
のってる魚はお店のものなので、いいものでしたが。
フルタイムいて、三食いただいたりすると、三食それで。
いや、のってるものはビミョウに変わりますが、ちらしであることには変わりがなく。
たまーに見習い職人さんが握ってくれてることもありましたが、寿司であることに変わりなく。
時間短縮していただいて、一食ですむ設定にしましたが、やっぱり一年もたなかったです。
おかげで、この寿司ブームにも、あまり乗りたくありません。
つか、もう、一生寿司いらん。
ユーザーID：3899490455
のぶちゃん
2010年12月22日 11:35
３０代後半女性です。
大学生で一人暮らししてた時に基本飲食店でばかりバイトしてたので、たくさん賄い頂いて助かってました。
一番良い想い出は、日本料理屋さんのお運びの時で、開店前に一番下っ端の板さんが作った鰻丼とか、親子丼、肉じゃが、八宝菜、生姜焼き、その他色んなご馳走を従業員全員で並んで頂いたり、閉店後にオーダーミスやキャンセルなどで残った店の料理（鴨ロース、子持ち若布、鯛アラ、揚げ出し小芋、棒鱈、スッポン鍋その他色々）を皆で頂いたり、懐石の最後に出す炊き込みご飯が毎日必ず余るので、一人暮らしのバイト全員に店長さんが持たせてくれたり、本当に最高のバイトでした。
あの時代が一番私の食生活が高級でしたね（遠い目）
今の私が自力で口に出来ないものなんかもたくさんあったし
『あぁまたか・・正直ちょっと飽きたかな』なんて思った事もあったバチ当たりなあの頃の私を叱ってやりたいですね（笑）

description.hltext_display: Ca sĩ A Tuân đón Noel sớm cùng trẻ khuyết tật
description.content:
(24h) - Ngay khi xuất hiện trên sân khấu, hàng chục các fan đã bủa vây đến chàng ca sĩ trẻ này còn anh ân cần xuống từng hàng ghế với các em nhỏ khuyết tật.
Được cộng đồng mạng yêu thích qua những bản hit : Nụ hôn của gió, Lời nói gió không bay, Lời nguyện cầu dưới trăng… thời gian vừa qua cái tên A Tuân (Nguyễn Anh Tuân) đang dần quen thuộc và được khán giả đón nhận. Đáp lại tình cảm đó, A Tuân hiện tại đang nỗ lực chuẩn bị cho single đầu tay mang tên Nụ hôn của gió.
Mặc dù bận rộn với các dự án âm nhạc nhưng ca sĩ A Tuân luôn nhiệt tình với các sự kiện đặc biệt là các hoạt động tình nguyện, mang tính cộng đồng. Trong không khí chuẩn bị cho giáng sinh, cùng với câu lạc bộ Vì cộng đồng A Tuân đã có một đêm diễn hết mình cùng với hơn 1.000 trẻ em khuyết tật và mồ côi.
Ngay từ khi xuất hiện, A Tuân đã gây được thiện cảm bởi sự thân thiện cũng như sự hết mình với khán giả. Mặc dù chưa phải là một tên tuổi có sức ảnh hưởng lớn nhưng khi bước ra sân khấu hàng trăm tình nguyện viên đã ùa lên bủa vây và hòa nhịp cùng anh trong ca khúc Khóc cho người đi.
Chưa cảm thấy thỏa mãn vì những tình cảm khán giả dành cho mình, A Tuân đã phá lệ kịch bản khi xin được thể hiện thêm một ca khúc có tựa đề Lời nguyện cầu dưới trăng. Lần này, anh trực tiếp xuống từng hàng ghế để giao lưu với khán giả, ôm hôn và bắt tay với từng em nhỏ khuyết tật. Bất ngờ hơn, A Tuân còn bế cả 1 em nhỏ lên sân khấu biểu diễn trong niềm xúc động của rất đông khán giả bên dưới.
“Niềm vui nhất của một con người là được đem niềm vui đến cho nhiều người, hy vọng sẽ có thêm thật nhiều thật nhiều những tấm lòng chung tay vì cộng đồng hơn nữa…” – A Tuân chia sẻ sau khi biểu diễn.
Một số hình ảnh trong buổi biểu diễn từ thiện cùng CLB Vì cộng đồng của ca sĩ trẻ A Tuân:
Ngay khi bước lên sân khấu A Tuân đã bị khán giả quây
Biểu diễn cuồng nhiệt cùng các fan
Viết lưu niệm và chụp hình cùng fan
Nhiệt tình giao lưu với khán giả

description.hltext_display: Beyoncé reste zen face aux insultes de ses fans
description.author: Closer.fr
description.content:
Superstar planétaire, Beyoncé déchaîne les foules mais aussi parfois les mauvaises langues. Récemment, la chanteuse a été prise à partie par un fan, qui impatient de faire sa rencontre, a dérapé en la traitant de "bitch" (ndlr : salope, en français). Lire la suite l'article
Photos/Vidéos liées
Pourtant, face à ce dérapage, Beyoncé reste zen et garde son fair-play. Elle explique : "Cette personne rêvait de me rencontrer. Et parce que ce fan n'a pas eu la réponse qu'il espérait, il est entré en colère. J'ai sympathisé avec lui, parce ce que je comprends le fait que lorsque vous admirez quelqu'un, vous attendez au moins un petit bonjour de sa part. Mais ce que je comprends aussi, c'est qu'il est impossible pour moi de saluer tout le monde. J'ai pris ça comme une bonne leçon, parce que les gens se jugent entre eux, qu'ils assument des choses et qu'ils ont des attentes. Ca arrive à tout le monde, même si vous n'êtes pas célèbre".Beyoncé, une classe à part, c'est sûr.
Plus d'infos et voir les photos sur Closer.fr

description.hltext_display: Ban Hails Iraqi New Government As 'Major Step' In Democratic Progress
description.content: TEHRAN, Dec 22 (Bernama) -- The United Nations Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon welcomed the announcement of a new government in Baghdad as "a major step forward in Iraq's democratic progress" on Tuesday, according to Iran's Mehr News Agency. Ban also urged that prompt attention is given to the national reconciliation, reconstruction and long-term stability. The Secretary-General, in a statement, repeatedly called for a broad-based government since elections in March, congratulates Iraq's political leaders for their concerted efforts to ensure that the new government is inclusive, broadly participatory and has the support of the people of Iraq. The statement was issued by his spokesman at UN Headquarters in New York. He calls on them to continue working in the spirit of national unity to swiftly conclude the government formation process, and address the major challenges that face the country, including national reconciliation, reconstruction and long-term stability, the statement added. The Secretary-General also pledged continued support from the UN Assistance Mission for Iraq (UNAMI) for the people and Government "in building a prosperous and peaceful Iraq". On the eve of the Government's formation last week, Ban called a "milestone" on the country's path to normality. -- BERNAMA

description.hltext_display: Kozan'da Emniyet Müdürlüğü'nün 'Sağlıklı Yaşam Projesi'
description.content: Adana'nın Kozan ilçesinde Emniyet Müdürlüğü 'Sağlıklı Yaşam Projesi' kapsamında vatanadaşları düzenli spor yapmaya teşvik ediyor. İlçe Emniyet Müdürü Sabit Akın Zaimoğlu, 3 ay önce başlattıkları çalışma kapsamında müdürlük personelinin haftanın 4 günü akşamları 2 saat süreyle İsmet Atlı Şehir Stadında yürüyüş, koşu ve kültür fizik hareketleri yaptığını belirtti. Müdür Zaimoğlu, gelişen teknoloji ile birlikte insanların daha az hareket ettiğini ve masa başında çok fazla zaman geçirdiklerini, toplumu tehdit eder bir noktaya gelen bu durumu, Kozan'da, 'Sağlıklı Yaşam Projesi' ile ortadan kaldırmayı hedeflediklerini belirterek şunları söyledi: 'Toplum Destekli Polislik Bürü Amirliği'mizin hazırladığı projeyi müdürlüğümüzde görevli personelimizle başlattık. Personellerimiz her biri haftanın 4 günü süren çalışmalarımızın birine mutlaka katılma imkanı buluyor. Diğer resmi kurum ve kuruluşlara da yazı yazarak proje hakkında bilgi verdik ve memurların katılımını beklediğimizi bildirdik. Arzu eden vatandaşlarımız da bizimle birlikte çalışmalara katılabiliyor. Amacımız ilçedeki tüm memurları vatandaşları bu projeye dahil ederek, ömür boyu sürecek bir sağlıklı yaşam alışkanlığı kazandırmak.' Çalışmalara katılan polisler ise yaptıkları işin dayanıklılık ve çeviklik gerektirdiğini, spora başladıktan kısa zaman sonra kendilerindeki olumlu değişikliği hissettiklerini belirterek, bu durumun mesleki başarıyı artıracağını ve gelecekte yaşamaları muhtemel olan önemli sağlık sorunlarını en aza indirgeyeceğine inandıklarını belirttiler. Çalışmalara katılmak isteyen vatandaşların pazartesi, salı, çarşamba ve perşembe günleri 17.30'da stadyuma gelebilecekleri bildirildi. (VV-AYC-ÜNS) - ADANA (Anadolu Ajansı) 31 dakika önce.. [2430073]

description.hltext_display: Erbakan, Trabzon'da Seçim Meydanlarına İniyor
description.content:
Saadet Partisi Genel Başkanı Necmettin Erbakan, 26 Aralık'ta Trabzon'da seçim meydanlarına iniyor.
Edinilen bilgiye göre, partisinin yeniden iktidar olması için seçmenlerden oy isteyen Erbakan, 26 Aralık'ta Trabzon'da, partisinin il kongresine katılacak ve burada yeni dönemin ilk seçim konuşmasını yapacak. Erbakan, daha sonra 20'ye yakın şehirde partisi tarafından düzenlenen mitinglere katılacak.
Numan Kurtulmuş'un ayrılması ile Atatürk Spor Salonu'nda yapılan son kongrede, parti kurmaylarının yoğun isteği sonucunda genel başkanlık görevini kabul etmek zorunda kaldığını açıklayan Erbakan, Milli Görüş fikrini yeniden iktidar yapmak için ''Bismillah'' diyerek yola çıkacaklarını ifade etmişti.
Erbakan, kendisine örnek aldığı Eyüb Sultan'ın (Eyüp El Ensari) türbesini ziyaret etmiş, burada Cuma namazını kılarak, seçim startını vermişti.
-EYÜP EL-ENSARİ-
Ebu Eyyüp Halid Bin Zeyd veya Ebu Eyyüp El-Ensari (576-645) Türkçe'de zaman zaman Eyüp Sultan olarak anılan Sahabe'den bir Müslüman. El-Ensari, Hz. Muhammed'i Mekke'den Medine'ye göç ettiği zaman evinde ilk misafir eden sahabedir. Bu sebeple kendisine bu olaydan sonra ''mihmandar-ı nebevÃ®''de dendiği olmuştur.
El-Ensari, 80'li yaşlarında İstanbul kuşatması sırasında şehit oldu. Vasiyeti üzerine İstanbul surlarının dibine gömüldüğüne dair bir rivayet vardır. Rivayete göre daha sonra Akşemsettin manevi keşif yoluyla mezarını bulur.
Bugün adına bir türbe, kendi adı ile anılan Eyüp semtinde ise Eyüp Sultan Camisi bulunuyor. (Anadolu Ajansı) 2 dakika önce.. [2430138]

description.hltext_display: 楼市前景不明 半数上海市民近3年内无购房计划
description.content:
等等，再等等，再等等……在楼市一再调控下，上海市民在希望和观望中一再纠结：是不是要买房？什么时候买房合算？房价跌了吗？怎么又涨了点？ 国家统计局上海调查总队12月16日公布了《房产新政下本市市民购房意愿调查报告》，报告显示上海市民买房观望气氛仍浓，约半数受访者想买房，但是近3年无计划。 哪些人最想买房？ 30岁以下和60岁以上购房意愿较强 根据调查，上海市购房需求呈现年轻化和老龄化趋势。30岁以下和60岁以上的受访者购房意愿较为强烈，计划3年内购房的比重均在27%至28%。 30岁以下人群，正值成家立业阶段，购房是他们面临的迫在眉睫的现实问题，因此购房意愿强烈。工作年限短、学历高、职业相对稳定者购房意愿更为强烈。调查显示，工作年限5年以下的年轻人中，有30.5%计划3年内购房，其中16.9%计划一年内购房；本科及以上学历者，近1/3计划3年内购房，其中17.4%计划一年内购房；从事管理岗位和专业技术岗位工作者，有36.7%计划3年内购房，其中22%计划一年内购房。 60岁以上受访者的购房意愿高且较为明确，有27.9%计划3年内购房，其中约20%计划一年内购房。这部分人群购房意愿强的主要原因是其适龄子女即将进入婚嫁阶段。 为什么急着买房？ 45岁以下为成家，45岁以上为子女 改善现有住房、安家置业等刚性需求是市民购房的主要动力。调查显示，计划3年内购房的受访者中，有44.2%是为了改善现有的居住条件，31%是为了购置婚房、成家立业，两者合计为75.2%；14.3%是为子女购房，仅3.8%纯粹为投资升值购房，这也表明，改善现有的住房条件，购置婚房、成家立业，以及为子女购房是购房的三大主因，市民购房刚性需求仍占主导地位。 计划3年内购房的受访者，除了改善居住条件这一普遍需求外，其购房目的呈现明显的年龄特征，45岁以下主要是购置婚房、成家立业，而45岁以上则偏向于为子女购房。 为何不打算买房？ 53%付不起首付，14%盼望保障房 有25.9%的受访者表示，目前，无购房计划。其中，有53.1%表示，房价高、无力负担首付；17.5%表示，还贷压力过重、影响正常生活。因此对大多数无计划购房者而言，面对房价高、负担重的现实，打消购房念头实属无奈之举。 收入低、无法承受目前高房价的人群迫切希望扩大保障性住房范围，尤其是早日实现公租房的建设与分配，以改善居住条件。调查显示，在不打算购房的受访者中，有14%盼望通过各类保障性住房政策解决住房问题。 房价因素对投资投机性购房影响相对较小，调查中，仅有4.8%的受访者表示不购房是因为房价过高，升值潜力不大。
相关文章：
上一篇文章： 抠抠族3万硬装105平大宅 省钱也能拥有好效果[组图]
下一篇文章： 京城楼市“淡季”不淡 12月供应房为近2年最多

description.hltext_display: 外省黏土砖大量涌入 严重冲击海南"禁实"工作
description.content:
最近一段时间，来自岛外广东、广西等省份的黏土红砖，受利益驱使，大量国家禁止的黏土红砖开始流向我省建筑市场，严重冲击我省的“禁实”工作。
据报料人说：我省开展“禁实”工作轰轰烈烈，先后关闭了很多影响生态环境的黏土砖场，加上海南国际旅游岛建设上升为国家战略后，一些农村地方建房多，受此影响，我省的黏土红砖一度上涨到每块最高达到9角钱的“天价”，甚至还没有货。在此情况下，来自岛外的一些商贩从中发现了商机。
于是，偷偷用木船或汽车，从两广一些地方运到海口，赚取差价。
据了解，由于黏土红砖在两广地区，每块就两角左右，即使运到海口，价格也不到五角，比本地的红砖便宜了很多。
由于有巨大的商机，业内人士估计，每天偷运到海口的红砖在几十万块以上。
业内人士称，由于大量的外地红砖充斥本地市场，给我省本来“禁实”工作带来很大的冲击。由于红砖流通，并没有违反有关法规，所以他们给有关部门做了反映，但效果不大，希望能通过本报进行呼吁，进一步把“禁实”工作落到实处。

description.hltext_display: 沪蓉沪渝首开动车组 时间缩短一半以上
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
人民网上海12月22日电 （记者沈文敏）今天从上海铁路局获悉，根据铁道部统一部署，从2011年1月11日零点起，该局将调整列车运行图，增开多趟客货列车，并对部分客车的等级、车次、运行时间和运行区段等作出调整，广大旅客出行将更加便捷。其中，上海虹桥站至成都、重庆北站将首次开行时速250公里动车组列车，全程运行时间分别为15小时30分和14小时45分，比原来最快的旅客列车缩短了19小时46分和15小时22分。
据介绍，在这次调图中，上海铁路局将增开旅客列车22对，其中“D”打头的普通动车组列车17对，普速旅客列车5对。包括加开上海至成都、重庆、武汉、福州、厦门等方向长途直通动车组列车13对，加开上海至合肥等方向管内动车组4对，加开上海至石家庄北、深圳等普速旅客列车5对。同时，原上海（南）至成都的4趟普速列车和至重庆的2趟普速列车继续保留，上海往成都、重庆方向的运能紧张状况将得到一定缓解。动车组列车大量增开，列车开行密度大大增加，旅客出行将更加便捷。如实施新图后，沪宁高铁将增加12对动车组列车，合武客运专线将增加10对动车组列车，合宁客运专线将增加14对动车组列车。此外，增开的上海往石家庄、深圳、安阳、南阳和等方向的普通旅客列车，也将使上述方向的运能长期紧张状况得到缓解。
这次调图，上海铁路局有14对旅客列车提高了等级，运行速度明显提高，列车运行时间缩短。有4列客车运行时刻得到了优化，旅客出行时间更加合理。如连云港东至乌鲁木齐1354/1、1352/3次旅客列车改为快速旅客列车后，全程运行时间为48小时56分，比原来压缩了5小时44分。另外，此次调图中还有20多对客车运行区段和运行径路进行了调整，沿途停站将发生变化。如上海至成都K698/5 K696/7次列车原经京沪、陇海、宝成线运行，将该经京沪、合宁、合武、汉丹、长荆、焦柳、雅宜、宜万、达万、襄渝、达成、遂成线运行。上海虹桥至武汉、合肥方向11.5对旅客列车将由原经沪宁高铁、京沪、合（合肥）宁（南京南）、合（合肥）武（武汉）线运行改为经由沪宁高铁、仙（仙林）宁（南京南）、合（合肥）宁（南京南）、合（合肥）武（武汉）线运行，使南京长江大桥和京沪线南段的能力得到释放。
这次运行图调整，上海铁路局管内京沪、陇海等主要干线部分区段将增加多趟货物列车，货物运输能力将进一步提升。其中京沪线蚌埠东至南京东间将增开5对货物列车，徐州北至蚌埠间将增开2对货物列车；陇海线虞城县至徐州（北）增开5对货物列车，将更好地满足沿线企业的货运需求，缓解货物运输运力紧张状况，为沿线各地区经济发展提供更有力的运力支撑。
铁路部门提醒，此次列车运行图调整变化较大，其中有部分新增旅客列车将在11日后陆续开行，特别是在1月11日前后涉及部分列车新老车次及运行时刻调整过渡，请广大旅客注意铁路部门公告，看清车票票面乘车站、乘车日期、车次、发车时刻等信息，以免耽误行程。

description.hltext_display: 京城楼市“淡季”不淡 12月供应房为近2年最多
description.content:
截至本月20日，北京房地产交易管理网数据显示，北京取得预售许可的项目数已经达到了43个，供应住宅套数为13609套超过了11月全月数量。12月将成为最近2年供应数量最多的月份。"淡季不淡"、"量增价涨"成了今年北京楼市岁末的一大风景。 时值楼市淡季，供应量增加，而且据最新数据显示，12月19日期房住宅库存77338套，面积9321467平方米，现房住宅32107套，面积4288825平方米，合计109445套，合计1361万平方米，创下2009年8月12日以来的新高。可是北京商品房预售供应均价却也同时达到了最近数月的新高，达到了26599元每平方米，环比11月同期上涨了12.6%，供应价格更是比10月上涨了近5000元每平方米。 亚豪机构副总经理高姗分析，12月上半月新开盘项目大幅增加，主要因素是受到商品房预售资金监管政策的影响。该政策规定12月1日起，新开盘项目必须上报详细的预售方案，而且预售资金也将受到严格的监管。因此，许多原本不打算开盘的项目也赶在12月1日前，申请预售许可证，由于审批公示需要一定的时间，因而有些项目获得许可证会延续至12月上中旬，因此导致了一些项目在12月前期集中开盘。 中原地产认为，北京商品房库存创新高与库存项目均价过高有直接关系。上周末具有一定总价优势的万科长阳半岛开盘热销，显示出目前市场的需求依然火爆，特别是中低价的房源依然供不应求。而目前楼市大量积压的商品房单套面积高达124.3平方米，按照每平方米均价2万计算，平均单套总价高达250万以上，与市场需求差距较大，积压在所难免。 中原地产认为，预售监管只管理工程中有关工程建设的部分资金，其不足大部分项目的三成投入，其结果可能只对中低价房的建设有影响，而对高价房来说，建安成本占比非常低，监管影响有限，监管政策力度不足。其次，年底可能出现供应荒。由于受到预售监管政策的影响，许多项目为规避政策，提前扎堆入市，导致2011年1月计划开盘项目量减少。有数据表明，北京2011年1月仅有24个项目计划开盘，其中首次开盘的纯新盘项目为9个。而针对延缓销售的政策只监管政策执行之后的项目，此前已过关项目惜售或将使市场在年底可能再次出现明显的价格加速上涨。
相关文章：
上一篇文章： 楼市前景不明 半数上海市民近3年内无购房计划
下一篇文章： 北京再供百万平米土地 明年将现实际住宅供应潮

description.hltext_display: Campania, primo sì alla Camera al decreto sull'emergenza rifiuti
description.content:
Campania, primo sì alla Camera al decreto sui rifiuti
Restano previsti i commissari per la realizzazione dei termovalorizzatori di Salerno e Napoli. Assente alla votazione Edmondo Cirielli. Dure reazioni del centrosinistra
• Con 334 voti favorevoli e un assenza di peso, quella del presidente della Provincia Edmondo Cirielli, la Camera ha approvato ieri sera il decreto rifiuti per la Campania. Il testo - che dopo le feste passerá al Senato per il varo definitivo - contiene due modifiche rispetto a quello promulgato dal Governo a fine novembre: c’è la proroga di un anno per il passaggio dai Comuni alle Province dei servizi di raccolta e spazzamento (e dell’intero importo della Tarsu) e la trasformazione da facoltá in obbligo della nomina di un commissario per la realizzazione dei termovalorizzatori. Il presidente della Regione, Stefano Caldoro, non potrá lasciare la procedura nelle mani della Provincia, ma dovrá scegliere un commissario.
E’ il punto che ha fatto andare su tutte le furie il deputato Cirielli, che ieri non ha partecipato al voto e ha motivato il dissenso con la mancata tutela dei lavoratori dei consorzi, «perché la tassa resta nelle mani dei Comuni, che continuano a non pagare i loro debiti con i consorzi di bacino».Per il ministro delll’a mbiente, Stefania Prestigiacomo «l’assenza di Cirielli in aula è una posizione del tutto personale. La Campania - ha aggiunto - era unita e compatta a favore del decreto».
• A favore del decreto hanno votato non solo Pdl e Lega ma anche Udc e Fli, che siedono all’opposizione. Contrari, con 213 voti, Partito Democratico e Italia dei Valori, nonostante il testo abbia recepito l’emendamento dell’opposizione sulla proroga in favore dei Comuni. E’ stato il deputato Pd TinoIannuzzi a spiegare in aula i motivi del dissenso: «Il decreto - ha detto - è una grande occasione perduta per individuare soluzioni stabili e adeguate. Viene decapitato il ruolo dei Comuni, ai quali è irragionevolmente sottratta (dall’1 gennaio 2012 n.d.r.) ogni competenza per la gestione del ciclo dei rifiuti e persino per la gestione e riscossione di Tarsu e Tia. Sono state respinte le nostre proposte per introdurre norme vincolanti sulla raccolta differenziata, con rigorose sanzioni per i comuni inadempienti.
Sono state ridotte le risorse per le bonifiche e compensazioni ambientali». Non convince neanche la previsione di commissari per discariche e inceneritori. Parlano di «tecnica dello scaricabarile» il deputato Fulvio Bonavitacola e il segretario regionale Pd, Enzo Amendola. E aggiungono: «Così l’emergenza continuerá ad aggravarsi».

description.hltext_display: ここで働きたいな（アニメ・漫画版限定） - 全力学園
description.content:
超一流どころのお屋敷がならんでいて、当然のことながら沢山の人が働いています。
ですが、当主（ご子息ご令嬢）はかな〜りクセのある性格だったり。
あるいは、何かの事件にしょっちゅう巻き込まれたり、振り回されたり・・・。
普通のお友だちになるのだったら嬉しいけれど、ここで働くのだったらきっと苦労するだろうなーという感じがする方がかなりいるようないないような気がします。
私的に、ここで働きたいということで、ぱっと思い浮かぶのは、お給料が半端なく高そうな剣菱家か、イケメン揃いのどっかの学園ものの学校の先生などでした。
ということで、質問です。
皆さんは、どんなところで働いてみたいですか？
あえて、実社会での資格云々は問いません。
玉の輿狙いもOKです。
よろしくお願いします。

description.hltext_display: Baby boy makes medical history as UK's first "saviour sibling"
description.content:
A baby boy in Britain has become the first "saviour sibling" to be created in the UK after doctors cultivated embryos that could provide stem cells to treat a life-threatening disease his sister has been suffering since birth.
Max Matthews, who is just 17-months-old, gave his elder sister Megan, 9, the ultimate Christmas present after blood taken from his umbilical cord and bone marrow was successfully used in a transplant for her.egan suffers from Fanconi anaemia and was not expected to live beyond seven years old, and now Max, who was born specifically to provide stem cells to help treat her condition, has given her hope.
The 6,000 pounds procedure that led to Max's birth was paid for by the NHS as a last chance to help Megan.
"It has been a tremendous rollercoaster of highs and lows but Megan is now making fantastic progress, better than we could have hoped for," the Daily Mail quoted the children's mother Katie, 33, as saying.
"For the first time we are looking forward to Christmas without worrying whether Megan will be well or not," she added.
This is the first time that medics have carried out the entire process in the UK, though saviour siblings have been born before with the help of US laboratories. (ANI)

description.hltext_display: Yalova'da Karbonmonoksit Zehirlenmesi
description.content: Yalova'nın Altınova ilçesinde, sobadan sızan karbonmonoksit gazından zehirlenen 2 fabrika işçisi öldü. Alınan bilgiye göre, Çavuşçiftliği köyündeki bir hurda fabrikasında çalışan Adem Duman (41) ve Yahya Baykaptan'ın (40) İstanbul'da oturan akrabaları, iki işçiden haber alamayınca durumu ilçedeki yakınlarına bildirdi. İhbar üzerine söz konusu fabrikaya giden yakınları, Duman ve Baykaptan'ı ölü buldu. İş yerindeki bir kulübede kalan iki işçinin, ısınmak için yaktıkları sobadan sızan karbonmonoksit gazından zehirlenerek yaşamlarını yitirdikleri belirlendi. Cesetler, Karamürsel Devlet Hastanesi Morguna kaldırıldı. (ERH-HRN-MUR-KAK) - YALOVA (Anadolu Ajansı) 15 dakika önce.. [2430137]

description.hltext_display: Healthcare-Sektor mit hohem Wachstumspot [...]
description.content:
Hannover (aktiencheck.de AG) - Der Analyst der Nord LB, Holger Fechner, stuft den Healthcare-Sektor weiterhin positiv ein.
Ebenso wie der gesamte Healthcare-Bereich sei der Markt für Medizintechnik sehr heterogen und weise ein breites Produktspektrum auf. Deshalb würden Sektorstudien je nach Definition und Abgrenzung des Marktsegmentes sehr unterschiedliche Ergebnisse in einer weiten Bandbreite aufweisen. Entsprechend müsse die zu Grunde liegende Definition einer Studie beachtet werden.
Laut einer Studie vom EBI (Espicom Business Intelligence) werde das Volumen des weltweiten Marktes für Medizintechnik für das Jahr 2009 auf USD 224,1 Mrd. eingeschätzt.
In den nächsten Jahren werde ein Wachstumspotenzial erwartet, das über dem allgemeinen Wachstum der Weltwirtschaft liegen solle. Beispielsweise prognostiziere EBI eine jährliche Wachstumsrate von rund 7,3%, die im Zeitraum von 2009 bis 2014 durchschnittlich jährlich erzielt werden solle.
Die langfristigen Markttrends seien unverändert intakt. Dazu würden die demografische Entwicklung der Weltbevölkerung, die weltweite Einkommensentwicklung sowie die Ausgestaltung des jeweiligen Gesundheitssystems zählen. (21.12.2010/ac/a/m)

description.hltext_display: DAX auf Schlussniveau erwartet
description.content:
Frankfurt (aktiencheck.de AG) - Der Leitindex DAX (ISIN DE0008469008 / WKN 846900) dürfte am Mittwoch mit leichten Gewinnen in den Handel starten, so die Experten von "scoach.de".
Darauf würden die vorbörslichen Indikatoren hindeuten. Der DAX-Future (ISIN DE0008469594 / WKN 846959), der durch den XDAX (ISIN DE000A0C4CA0 / WKN A0C4CA) berechnet werde, notiere zur Stunde bei 7.081 Punkten. Dies entspreche einem Zuwachs von 3 Punkten gegenüber dem gestrigen Schlusskurs. Am Dienstag sei das Börsenbarometer um 0,85 Prozent auf 7.078 Punkte geklettert. Die Widerstände sehe man bei 7.075, 7.101, 7.135/7.140 und 7.163/7.190 Punkten. Die Unterstützungen lägen bei 7.060/7.065 und 7.043 Punkten.
Die Vorgaben von den internationalen Börsen seien gemischt. An der Wall Street habe sich der Dow Jones (ISIN US2605661048 / WKN 969420) am Dienstag um 0,48 Prozent auf 11.533 Zähler verbessert. In Asien sei der Nikkei (ISIN XC0009692440 / WKN 969244) am Morgen hingegen mit einem Minus von 0,23 Prozent bei 10.346 Punkten aus dem Handel gegangen.
Der Euro zeige sich im frühen Handel etwas fester. Die europäische Gemeinschaftswährung koste zur Stunde 1,3130 US-Dollar. Das seien 0,24 Prozent mehr als am Dienstag.
Der Ölpreis sei am Morgen über die Marke von 90 US-Dollar gestiegen. Ein Barrel der US-Sorte WTI für die Auslieferung im Februar koste zur Stunde 90,03 US-Dollar. Das seien 21 Cent mehr als gestern Abend.
Um 10:30 Uhr würden aus Großbritannien die MPC-Minutes sowie, jeweils für das dritte Quartal, der Leistungsbilanzsaldo (Prognose: -6,5; zuletzt: -7,4) und die endgültigen BIP-Zahlen q/q (Prognose: 0,8; zuletzt: 0,8) veröffentlicht. Um 13:00 Uhr würden aus den USA die MBA-Hypothekenanträge aus der Vorwoche berichtet. Um 14:30 Uhr würden die endgültigen Zahlen zum US-BIP im dritten Quartal q/q (Prognose: 2,8; zuletzt: 2,5) folgen.
Um 16:00 Uhr kämen aus den USA der Hauspreisindex für Oktober m/m (Prognose: -0,1; zuletzt: -0,7) sowie die Verkäufe bestehender Häuser im November in Mio. (Prognose: 4,72; zuletzt: 4,43). Um 16:35 Uhr würden die US-Öllagerbestände API und EIA bekannt gegeben. Um 22:45 Uhr werde aus Neuseeland das BIP im dritten Quartal q/q (Prognose: 0,1; zuletzt: 0,2) berichtet. (22.12.2010/ac/a/m)

description.hltext_display: Euro-Bund-Future Zeichen stehen auf Erholu [...]
description.content:
Düsseldorf (aktiencheck.de AG) - Die Markttechnik ist beim Euro-Bund-Future (ISIN DE0009652644 / WKN 965264) inzwischen durch die Bank positiv zu interpretieren, so die Analysten von HSBC Trinkaus & Burkhardt.
Nach den Kaufsignalen seitens des RSI und der Stochastik sei mittlerweile auch der trendfolgende MACD diesem Beispiel gefolgt und habe seine Signallinie von unten nach oben durchstoßen. Beim zuerst angeführten Oszillator sorge zudem der zuletzt mehrfach diskutierte Bruch des seit August im Indikatorverlauf bestehenden Baissetrends für Rückenwind. Neben der Markttechnik mache zusätzlich das "false break" unter die Parallele (aktuell bei 123,89) zum Abwärtstrend seit Ende August Mut.
Per Saldo gehe man unverändert von einer technischen Aufwärtsreaktion auf Basis der Haltemarken aus dem 61,8%-Fibonacci-Retracement des Hausseimpulses von Juni 2009 bis August 2010 (124,11) sowie der verschiedenen Hoch- und Tiefpunkte zwischen 124,06 und 124,53 aus. Die erwartete Gegenbewegung sollte dabei für ein versöhnliches Jahresende bzw. einen freundlichen Start in 2011 sorgen. Die Jahreshochs von 2009 bei 126,52/53 würden dabei das erste Erholungsziel darstellen, bevor das Widerstandscluster aus dem alten Aufwärtstrend seit Juni 2009 (aktuell bei 126,87) und den Tiefpunkten vom Juni und Juli bei 127,12/37 auf die Agenda rücke. (22.12.2010/ac/a/m)

description.hltext_display: 一杯需支付168美元?全球最贵咖啡将亮相欢乐节
description.content:
http://news.hainan.net/ 时间：2010-12-22 16:09:00 来源：南海网-海南日报
记者日前从澄迈县有关部门获悉，号称“全球最贵咖啡”的印度尼西亚麝猫咖啡将于欢乐节期间亮相福山。
据介绍，福山咖啡文化风情镇中心区共有200余间商铺，目前已有省内外153家企业同意入驻，其中7家为公共服务企业，25家经营咖啡产品，3家经营咖啡用具，5家经营茶类，93家经营特色小吃，另有20家为其他食品行业。
曾惊艳亮相上海世博会并号称“全球最贵咖啡”的印度尼西亚麝猫咖啡，届时也将莅临福山咖啡文化风情镇，并进行相关宣传。麝猫咖啡，别名猫屎咖啡，其正式名称是Kopi Luwak。Kopi是印尼语“咖啡”的意思，Luwak则是一种印度尼西亚的野生麝香猫，据悉，这种稀有咖啡每年产量仅约500磅。上海世博会期间，若想在印尼馆喝一杯4盎司的麝猫咖啡，必须支付168美元。

description.hltext_display: Lindsay Lohan accusée d'agression : sa victime présumée a été licenciée !
description.author: Premiere
description.content:
Suite à une sortie qui a mal tourné, Lindsay Lohan s'est retrouvée confrontée à une employée plutôt zélée de la clinique Betty Ford où elle est en rehab depuis bientôt deux mois. Accusée d'agression par l'employée en question, qui vient de perdre son emploi, la starlette risque la prison ! Qui dit Lindsay Lohan, dit forcément bonne dose de drames et malgré les nombreux efforts de la starlette pour remettre sa vie sur la bonne voie , elle n'y échappe pas ! Suite à une sortie avec ses camarades de chambre la semaine dernière, lors de laquelle elle a dépassé le couvre feu, Lindsay Lohan s'est confrontée à une employée de la clinique avec laquelle les choses ont mal tourné.
Si les détails de cette sombre histoire restent assez flous, tant les versions divergent, l'employée en question a porté plainte pour coups et blessures contre l'actrice, ce qui risque de la renvoyer en prison. Cependant, il semblerait que le sort soit plutôt du côté de Lindsay Lohan cette fois-ci, car c'est elle qui a contacté les autorités en premier lieu pour se plaindre du comportement de la dénommée Dawn Holland. Cette dernière, qui s'est confiée au site TMZ, vient de perdre son emploi. "Malheureusement, une de nos employés a violé nos règles de stricte confidentialité en évoquant publiquement un de nos patients dans la presse et en révélant un document privé", a déclaré la clinique Betty Ford dans un communiqué.
Dawn Holland, qui accuse Lindsay Lohan d'avoir consommé de l'alcool et de l'avoir agressée, semble donc ne pas avoir de grandes chances d'obtenir gain de cause. "Nous déclinons tout commentaire concernant les faits implicites entourant cet incident, car nous attendons l'achèvement de l'enquête policière. Cependant, il est utile de préciser que c'est Mademoiselle Lohan qui a appelé le 911 afin de demander l'assistance de la police au moment des faits", a déclaré l'avocate de Lindsay Lohan, selon... Autres articles :

description.hltext_display: DOUG GILLON ON WEDNESDAY: Badminton’s ructions show need for accountability from governing bodies
description.author: doug.gillon@heraldandtimes.co.uk, 21 Dec
description.content:
It has been revealing, these past few months, to follow the shambles that is British badminton, never more than when the Great Britain head coach Andy Wood quit on Monday just days after Robert Blair walked out.
Blair had been capped 54 times in nine years by England before declaring a return to Scottish colours. And perhaps most revealingly of all, the Badminton England statement announcing Wood?s resignation made absolutely no mention of the latter in relation to the former.
Surely the two are linked, with Wood jumping before being pushed? His departure follows UK Sport?s decision to slash funding by �540,000. Despite spin to suggest Wood was not prepared to operate on reduced rations, one might choose to conclude instead that he was nudged because of the sport?s under-performance in his four-and-a-half month reign.
Badminton forums yesterday suggested Wood?s departure was more to do with the Blair saga, and less about reduced funding. These forums have recently demanded Wood?s resignation and that of the Badminton England chief executive Adrian Christy. Yet players have remained remarkably mute, despite the acknowledgement that British badminton now has a target of no Olympic medals in 2012. There is a simple reason: athletes on World Class Performance funding are contractually gagged, on pain of having resources withdrawn and being dropped from the programme.
Consequently, when media approached Blair in recent months, the former world silver medallist has politely declined to comment. But back in Scotland?s camp, the former Longniddry player admitted ?I felt my career has been jeopardised,? and spoke of ?a denial of basic rights?. He has been training in Scotland since August, after Wood banned him from the GB centre at Milton Keynes following his shock exclusion from England?s Commonwealth team for Delhi. Blair?s progress at England and Great Britain level had been blocked by an alliance between Wood and the England player Nathan Robertson. Robertson would not share a court with Blair, while Wood appeared to ensure Blair formed no lasting partnership which might threaten his pal.
Then last week a mixed doubles pairing which both parties wanted (and others in the sport lobbied for with 2012 in mind) was finally sanctioned: Blair and Gabby White. Wood was adamant this should never happen. Many close to the sport believe that wiser counsel, frustrated by the destructive in-fighting, went over his head, helping to trigger his resignation.
Since the sport is bankrolled by public money, one should not be forced to speculate: there should be complete transparency. But since UK Sport (ie the Government) became paymasters, they have managed to gag players and athletes and now we have governing bodies signing up to their spin classes. In this case there is the additional problem created when each home country has world and continental championship representation independent of GB but then unites every four years for the Olympics.
This causes conflicts: individuals with a foot in both England and GB camps (eg Wood) seem unable to separate their interests, almost invariably to the detriment of Scotland. I recall watching ?GB head coach? Wood in Delhi, sitting behind the England team, cheering them on, wearing their kit and advising their coaches even when they were facing players from other home countries, such as Scotland.
Wood is clearly bereft of man-management skills, not to mention the nous to recognise where allegiance should lie, or when. And this has all been to the on-going detriment of GB and English badminton, with the beneficial outcome for Scotland of Blair?s return after a nine-year-absence.
If Wood had not resigned, he would surely have had to go anyway, as the consequence of an on-going review. It is self-evident that no coach or selector should be too cosy with players. It encourages sentimentality and destroys objectivity ? witness Wood?s support of Robertson.
Blair said unequivocally yesterday that, had Wood resigned a few weeks ago, it would have changed nothing. ?I?d still be back with Scotland,? he told me. ?I took the decision some time ago.? He had been surprised, after so much resistance, to be cleared to play with White. All their attentions are now on developing the partnership for Super Series events in Malaysia and Korea next month, before they are re-evaluated for funding.
In recent months the Yorkshire lawyer John Foster (a former candidate for presidency of Badminton England) has been a vocal critic of Wood and Christy. He was a whistle-blower on Blair?s exclusion from Milton Keynes, questioning its legality as a denial of the right to work. Yesterday he told me: ?Central to the whole issue is that players are completely powerless.? He characterised the governing body as ?totally inept? and welcomed Wood?s departure. Just 19 months before the London Olympics, Britain is now looking for a new head coach at a time when available talent is limited. Scotland?s Dan Travers, the former national coach and Commonwealth champion, who left after a spat with sportscotland, is available and well qualified.
At least as pressing is the need for a competitors? trade union for all sports, and an ombudsman independent of UK Sport. I recall watching ?GB head coach? Wood in Delhi, sitting behind the England team, cheering them on, wearing their kit and advising their coaches even when they were facing players from other home countries, such as Scotland

event_or_fact.property: had Wood resigned a few weeks ago, it would have changed nothing.

description.hltext_display: Constantin Medien Break-even in 2011?
description.content:
Lichtenstein (aktiencheck.de AG) - Die Experten von "TradeCentre.de" empfehlen die Aktie von Constantin Medien (ISIN DE0009147207 / WKN 914720) nach wie vor zu kaufen.
Bernhard Burgener, Vorstandschef der Constantin Medien AG, blicke optimistisch in die Zukunft. Das einstige Sorgenkind "Sport" rund um den Sender Sport1 und das Online-Sportportal Sport1.de komme allmählich in Fahrt und sei auf gutem Wege, die Verluste deutlich einzudämmen und die Gewinnzone zu erreichen. "Wir sind zufrieden mit der Entwicklung unseres Sportsenders und sind mit unserem Portal wieder die erfolgreichste Plattform im Online-Bereich", sage Burgener im Gespräch mit "TradeCentre.de".
Beflügeln dürfte das Sportsegment die Liberalisierung des Wettmarktes in heimischen Gefilden. Entsprechende Anbieter könnten dann wieder verstärkt die Werbetrommel rühren und die Sportplattformen der Münchener befeuern. Das könnte zu einem zusätzlichen profitablen Umsatzplus führen. Zufrieden zeige sich der CEO auch mit der Entwicklung des Pay-TV Kanals Sport1 plus und der Produktionstochter Plazamedia. Die Tochter sei dank gut gefüllter Auftragsbücher erfreulich unterwegs, sage Burgener.
Die Einheiten Film und Sport- und Event-Marketing würden über die 47,3 Prozent-Beteiligung an Highlight (ISIN CH0006539198 / WKN 920299) abgedeckt. Die Schweizer würden für 2010 einen Gewinn je Aktie zwischen 42 und 44 Cent erwarten. Davon profitiere Constantin Medien anteilig. Für Highlight seien die Aussichten für das kommende Jahr gut. TEAM sei und bleibe eine Gelddruckmaschine. Das Filmgeschäft könnte durch "Wickie 2" und "Die drei Musketiere" in 3D wieder an alte Rekorde anknüpfen. Highlight werde den Gewinn sodann auch weiterhin steigern.
Der Effekt aus dem Minderheitenaufkauf von TEAM werde sich schätzungsweise mit circa 6 Cent je Aktie positiv auf das Ergebnis auswirken. Zudem werde das Unternehmen sehr wahrscheinlich keine Abschreibungen auf den Anteil von rund zehn Prozent der Aktien an Constantin Medien vornehmen müssen. Burgener habe diesen Anteil auf 1,60 Euro je Aktie abgewertet und dadurch Buchverluste erlitten. Da diese Abschreibungen 2011 entfallen würden und der Aufkauf der Minderheiten von TEAM ertragssteigernd sei, würden die Experten den Gewinn je Aktie von Highlight auf rund 50 Cent je Aktie schätzen, vorausgesetzt, dass der Euro seine Talfahrt beende. Vom guten Ergebnis der Highlight werde wiederum Constantin Medien profitieren und in den Segmenten Film- und Sport- und Event-Marketing mehr verdienen als in diesem Jahr.
Für das Jahr 2010 strebe Burgener für Constantin Medien einen Umsatz zwischen 440 und 460 Millionen Euro an. Der Ergebnisanteil der Anteilseigner werde in einer Spanne von minus 12 bis minus 14 Millionen Euro erwartet. Der Ertrag sei allerdings durch Kaufpreisallokationen auf die Beteiligung an Highlight stark belastet. Sie dürften das Ergebnis 2010 um circa 20 Millionen Euro schmälern. 2011 werde sich diese Belastung weiter reduzieren und ab 2012 weitgehend entfallen. Burgener erwarte sodann ab 2012 die Rückkehr in die Gewinnzone. Im nächsten Jahr könnte zumindest der Break-Even auf Konzernniveau erreicht oder sogar ein leicht positives Ergebnis erzielt werden.
Finanziell habe sich die Gruppe durch die Ausgabe einer Anleihe im Volumen von 30 Millionen Euro abgesichert. Sie laufe fünf Jahre und werde mit neun Prozent verzinst. Das Geld werde dazu benutzt, die Wandelschuldverschreibung im kommenden Jahr abzulösen. Die Anteilseigner hätten ab Mai 2011 die Möglichkeit, die verbleibenden 7,5 Millionen Anteile anzudienen.
Der Börsenwert von Constantin Medien belaufe sich auf 140 Millionen Euro. Alleine die Beteiligung an Highlight habe einen Wert von rund 90 Millionen Euro. Die Aktivitäten des Senders Sport1, des Sportportals und Plazamedia würden ohne Berücksichtigung der Verschuldung mit 50 Millionen Euro bewertet. Das erscheine den Experten deutlich zu wenig. Sie hätten die Aktie bereits mehrfach zum Kauf empfohlen. Inzwischen scheine sich bei Kursen um 1,60 Euro ein fester Boden zu bilden. Noch gar nicht rumgesprochen habe sich an den Börsen, dass Constantin Medien von einer Liberalisierung des Wettmarktes in Deutschland erheblich profitieren könnte.
Die Experten von "TradeCentre.de" raten unverändert zum Kauf der Constantin Medien-Aktie. (Analyse vom 22.12.2010) (22.12.2010/ac/a/nw)
Offenlegung von möglichen Interessenskonflikten:
Mögliche Interessenskonflikte können Sie auf der Site des Erstellers/ der Quelle der Analyse einsehen.
